text:
i am thankful i am very well educated when it comes to substances  their uses  abuse potential  and everything in between

i’ve messed up surely  it’s part of the process of learning  i let myself get addicted to weed and lied to myself to justify it  and now after having faced that  everything is more enjoyable 

i miss you lucy  i haven’t been with you since september    and i miss that oneness and clarity you put in me  how you made me see and helped me create a moral compass and understand it’s building blocks instilled by my parents  but my gut tells me to wait to be with you again  still need to integrate your lessons more

tomorrow i see my brother for the first time in   months and it’s my last day to get a lil fucked up  and here i come back to my subject of knowing myself  knowing i’m reasonable and not messing with neurotoxicity  keeping my rolls at     per year  today i chose to sniff some    drink a couple of beers and smoke some weed  and i’m just so excited to see my bro 

i’ll have enough time to sleep and rest  and tomorrow it’s gonna be wonderful  he’s gonna have his first joint w me too   

goodluck being a thing in the world  much love

text:
bit of a lengthy post  but it s very interesting  at least imo  you can read a summary in the last paragraph at the bottom 

a while ago i ve swallowed about   of   ho pcp and snorted another   of it while coming down from mdma at night  i also snorted   of k just to get it all going quicker  worth mentioning my tolerance to dissos is almosy non existent btw  i went on to hole for about    the first     being composed of fairly typical disso hole elements  maybe a little more intense with some sensations of touch taking me up by surprise 

anyways  what i wanna focus on is that towards the end  on the remaining      my brain started to become very tired to the point of sleepiness  at this point it was about   and i had no sleep  i was however laying in bed with my sleeping mask on  i take the recovery position  and let myself go the way that i do when i fall asleep at night  spotify s brain food playlist playing through my earbuds  

this is where it gets fucky  i don t notice it right away  but smoothly  my brain was producing very colourful and saturated images inspired by the sounds i was hearing  but i was no longer in   person flying around space  i was just a camera flying above this chill beach  seeing this saturated sand and beautiful cyan waves  at points  i even forgot where i actually was and what was going on  almost like in a dream  except i was just spectating the beautiful landscape 

it then started getting weaker  and weaker  and i came back to reality  according to my smartwatch  i entered  light sleep  in that last      yet that was the most amazing part of it all  very warm and relaxing  it s been over   weeks since then and i ve been trying to think of a way to make my next disso hole all the more colourful realistic warm  i d like to bounce some ideas around here with you guys  if any of you are interested on the subject  so far i ve thought of dosing some     shrooms about half an hour before snorting swallowing a high dose of   ho pcp   a     booster of ketamine  i d like to hear your input on it too though  what if i was to skip sleep on the night before  and then attempt this hole on the night after  when my body will definitely want sleep  maybe i could go straight into rem sleep and have even more of a vivid hole  i don t know  but i m going insane thinking about all these possibilities by myself 

tl dr  long story short  i ve done     ho pcp     ketamine at night when coming down from mdma  holed for    and according to my smartwatch   i entered light sleep in the last     of the hole  that was also when the hole got a lot more vivid and warm and colourful  thinking of other ways to recreate that experience  but maybe with even more vivid colours  maybe having the same pcp   k combo but with shrooms on top  or purposely losing   night of sleep and then attempting this hole on the night after  hoping that my brain would be more likely to lightly fall asleep during the hole  please let me know your thoughts

text:
his is the second little report i will write about   fma  i took this   fma yesterday  which was   months after my previous roll  no other drugs in between except kratom  and i wrote this little report down  
i hope it will contribute to building up the anecdotal database on this rc  as modest as my  research  was 

  fma consumed in      ish  orally  
during the night i took two     doses of red kratom just to take the edge off  seems to work really well  increases the talkativeness even more 

my heartrate never rose above    which is quite remarkable because it’s quite low and i did in fact feel pretty damn stimmed with even some very mild bruxism that i could stop myself doing after a while 
the other times i used this drug  i’ve reached a hr of around    which made more sense  i am quite a bit fitter now though  have been doing tons of cardio 
i couldn’t eat much but i finished a whole bag of dried cranberries that were just the right moist level for my  ultradry  mouth to process  i tried some dry crackers and it was like eating the sahara  some chocolade  some sportsdrinks  some proteinshakes  all in all not much  just couldn’t 

interesting  in accordance to other reports i’ve read on here  theres definitely a tipping point around   when it suddenly starts to become really rolly and thats where i usually call it quits and enjoy the comedown  possibly with an etizolam or sometimes    

the roll is a blurry vision  a bit dizzy  hyper connected with language center  feeling of warm extreme wellness and optimism  nice  clean energy and highly elevated interest in my friends and seeking communion  but not  huggy  or  touchy  to others however  no i love you man’s  or reading up on some historic event  pretty functional in that regard altho i would’nt recommend it for studying  it’s way too rolly and euphoric generally 

i’ve also watched some mme smackdown and laughed really hard fsr  usually i hate this type of stuff  i adore this type of empathy that a rc can spark in the brain   my empathy felt genuine and focused unlike the times when bro’ing down while harmmering jack daniels  fun  but sloppier and feels a little fake  and usually regrettable the next day 

this time was the first time my music enhancement wasn’t     i have no clue why  music was ok to good sounding  but not as crazy as other times 

haven t really done any regrettable shit on this stim yet because i stay pretty sharp even on higher doses 
few stimwalls here and there  but adressed at people that luckily won t bat an eye and are just amused  or probably on something themselves   
i find it good to set a limit to myself to whom i will talk while drugged and i forbid myself to write emails  just as precaution but regrets over appearing stimmed or overly enthusiastic to a client  colleague or family member can really deepen the agony of a hangover  i have found  this limit deal seems to work well  i dont breach it  i have left no traces this time  i think 

dosing over   has reliably lead to diminishing returns for me bc it would up the bodyload  headache  stomache  nausea  and garanteed insomnia  and not much more pleasurable effects in comparison  with this drug  i just know when it’s over  but from that point… it can take a while  just relax and forget the concept of a clock  the comedown and afterglow is actually also a very fun part of this amazing drug 

give it a little more time before you redose  right when you think you’re through  a new wave  could start setting in  walking up and down the stairs and doing some yoga poses kinda got my blood moving and reignited a little residu of drugs making me feel pretty damn good for another hour  i wonder if there’s a scientific reason for this or placebo 
the stim and high can last well into the next day as far as i m concerned  i’ve had it last   hours once  the comedown has been very slow  which is what i like  possibility of a day   depression is present but so far it hasn’t been anything a good workout  some positive thinking and some kratom couldn’t fix 

i ve also had some pretty deep and constructive conversations with my wife while on this stuff that i believe helped us forward in some problems we were facing  it just provides that openness that is sometimes hard to reach while stonecold sober  but very helpful in understanding eachother and coming to a compromise  that can be built upon while being unfuckedup  

  fma is pretty controversial and i hope it’s not too lethal on the body  healthy it is  most certainly not  i hope to use it again many times  because it’s so far still my favorite rc stim

text:
i ve always had a hard time falling asleep  even with benzos   for quite some time  i ve been prescribed   klonopin daily  i almost always take both   before bed 

i recently got some flubromazolam powder  i ve always been able to estimate how well my klonopin is going to work by how much of a cooling sensation i get from dissolving it under my tongue   same goes for flubromazolam  the more persistent the lingering bitter taste on my tongue  the more effect i m going to get 

since i got this flubromazolam  i ve been testing it out  it s the most potent powder i ve ever had  i ve noticed that if i take the flubromazolam first  then wait for the bitter taste to mostly subside  then take the klonopin  it s like i just took a spoonful of ambesol  my mouth goes completely numb for   min or so 

it still takes me over an hour to fall asleep  but i sleep for     hours and have a very difficult time waking up  even after i wake up  i usually fall back asleep for a few hours  even after taking my morning dextroamphetamine 

there definitely seems to be some strong synergistic effects going on here

text:
i loved bromazolam  so i hate to say it   but it is not safe  actually it s the most dangerous benzo i ve ever used  i ve been on off benzos for   years  i ve only had   grand mal seizures from the many benzo withdrawals i ve gone through  including this one   if your not addicted to benzos and use occasionally  maybe it s ok but it did not take long for my friend to get one too  maybe   weeks but i didn t even think he had enough to last that long  if it wasn t for that i wouldn t even share because i probably would have had one regardless of what benzo i used last because of long term daily use  it was very bad though  i am lucky to be alive  i had blacked out for hours and apparently thought i was someone else and was acting like i was demon possessed  idk how else to explain it i was laughing a kicking and just acting crazy didn t even know who i was  thought i was my online alias i use for business purposes   of course this was told to me the next day  i have no memory of it   they said i was laughing ripping off the wires the medics kept putting all over me asking them wtf they were doing there  i have no memory of any of it up until the second they injected me with lorazepam  sadly the hospital wouldn t do shit if i wasn t so poor i d sue the shit out of them  i likely would have died taking their advice  which was just sit there and wait for it to happen again  that hospital pissed me off so bad i felt like i was going to have another seizure from stress and being treated like shit  i wanted to stay and detox but i was terrified they were just going to lock me away and wait for more seizures to come and not actually medically detox me  they pretty much admitted to that and to the fact i didn t have insurance so they weren t going to do shit but sit there and wait for it to happen again   i could feel the iv lorazepam dissipating be the minute  not that it really had any effect other than stopping seizures 

i remember right before it happened i said  something isn t right   apparently i kind of had a feeling i was going to have one because i had laid on the floor right before  i am terrified of hitting my head during benzo wd ever since my first grand mal seizure last year   i kept getting sharp spinal cord pain like i ve never experienced for     building up to it  now  what makes it super dangerous imo  the wd had me so disassociated i could barely even notice how bad it really was  which was something i liked about it at first  i have mentally been through much much worse wd with c lam and other benzos so i thought i d be ok  i did taper down the bromaz too although not as much as i would have liked to   if it wasn t for the weird sharp spinal pains i probably wouldn t of had any clue i was going to have a seizure  i didn t on the last one 

i am on day   or   since the seizure and maybe day   or   since last benzo dose  since the hospital wouldn t do shit  not even give me any kind of medication  i didn t know what else to do but get valerian root  well i isolated valeric acid and converted to sodium salt so it is much more potent and more similar to rx valproate anticonvulsant   i ve been having to take about   doses per day  i was hoping i d have money to go to a clinic by now but i don t  and no insurance  which is why the emergency room wouldn t do shit even though it s my second time in there in the past year for the same thing and this one was way worse  

just feel like it s my duty to at least share my experience  i wouldn t wish it on anyone i still feel stupid and scatter brained from it  and considering this is the longest i ve been without any benzos in over   years this is not fun  however  a few things that have been helping me  valerian root  technically sodium valproate but a big dose of regular valerian root may have similar effects  i d consider this last resort though because of potential hepatoxicity and potential side effects   well now that i m thinking about it that s about the only thing i m using now other than these supplements called  calm child  which actually bring me a lot of relief  it just has things like magnesium and some gabaergic herbs in it  and i take double since it is meant for children  i think i m about to go get some magnolia  i was using that regularly on benzos like in between doses sucks i don t have any when i need it 

my anxiety is so bad i really don t even want to post but i feel like it s kind of fucked up not to share something so serious  especially considering these are research chemicals  use at your own risk    imo you are better off with clonazolam  definitely lesser of   evils   or any other benzo really  y all be safe   these chems are probably a lot more dangerous than we d like to admit  there s a reason all these benzos weren t patented and now used as prescriptions  some have different reasons than others  not to say there s not new benzos still being developed as well

text:
i’ve done plenty of   mapb and   apb but i’d never knowingly tried   apb before last night  

dosages  

  insufflated  initial 
  oral  t     

quick notes 

insufflation produced a rush of stimmy serotergic euphoria but nothing like a full roll  it wasn’t much of a dose either  to be fair  also burned like hell  since this batch is hcl 

after taking the oral dose the duration and trajectory was identical to   apb   long     smooth comeup    hours of peak    gradual comedown  

i was able to get to sleep with no problems about an hour after reaching baseline 

essentially    apb felt like   mapb with the same duration and trajectory as   apb  subjective effects were more mental and emotional than   apb  there wasn’t as much physical euphoria in comparison but empathy and openness were more enhanced  tactile enhancement was more prominent than with   mapb 

i had minor visuals  including cevs and tracers  also get those from   apb  felt like a slightly psychedelic headspace  but still lucid 

negative side effects included especially bad bruxism and  stim dick  which i don’t get from   mapb but both of the  apbs cause it 

verdict  definitely keeping it in the stash  will try a combo with   apb next

text:
i ve tried this substance a handful of times vaped  it was fairly mild and a little boring  like cannabis but more dissociation and more clear headed  it was nice but nothing special 

recently i took an oral dose and it became a full blown hallucinogen  it was a powerful experience with strong psychedelic and dissociative effects and what i would consider to be  psychedelic delirium   i say it that way because it s not at all similar to delirium produced by anticholinergics 

trip report starts here  

i was lying in bed  the room was dark  only illuminated by a tv    minutes after consumption i felt sedated and tired  very comfortable and surprisingly contempt  i did not expect the trip to have such a smooth start  or for the high to be so prominent 

within another   minutes i was tripping   dark blue lines subtly over layed my vision and my shells looked as if they had books packed into them  they dont   this was really weird despite knowing that it was a hallucination  if i looked carefully i could see through them  it was as if they were holograms  i realised how hard i was tripping at this moment so i turned on my light 

it got really wild from this point on  i saw multi coloured lines cross crossing my radiator  they were flickering and very thin  made up of oranges  yellows and reds  i also saw eyes appearing on the radiator  they were staring straight ahead and there was maybe half a dozen of them  it was weird 

the trip turned demonic for about   minutes  after i wondered what i would do if a trip this powerful went bad  which i do everytime and it ironically triggers it to go bad  i felt like there was someone right behind me watching me and i even thought my light shattered and went out   it seemed really relatistic and i thought hot glass covered the floor but no  sometimes my light just goes off and i have to switch it back on  i heard demonic laughing as well 

i was having thought loops but i was unexpectedly lucid  considering the nature of the hallucinations i was experiencing  i just felt strange and my bed room felt like a foreign environment  i wasn t unhappy though  my hands looked as if they were glowing blue  like the guy from watchmen  my arms were quite heavy and hard to move  the body load was quite annoying actualy but not uncomfortable 

around this point i passed out and proceeded to wake up   hours later  feeling confused  it took me a while to distinguish what was a dream and what was real because i had some very vivid dreams of holding on to a dragon  being in a huge forest and being at a theme park 

i may try it again eventually but a lower dose for sure  i m also intrigued if it has the ability to perpetuate other psychedelics dissociatives and i may consider combining it with lsd or ketamine

please if u want to experience something this extreme be very careful with dosage   i don t know if i was just panicking about i was dying or if i actually came very close to be very very careful  i d like to give it a try with midazolam of some other benzo and see what happens or ketamine or propofol best

text:
two days ago  i took   of   ho met to treat cluster headaches that started the night before  psilocybin analogs are super effective for stopping them and i had been headache free for two and a half years prior to now  but i went almost two months without tripping due to a surgery which caused them to come back 

thankfully  the   ho met did exactly what it needed to and the headaches are way more manageable  almost gone   and i also processed a lot of trauma from my hospital stay so i m really glad i had the experience  things started to get annoying though at about midnight when i tried getting to sleep because of some awful insomnia  so what did i do  i took   of melatonin   i know this is a crazy dose  but it also helps with cluster headaches and i really  really wanted to knock out 

 that s when things got weird   about a half hour after taking the melatonin  i started drifting into this odd half awake state  then  i saw some terrifying  grotesque shit    monsters with gnarled  pale flesh and teeth everywhere  bodies with limbs i couldn t make sense of speaking in this weird  gibberish language  ritual sacrifices where these nasty creatures killed each other brutally  it was insane  and i ve never seen anything so terrifying or vivid while tripping in the past  it literally looked and felt like something out of hp lovecraft 

after an hour of this  i said fuck it and took     of diclazepam and actually slept 

long story short  i will not be taking melatonin after tripping ever again  lol 

  tl dr     saw some insanely grotesque and scary  lovecraftian horror stuff from taking a ton of melatonin     at the end of a   ho met trip           would not recommend

text:
first off i know this was extremely dumb and i actually learned to now be more respectful with amphetamines   

it was   weeks ago  finally raving again to harsh underground tekno  tribe  hardtek  frenchcore   finally getting our soundsystem ready to pump some chest eliminating beats  check out my post history if you wanna know how it looks  

it was     in the evening when we finally had the time to get some music playing out of it  me  as retarted as i am  starting off with snorting a brain cell eliminating  burning to the teeth amount of   fma  it was so much that i had to sit down and drink something to get rid of the brain stinging pain    after not even   minutes  i felt it  the heartwarming euphoria that everybody loves      minutes later  the first signs of that it was a little much  jaw clenching  

my friend asked me if i want to make him a line of speed  me  already fucked up dumping about half a g of uncut speed onto my phone  spreading it out and letting it dry  made my friend a line of about   and     fma because he wanted to try it as well    

made another little line of speed for my gf since she wanted some too  don t really know how much it was    not much since for her it was already enough   

time passed and i took     tabs of al lad and   of lsd   yes you actually feel the microdose a lot    waiting for the al lad to kick in i needed my phone  nobody wanting the leftover    i decided to snort the absolute fuck out of it  almost crying because it actually hurt in my throat   

now i am feeling it  i want to dance  turning the music louder  and louder  and louder    we reached the point where talking wasn t possible because of how loud it was  

everyone already happy and proud of our soundsystem  satisfied with the drugs they took  they danced their ass off  whilst i  for whatever reason  was preparing a line of   fa  never tried it  and people talked good about it so why not huh 

snorted some of it  not much because eventually i would pass out or die haha     haha     

  minutes later everything got cold  like really cold  vision distorted    am i dying     i am dying    it s over  i took too much    struggling to walk and with a heart rate of    i managed to get some fresh air  my heart pounding  brain confused of what s going on  chest extremely painful  almost running into a bad trip  

it s getting better is it  slowly managing to get up   
i just escaped passing out and dying  did i 

confused i walked back to the sound system  unsure of what my body experienced and what happend i continued to dance for the rest of the night   

but i knew one thing  i am over with drugs for that weekend   
           
anyone knows what exactly happend to me  i am greatful for every answer   

tl dr took too much drugs and am pretty sure i almost died  here is my story

sold in   ml vials as odorizer

    compounds     

     methylmethcathinone

  cmc    chloromethcathinone 

  apb       aminopropyl benzofuran 

  fa    fluoroamphetamine 

  ho met    hydroxy n methyl n ethyltryptamine 

 amp    

    my experience         

 i ve found also another report on this  which is actually very similar to my experience  we are different people though 

i was on holidays with a group of friends  

   around             each of us take about half a vial  i accidentally take a bit more  the most disgusting taste possible  super chemical  i eat a whole mango with it to bear with the taste

   about                 i start feeling an amaaaazing tingling all over my body  i feel like i weight nothing and i can run miles without ever getting tired  i try to do something athletic but fail  i laugh  and realize my body s capacities are still the same  still i feel great  as if i had never known what being fit and healthy means  and i am a healthy person  

   we go to a pub and there we have beautiful and bonding conversations  i feel like i could stay there and talk with my friends forever and it would never get boring  we notice our english is being flawless  we come from other countries   this is something i really enjoyed  because with all the other drugs i ve tried  alcohol  weed  magic truffles  ecstasy   expressing my self with words is very hard for me  even in my native language  sometimes the words just don t come out  

   some friends decide it s time to go dancing  at first i think  why  it s so perfect here   but i don t complain  and well  it gets even better  never danced like that in my whole life  we feel like the kings and queens of that club  i feel the music being a part of me and dancing has never felt more natural 

               we dance non stop until the club closes  and even complement the dj  i still wonder if it was actually that good   we want to keep dancing so we wander around looking for some after party  but don t find anything  

   eventually we go back to our hotel  i still have a ton of energy and keep dancing a bit while others are chilling in bed  not to forget  i had taken a bit more than them   

               we all go to sleep  i have trouble falling asleep cause i m still feeling like either dancing or talking  i keep talking with a friend about very personal and profound things  

               we have to check out from the hotel  meaning i probably slept   hour or less 

that day our energy is very low  we just don t really talk  i wouldn t say we are sad  we are simply exhausted 

although i m meeting up with a guy i had met the night before  and as soon as i see him  my tiredness flies away haha  we have amazing sex and i forget completely about my hangover  

   hours later i reunite with my friends and we take the bus back home  they are still a bit destroyed and i am fresher than a flower lol that was funny 

since then i ve taken ecstasy once but never felt like that again

 amp    

i m planing on taking it again in the next few months  i ve been doing some research about those compounds but couldn t find that much  i d be happy if anyone who tried those chemicals could tell me more about them

text:
neuropathy is painful and disturbing feelings in your extremities  many people suffer from neuropathy due to chemotherapy that  unbeknownst to most chemotherapy sufferers who received the treatment  can be a lifelong affliction that can deprive them of sleep and rest  quite frankly  neuropathy can make life a living hell 

there are few effective treatments for neuropathy  but ketamine infusion has been successful in some cases  has anyone had any experience with this or know of any professionals who are doing it 

my other thought was that methoxetamine  aka mxe  was developed by a chemist who suffered from phantom limb pain  and found relief from the substance he created  thus  it seems possible that mxc would also be helpful  again  any stories  professionals or experiences  any neuropathy sufferers

text:
hi guys i hope you are doing well  i would say i m an experienced psychonaut or almost  my doc is psychedelics and dissos  i ve had countless psychedelics trips where i would explore the depth of consciousness  i would love to trip on   tabs or   of tryptamines but i have raynaud s and heart issues and my trips are painful and it feels like i m on the verge of a heart attack  even when taking blood pressure medication  so combining them with dissos helps the bodyload and allows for much more intense experiences  

however the best disso to combine with psychs from my experience for a deep experience is dxm  ketamine is usually very nice with psychs in terms of euphoria but it s very easy to handle and not deep  dxm with psychs feels like death and dying  entites show up  the visuals and synesthesia becomes all encompassing  full ego death and out of and deep out of body experiences  hard to explain but it s very deep  scary  prophetic and existential  but on this combo i puke a lot even when i m unconscious and i get seizures  idk why but on big doses i can t move then all muscles lock up very hard until i get a seizure 

maybe the intensity is due to the serotonergic nature of the disso  i was thinking maybe mixpr or dmxe 

i have dmt and i also love combining it with dissos  i however have a very weak throat and i cough so much i puke when i try to smoke it  even weed kills my throat after one hit  i cough until i get hiccups

text:
okay so i don t recommend doing any of this  this is just my experience  bad and good  

basically i think there is some misinformation or i m just different  i find regular cyclazadone compared to n methyl cyclazadone to be much harder on the liver  there is no real proof anybody lost their livers from the substance yet though and it s been out for awhile now  i actually read on wikepedia that there was a large population on it with only a couple liver complications  

 in some patients pemoline is suspected of causing hepatotoxicity     so the fda recommended that regular liver tests should be performed on those treated with it     since receiving fda approval in    it has been linked with   cases of liver failure  of which   resulted in liver replacement or death  approximately  –   of patients taking the drug show elevated levels of liver transaminase enzymes  a marker for liver toxicity  though serious cases are rare  over     children with adhd were prescribed pemoline in the us and canada alone during the   years it was available 

    was the amount of people prescribed    cases      


here s the bad 

i have been abusing n methyl cyclazadone because i prefer it to cyclazadone  might be a little weaker but just a better more smooth full experience  my mood increases i get very motivated sometimes when mixed with ppap at a high dose this stuff is amazingly ephoric  but it s hit or miss sometimes  cyclazadone just makes me really tired the next day and i have blurry vision  definitely more of a kick to it though  i have been taking this way too often  i m not experiencing any liver issues  and i m using this stuff closed to everyday  i actually mix it with the tianeptine i ve been tapering and some other meds i m on and n methyl cyclazadone has made me narcoleptic  i think it is because my meds or the tianeptine because it effects my sleep schedule  i also supplement nac  i have tudca but i ve hear it s dangerous  

i dont know if my liver is just a champion or if i m fucked  btw there is not much pyschisical effects with the cyclaz  but if you take it everyday i feel like it acts on serotonin receptors and other stuff than just dopamine  high doses are a little psychadelic in a way  i ve experienced extreme euphoria to where i couldn t do anything but listen to music not even look at my phone just feel the music

i have some zylofuramine and methyl cypenamine but i m a little hesitant to try it because no reports  i probably will research them and post a detailed experience report  as of right now there s nothing legal better than n methyl cyclazadone in my opinion  narcolepsy is concerning though  think i ll be okay just have to use a different stim

text:
preface  i ve tripped about   times give or take usually using    and tried   al lad before  highest dose was     but had a bad trip  also tried       al lad which also gave me a bad trip  have yet to try shrooms or tryptamines  


at about   i dropped   al lad sublingually then chewed and swallowed  giggity  it was surprisingly pleasant  i d been told that around   has caused people bad trips due to headspace becoming greater or equal to that of regular lsd  

it took linger than expected to kick in  watched some tv then played some nfs heat while i was waiting  i got bored and just walked around the house and then sat with my cats  then i started feeling the comeup  always the same for me  nausea and anxiety  

about an hour and a half after dropping i was feeling very sick and i was watching david atenborough s life in colour on netflix  amazing watch btw  during the next   minutes my visuals would be at their strongest  i saw birds with parts i couldn t even tell what they were  antennae and weird alien bingle boinks  that s when i vomited  worst part of the trip  while vomiting my imagination tends to run wild and i get visions of weird fleshy viscera and bone and war and explosions  

when i stopped vomiting i looked outside  by gosh    by golly  the trees on acid usually give me golden ratio principal fractals  perfect spiraling spirals  but this was something else  i live on an acreage farm and my house is surrounded by trees and it looked like something magical and elvish  it wasn t quite the same fibbonaci spirals but more condensed spirals within a rectangle  more tribal than mathematical  celtic y  some of the most memorable visuals i ve ever seen  and i looked at the ground too  usually i see sticks and stones and leaves merging with the grass and dirt but this time for the first time ever  not sure why  i finally saw breathing visuals  never had that before  and the grass looked like it was in chunky    tiny hill like hexagonal segments  like the earth was made of a beehive 

 i went outside and unfortunately it was cloudy but the sky looked pretty incredible  there were so many shades and weird   dimensional depth i couldn t tell what was cloud and what was sky  i felt so at peace and one with nature  having the sun shine on my back and wind in my hair  

during the next part of my trip i listened to some music and gawped at the amazing album art on electronic gems covers  i d noticed after a while that the visuals started fading  they popped back in and out every so often  sometimes mild sometimes strong  and i was left in a post psychedelic energized philosophy mood  and it was a perfect time to watch the weirdest movie ever  being john malkovich  i can t remember the thoughts that popped into my head but i enjoyed it a lot more while tripping than sober  i found it so weird it made me laugh even though it gets pretty dark at times  

hope you enjoyed my trip report  gonna wait a couple weeks then try al lad with weed  then when i m able to buy more laddy  i think i m gonna shoot for    amazing trip with intense visuals  but i ve never experienced visuals that blind you and you can no longer tell what is what  that s something i think i d like to experience

three months of internet research later and through some trial and error i constructed a pretty simple method for purifying my meds     yield on average  and very pure  and when i say very pure  i mean very pure  the high is great but i have one small problem which i dont know how to fix  the taste 

i used ethanol to extract the methylphenidate and because of that the taste is insanely bitter  i m not talking iew level yucky but straight up gagging level disgusting  does anyone know a way to get rid of that taste

text:
first i never had any experiences on any kind of stims and amphetamines before

i received my   fma yesterday  i ate like   minutes before taking it  i decided to start at   aka half of a   pellet   the effects were a quite slight stimulation that started   after taking the drug orally  but the worst   the stimulation only lasted   hours   ended quite abruptly with an intense hunger feeling   no residual stimulation  no real after effects    i was really disappointed that day because in addition to being short the stimulation was quite slight 

today i decided to take it on a empty stomach after waking up  and at    a full pellet   so i took it and after only     minute the effects came like hard   i had quite intense stimulation and felt quite good  i was enjoying music like never and i was quite thirsty   it was a very good stimulation unlike the yesterday one that was quite slight  but hey  absolutelty the same problem as yesterday  after like   of a good stimulation  it ended abruptly with an intense hunger feeling  no residual stimulation and no real after affects 

for reference by abruptly i really mean i can feel the drug quite good then in like   minutes i build this hunger feeling and lose all the stimulation very fast    i would like to add that even if the  intense hunger  feeling lasted until i ate something i am currently still hungrier than usual  like i feel my stomach 

so how it comes this drug is lasting sooo short in my  body   i know a lot of people that are taking it at lower doses and the peak stimulation is lasting for like     hours  what is wrong with me   i have acid reflux since   year  could my stomach be too acidic for the drug to last

text:
so this is something that happened over a year and a half ago when i was first found out about and started purchasing rcs  i ordered   ho mipt as my first rc  but sat on it for a while as i was a bit nervous to try it  

some specs about me  i was   at the time    foot   pounds  i have never had any previous experience with any psychedelics  i had only tried weed and dxm at the time 

another note  i was a bit irresponsible and didn’t have patience as you will soon find out  

so one night i finally up and decided to take it  my initial plan was to only take   or so  so i weighed out around   on my gemini scale  i licked the off white powder off the little metal plate  the taste was strange  a bit unpleasant but nothing unbearable  i waited about   minutes  and when i didn’t feel anything i decided to take more  if i remember correctly i weighed out about   more mg and swallowed it with some water  

i remember around   minutes after that dose i started to feel off  the headspace started setting in as well as the body load  i was a bit anxious but excited to see what would happen  for some unknown reason  i redosed again  i didn’t even weigh the powder out  i just dumped a pile that had to be at least    and swallowed the whole thing  

thats when the first dose started to kick in  i began to see tracers when i looked at things  even when they weren’t moving  i heard this creeking sound and my bed looked like it was turning on an axis  

i remember i hit my thc pen around   minutes after the   dose  thats when things went crazy  i looked at my bookshelf  and all the pages looked like they caught on fire  the pages burned the most beautiful crimson red  pink and purple spirals clouded my vision  my body felt so warm  i find mipt has such a euphoric body feeling  

the headspace was insane  i couldn’t keep a cohesive thought together  it felt as if my brain had been tied in a knot  i don’t remember much after that  all i remember was i was laughing so hysterically i started to cry  i literally couldn’t keep my shit together  around   hours after the initial dose  the trip just stopped  literally    of the headspace was gone just like that and i was back into reality  only then was i able to comprehend what just happened  

at no point did i have a bad experience  it was a mind boggling and amazingly beautiful experience  looking back i was very irresponsible  but luckily for me i was able to keep it together and had a great time

text:
i ll fix the typos later     

gender  male

weight    height      

setting  house sitting with my girlfriend

dose      ho mpt and   dck   hours later  both orally 

this is written retrospectively  so i wouldnt consider it a true trip report

i dosed the   ho mpt orally from a volumetric solution on an empth stomach  the closest thing i can compare it to is   ho mipt  which makes sense as the propyl and isopropyl groups have the same number of carbons just oriented differently  

anyways  it was about as stimulating as  mipt  and like  mipt it was mainly tactile i would say it was more tactile oriented as the oevs  cevs and headspace were lighter than  mipt  overall it had a lighthearted feel to it once i passed the thermodysregulated and nauseas comeup  

the oevs consisted of textures being mirrored in radial patterns like flower petals  and eleongated hexagonal honeycomb patterns splayed across everything  there was minimal breathing and warping  things just more photo esque as if composed intentionally to look artistic and beatiful  distant trees and shrubs appeared perfectly symmetrical  the oevs were of similar character  radial patterns melting in and out of the backdrop of my eyes  no real scenes  just abstract colors and shapes 

as previously stated it was mainly tactile  before getting into the shower i touched the water as it heated up and felt the cold wetnesd across my whole body despite only a finger touching the stream  once in the shower i let some water into my mouth it was sweet and warm  once again these sensations flowed along my skin  as if my whole surface was a tongue  as i ran my hands along my girlfriend i felt as if i could feel every detail  the tiny imperfections of her skin  every bump and crease  every little sprout of peach fuzz and silky dtrand of her hair  her skin was adorned mild  static in movement  tiger stripe patterns 

after exiting the shower we watched the new spongebob movie  which actually had some cool trippy time travel sequences  nice  after that was over  about   hours after dosing the  mpt  i took   of dck in a pill  waited about   minutes and decided to take my   pill id planned to take tomorrow 

it took about   to get alerts and the experience was in full swing in another   minutes  as it came on it was just a perfectly balanced dissociation  no stimulation  no sedation  no nausea  as time progressed my ability to move was becoming rapidly impaired  i felt like my reactions were sluggish like moving through jellow  rather than seeing tracers being my limbs i was feeling them  i could feel the path my body was taking as an extension of myself  this progressed into feeling like i was on rails  not fixed onto one but  i had the option to switch between an infinite number of rails  like veiwing all my movement options through space and time 

the visuals consisted of typical dissociative distortions and suppressions  but of their own unique flavor  rooms would seem to rock and twist  putting distant portions of the walls and floors at different angles  moving my eyes and head around too much streaked everything in a smear of repititious angular tracers  when i looked at objects i could feel their mass  their momentum  and potential for acceleration  it felt very mathmatical  im sure a physicist wouldve enjoy the feeling 

during the peak felt like i was reliving birth and death traumas from past lives  grasping for the meaning of life in a dark pool of water that represented absolute truth in my mind s eye  id bring it up to drink but it all trickles out except for a few drops  also had the imagery of being a curved line function approaching my asymptote  like no matter what you do youre destined to become infinitely closer to that asymptote because going down that slope is the lowester energy state  but as i was it was unreachable  its death  the truth  the meaning of life  the singularity  etc  or at least i felt so 

at a certain point i was becoming extremely and suddenly nauseaus  i vomited numerous times  moving during the peak made me feel sea sick  like my head and stomach were sloshing around  nothing but just laying on the floor felt right  it was a violent vomiting  the kind that feels like your muscles are wringing out your guts like a bile soaked towel  after the vomiting was through  i was drained  doing anything but laying there and reveling in the absolute magnitute of everything ever was all i could muster 

just a very profound  metaphorical and archetypal experience  raw to the bone  i felt like a limp ragdoll just being dragged by the currents of the universe  but i was okay with it all  at peace  veiwing my lives and deaths as a big cycle that goes on forever until it reaches truth  the forever truth we can t remember

text:
been using   for awhile  primarily used to use   before though  don t go too high in the dosages and don t use it too often either  this week however i ve been using it for   days consecutively now         spread out over the day  today i started noticing some weird tingling at the right side back of my head  didn t think much of it since my ears nose  maybe sinuses  have been blocked for awhile  unrelated to the      i ve had issues with my tmj for really long now which fucks up my ears as well  unrelated in the sense that it s been an issue for like   months now and related to my wisdom teeth i m getting removed in like   weeks  dentist said its shld be fine then  anyway  i noticed that everytime i tried to sneeze today  automatically   the buildup came but then right   i sneezed it just like stopped out of nowhere which was really fucking weird and felt annoying af  so i thought it was just random but then i decided to look up how to  manually  sneeze and found some method which works which basically just consists of scratching the inside of ur nose softly with ur nail  which worked 

it worked  but it didn t  once again the buildup came through  but every fucking time right before i sneezed it just cut off  decided to google it  didn t find much at first til a bit later i came out on this  https   www newswise com articles stroke patients inability to sneeze  https   www newswise com articles stroke patients inability to sneeze article from    exactly the same  thing described as i m feeling   i first noticed this symptom when one of my stroke patients expressed considerable frustration that he could not sneeze   said neurologist and study author mark hersch  md  phd  of new south wales university and st  george hospital  both in sydney  australia   when the patient felt the ticklish feeling in his nose signaling a sneeze  the build up would peter out before the explosive completion of the sneeze  leaving him feeling dissatisfied    so i got upto this and got really spooked honestly   further it says   hersch reports that three other patients with strokes affecting the medulla had the same problem  in each case the build up to the sneeze was not affected  only the completion of the sneeze   searched what medulla was and lookd where it was located    the medulla  oblongata or simply  medulla  is a long stem like structure which makes up the lower part of the brainstem    guess what  at the fucking part where i think i felt it tingling  so what the fuck is going on  lack of blood due to blocked ears  nose and everything  and cause i m like trying to blow my nose every now and then  while holding my fingers over them  to make it so my ear pops or something  which never works  or nerve damage cause of the    i don t know  honestly  reading all this kinda made me happy since i initially thought it was my body trying to stop me from sneezing cause i d blow my brain out thru my ears or smtn  obviously not that  but just smtn bad  but when i googled  body stopping me from sneezing 

this is honestly written really poorly  i ve been awake for some time now trying to figure this out  honestly just posting this in the hopes maybe someone has seen this type of thing before  someone knows what is going on or has had it before  someone in the future stumbles upon the same issue and finds this thread and gets help that way  idk  just felt like sharing 

 amp    

edit 

omg right after i fucking posted this i realised i took primperan  metoclopramide      like   hours because i had acid reflux  i remember googling how it works cuz i was curious and i found something about it mentioning doing something to the part of ur brain that affects vomitting etc and guess fucking what thats where ur medulla is oh my fucking god i m so retarded  still  it s been kinda long    hours  but i took like   so i thought it woulda ran out by now  still feel kinda weird bout the tingling feeling but not sure  also jesus this seriously even got worse feels like it got written by a   year old i need to sleep good night

text:
i was chatting with a friend of mine who is an aficionado of mainstream psychedelics  she is interested in rc s but also understandably skeptical  i explained that there s a tradeoff  in that these substances have less  in some cases much less  history of human use than more established drugs  but  on the other hand  when i order from a reputable clearnet vendor i know exactly what i m getting  and often can even get spec data on purity  a lot of street drugs are knock offs anyway  esp for drugs like mdma 

this got me thinking  though  are there any examples of an rc turning out to be especially harmful  or have insidious qualities not present in the established predecessor  i m not really talking about increases in potency or duration  methamphetamine and fentanyl are more harmful because they are more powerful  not different  i m talking about something like thalidomide that turns out to have some terrible and unexpected effect  such as organ damage  that is not present in previous drugs of that class  maybe some members of the community more knowledgeable than i can think of some examples 

i want to be as honest as i can with my friend about the risks involved with rc s  but  on further reflection  i m not entirely sure myself

text:
i suspect this is already common knowledge to those with extensive experience in both drug domains  but i just wanted to throw my hat into the ring 

to preface  i m very susceptible to anxiety before and during psychedelic trips  especially preceding a dmt sesh  and unfortunately all that adrenal stimulation can put a real negative spin on the experience  the solution  in my humble opinion  is dissos  

i noticed this   with repeated in ketamine  again with   in   ho pcp  and most recently with repeated vaped o pce and dmxe  each time i premedicated with these at some point in the night  still clearly under the influence but no longer  peaking   the discomfort and fear of the impending blastoff was completely eliminated  and i found myself willing and able to surrender completely to the experience  i was also easily able to inhale enough to break through with negligible discomfort using an oil burner  an email  and another homemade device on different occasions  these   trips in particular were transcendental experiences in which i was able to retain and recall a surprising amount of even a few years later  

the effect i m describing is was consistent across what i consider the   main subtypes of dissociatives as i understand them  namely pcns  pcps  and pces  now i realize that the   or   i tried in each category is not representative of that class as a whole  but it was a diverse enough handful to convince me that this would work with more than just the   previously mentioned  i have no idea if the mechanism by which this works is related to the alleged antidepressant effect  mania making me numb to perceived risks  or just acute intoxication making me too dissociated to be afraid  but all these experiments were performed on sub hole level doses  i know using maintenance doses of k served to eliminate anxiety from classic mushrooms and lsd  but i don’t want to stray too far from rc focused topics here 

have any of you had success using rc dissos as a stabilizer for psychedelics  and if so which ones  i would especially like to know if these have utility for other vapable base trypts such as dpt

   health   good  overall  just tired  i had been up for   hours already at the time of dosing  and ended up sleeping later after being up for   hours 

  introduction   

i avoided reading any trip reports of this substance beforehand  so i would have no specific expectations when i tried it  with the exception of checking psychonautwiki for a dosage guideline  i was initially going to do   ho met this evening but decided it would have lasted too long if i wanted to sleep on time 

  onset   

           dosed  i wasn’t feeling very tired 
           i’d been playing minecraft since dosing  i noted that i felt the “oh something’s happening” mental switch change 
           i noticed mild stimulation  but otherwise kept relaxing in my chair  i’d decided to listen to   grunge  new to me but i was really enjoying the energy it had 
           i decided to make myself food  turning around to face my bed i noticed the map i have above it was taking on really subtle textures and patterns until i blinked  when it went away again 
           started making myself a bbq chicken sandwich with leftovers from earlier  i don’t normally feel comfortable handling a knife while on psychs  but i did then  i only had slight perception distortion but i was very clear headed 
           i’m noticing chromatic aberration on my phone screen  and my arms feel almost alien to me  as if they don’t belong to my body  the act of typing itself feels very reminiscent of   ho mipt to me   
i take a minute to just look at my sandwich on the countertop  the textures over the countertop are all the same pattern mirrored over itself  with the countertop breathing and moving as my sandwich sits like an island on it 

  peak   

           i’m noticing a very definite head high  along with my phone screen and surroundings drifting and breathing  along with slight geometry covering my vision 
           watching my grilled sandwich and tea just breathe as if my food is alive is really interesting  i decided to try eating it    
it felt more like experiencing someone else eating it  i didn’t really taste much but the texture and sound of eating it is interesting  almost echoing around in my mouth  i felt like i couldn’t eat the other half but tried to put myself up for it  and it was the same experience of just watching my arms move to pick it up and put it in my mouth  much more skillfully and coordinated than i felt i could be in the moment    
i noticed that music sounded really great  and i started thinking about my dog who was occupying my spot on my bed  i suddenly felt guilty because i realized i haven’t been making enough time for them and they’ve been on less walks than usual with me  but at the same time felt strangely detached from the feeling of being sad over it  i just let the music wash over me and i decided i’d make up for their lack of walks later 
       xx    i stopped doing proper report timestamps from here on out  i was too focused on just living in the moment   
the visuals greatly intensified with the music picking up  as did  feeling physically very warm and relaxed  though at this point i wasn’t  very aware of my own body except for the feeling of comforting warmth   
i decided to stare at my dog’s curls  quickly becoming enthralled with  how they were changing in front of my eyes  each of their curls looked  like a tiny humanoid figure  and when i got closer i saw the figure had  figures of itself on each of it’s fingers  and so on  recursively no  matter how close up i got to look  i switched to looking at my arms and  saw the figure repeated in the form of a texture all over my skin  with  the details of teeth and flesh and gory figures morphing and forming on  my skin  i just stared  fascinated that it was now part of me  vaguely  remarking that other people would probably find it disturbing to look at  but i just felt euphoric 
      xx    at this point i felt completely separated from “me”  the person running this awful body  and felt like i could talk completely without a filter  judge people all i wanted  almost arrogant or cocky in a way    
i refrained from talking to friends because somewhere in the back of my head i knew that despite however i felt now  i should avoid maybe being brutally honest with people who don’t entirely deserve it  instead  i took to beating up myself and my terrible habits  i remarked at how painful my back was and how i somehow let myself slouch like that normally  and how poorly i took care of myself    
critiquing how poor my sleep was or how i didn’t stick to my diet and workouts as much as i’d like  almost angry over how easily i let myself brush things off or make excuses to continue this awful cycle of unproductive working and terrible sleep habits  upset that i let myself get into this “just another day” mentality  what kind of a garbage awful person would let themselves fall back into that  let alone why would that person be me  i’m completely feeling the grunge groove and energy get to me  deciding to hold onto the commitments that i want to make now  fuck the lazy  slacking person i am now  i don’t need them 

  offset   

      xx    all while i’ve been thinking about myself i’ve also been very much just enjoying melting into the music and watching the various geometry and drifting patterns i get  i’m realizing that how i describe things and how i say things comes off as much harsher and more negative than what i actually mean  and how i actually feel    
in reality i might be having these unfiltered raw opinions but i’m also having a blast laughing and joking around with friends  one comforted me about my former rabbits but i wasn’t taking anything seriously in the moment  though still appreciative of them    
i’m in a really good “fuck you  i’m on top of the world” mood which i very rarely ever experience  and i take the opportunity to go running with my dog  the feeling of the cold air rushing over me while i still feel very warm and head high feels amazing  i’m almost flying on my feet as it feels someone else is doing the controlling and balance for me while running 
           i got home from the run  and over the next half hour i slowly come down from all the aforementioned effects  i enjoy just lying on the grass with my dog  staring at the sky and feeling extremely euphoric  watching the textures of my arms change into this almost flesh colored tattoo is wonderful  it points out all of the little imperfections of my body as they get highlighted by the textures  and it makes me appreciate my body so much more because those imperfections are what make us human 

  afterthoughts   

the elevated mood and music enjoyment persists throughout the rest of the day  and i’m incredibly appreciative of this trip  as i did a lot of introspection that i wasn’t expecting to do  along with wanting to go through with the commitments i wanted to make to improve myself  i certainly didn’t expect to learn just how arrogant and brutally honest i could get with people  nor how much my personality could completely change under the influence of something

text:
sorry in advanced for the rambling clonazolam is definitely working but not in the way i expected it to

not benzo naive but i never really enjoyed them as i never felt much from them other then mild loss of motor control  

i had a few tabs laying around from a reputable dutch vendor so i decided to try and get some early sleep  

i had been sober from stims but i found some shards in my closet and my dumbass couldn’t resist and now all i want is sleep and to forget this slip up altogether 

currently at around   of clam and feeling calm but not sleepy  

never blacked out from benzos before  being   foot   helps  but i think i grayed out for a bit which is interesting because i’m not slurring my words or walking strangely at all 

would be clutch if someone could recommend a more sedative rc as my sleeping meds are taking their sweet time to arrive 

my normal insomnia meds are zopliclone  ambien  and soma  but these meds are for short term use only 

drugs that have not helped me sleep include etizolam  flualp  and alprazolam 

i just really want to sleep tonight and forget about my stupid relapse considering i was starting to actually be happy after a week of light use and then a week of sobriety in the mountains  

tl dr i’ve always had a naturally high benzo tolerance which really fucking sucks  any recommendations for sedative rcs are welcome  preferably substances that are available in the netherlands as i move there in a couple months to try and escape my meth urges

text:
hey everyone  i noticed independence day july    is coming up and decided i want to try making some   mmc nasal spray to go to the bars or watch some fireworks with my friends somewhere  anyone ever tried making a nasal spray with it  only reason i want to make one is with how discrete and quick it is  i ran into a huge problem last time i was using ketamine at the bars and could only go to the bathroom to snort ket  then  of course  you get tons of people drinking which makes literally everyone have to pee and now i have to fight for one of the two single person bathrooms againt tons of people in the bar  so i feel like a nasal spray would solve this problem with ket and would work very well with other substances like   mmc  

i’ve been reading how to make them and i think i have it figured out  only thing i’m confused about is what the purpose of using pg is for  i know for a fact the   mmc should dissolve  but i’m mainly concerned that a gram of   mmc wouldn’t make very strong sprays because of it’s potency  i saw a post that this person got a nasal spray from a drug store which had   sprays  i did the math and     mmc in there would only make about     sprays  doesn’t that sound a little weak for   mmc  i guess   is a lot of sprays so like     sprays might get me where i want to be with my post ban   mmc if i was the only one doing it  i can’t decide if i should just roll with it or do maybe   bottle if that amount would all dissolve  what do you think 

please let me know if you have experience with making nasal spray out of this chem  if not many of you have done it then i’ll certainly report how it works  i couldn’t find any posts about nasal spray with specifically   mmc so i’m sort of assuming it sucks or is impractical  i guess the best way to find out is to try making it myself

text:
a formatted version of the trip report is available on the  effectindex  https   effectindex com reports a delightfully fun and clear headed psychedelic  

  setting and subject information   

   setting   in my bedroom
   age   early  
   height            
   weight            
   health   good  overall  not as tired as usual but ready to go to bed afterwards 

  introduction   

i avoided reading any trip reports of this substance beforehand  so i would have no specific expectations when i tried it  with the exception of checking psychonautwiki for a dosage guideline  i was initially going to do   ho met this evening but decided it would have lasted too long if i wanted to sleep on time 

  onset   

           
dosed  decided to remake my bed  i had paper and doodling supplies out  along with water  though didn’t end up using either 
           
remarking that my regular joint pain and whatever random body pain is rapidly disappearing  despite sitting in a chair with my legs crossed on top of a desk  awkward position but i was feeling too lazy and relaxed to change it  
           
i’m noticing physical euphoria and relaxation  though my fingers feel a jittery but i think it could be nervousness  i feel like i’m in the mood for music  though i don’t end up playing any  and rocking back and forth along with stimming feels great 
           
it feels like the euphoria and empathogenic effects are rapidly picking up  and i would’ve described it as almost a head high  white doesn’t look exactly white anymore and my screen looks like it blurs each time i tap it while typing  i was also faintly noticing a flickering over my field of vision  similar to previous hppd that i’d had before 
           
comfortably feeling very physically warm  i took my feet off the desk  along with observing my field of vision slightly changing  i felt very clear headed and was talking to one of my partners at this time  and told them it was vaguely making me feel horny 

  peak   

           
it feels like everything around me is defocused and blurry except for my phone  right in the center of my vision  definitely feeling like my body wasn’t my own  and watching my fingers type and move by themselves  text looks almost    though despite the vision changes i’m able to walk around just fine 
           
decided to turn around on a spot instead of walking in my room  and despite knowing i’m actually turning very slowly it feels quite fast  and rapidly accelerating over the next couple of minutes  as the feeling of turning around in a circle accelerates it looks like my arms get further and further away from me  to nearly double their length at some point  despite all this  i’m quite surprised at how clearly i can think and observe this  along with holding a conversation just fine  i started giggling at how great it felt to just turn and watch the text blurring  and was really enjoying the experience  i remarked that my sense of balance was incredibly good given i was turning pretty fast at this point  and wasn’t really thinking about how to balance or turn at all  as it felt completely autonomous and as if i wasn’t controlling the physical movements themselves 
           
what felt like ages later  i decided to stop spinning and was thrown onto my bed  i laid there for a couple minutes  physically feeling like i was almost on a vertical roller coaster  and it became much harder to read  after a bit i was able to read again  and everything felt as if it was squished shorter  with noticable chromatic aberration and strong physical euphoria  my body no longer felt like my own and i was just a mere observer of my room  icons and the letters on my phone’s keyboard were squirming around and drifting  and i felt very warm 
           
the time dilation was more extreme than i thought  in hindsight  now i was very aware of my chest breathing  how it rose and fell  i have some fairly strong oevs covering my vision  with distinct patterns and geometric shapes  but i’m still able to read my phone fine enough  my tinnitus is extremely noticable in the dead silence without any music  but i felt too euphoric to really care 
           
i’m just lying in bed remarking at how pretty everything is  and how disconnected and painless i feel  along with really enjoying the warmth and euphoria 
           
still surprised at how mentally clear i feel  i try covering my face and exploring the cevs  quickly  i’m sucked into a tunnel of tessellating patterns and watch them for a couple minutes  before deciding to pull myself out  in hindsight i regret not spending more time enjoying the cevs  as my eyes were open for the rest of the trip 
           
i’m feeling extremely euphoric and empathic  and just loving talking to other people  remarking how i haven’t stopped smiling the entire time  which would persist for the next couple of hours  i was just talking to my partners about how grateful i am that i have them  and how much i love them 

  offset   

           
the visuals have entirely faded by now  and my throat hurts slightly but it’s not dry  still wasn’t able to control my body enough to get up and drink some water  so i just lay there feeling really great and happy 
           
i remarked that it felt like the trip was over  but all the good mental effects were still there and i felt just wonderful talking to people  feeling much more sociable than i’d usually be 
           
the aforementioned effects still persisted  and i’d decided to go to sleep because i was too tired 

  afterthoughts   

this was a really fun trip and unexpectedly clear headed  with the fun kind of body disconnection that i enjoy during the visuals  in hindsight i wished the visuals lasted a bit longer but the empathogenic effects made up for it

text:
ive tried most rc stims across the different classes    was my fave but tolerance mounts quicker with that than other stims and there is a noticeable crash and dopamine depletion and redosing more than once yields lacking results…

well not nep 
not only is it the cleanest stimulation i’ve experienced being easy on the body  to the point where i’ve combined it with dissos and other stims with no negatives  feeling no vasoconstriction etc   i can take a   line and my heart rate stays below   even after redosing   hours the same amount  i usually do   which is also good enough but   gives me some insane motivation and a huge mood boost 
the feeling is comparable to cocaine or meth albeit a bit less intense  but that makes it even better as it’s the perfect functional drug with enough rush euphoria to get motivated and get shit done and not just want to talk with people or jerk off the whole time 

i can also redose almost endlessly  most days i can easily redose   times  and feel zero negative effects or tolerance issues  or at least they are so minor compared to what i’m used to  

i do take a lot of dissos tho and i’ve heard these help keep stim tolerance low so maybe they are helping somewhat   i know this is not a healthy lifestyle and i’m planning to stop after i get through a very stressful period i’m going though  

i’m curious on your thoughts  i’ve checked many posts here which definitely tell me it’s one of the most popular  and if there are daily users who can share there experiences and if they have experienced any negative feelings over time 

so far i’ve done daily for one week and my energy has stayed consistent i even forget to take tyrosine in the morning  this is after doing   daily for   weeks  
i couldn’t believe the switch yielded such good results  i cannot imagine how much better it would even be if i had a big break before hand 

snorting   is way less effective and oral i need around   to get a similar feeling i’m getting with nep but usually only   dose  and forget about doing   on consecutive days  it becomes almost useless in my experience 

any oral nep users that have had decent results  i haven’t tried it because  well  snorting nep is perfect  small lines with a tiny burn that i love and hits so quick and without worrying about all that empty stomach nonsense  however i would like to give my nose a break haha

i just wanted to tell you about my favorite cocktail of drugs for winding down after a hard day of work when i really want to let it all go and push the reset button 
first i ll make a boofing solution consisting of     of o dsmt and   o pce   quite nice synergy between those two   i ll add   of benadryl  dph  to boost the opioid and reduce nausea

text:
hello all you wonderful people  you all have made great contributions to science here  most more than you may realize 

especially documenting stuff  

however on the flipside  going about testing can be fairly reckless  

i know there are ftir testing in canada and there is testing kits with reagents but i do think some things are over looked 

there is a good reason for it though but ill highlight it after i explain  

when testing pills either ftir or reagents you are required to break a piece of the pill off  this leaves you vulnerable to hotspots  

so you could just dissolve it and then test a portion of the solution then let the solvent evaporate but then the question is if the contents are solubile in any thing thats practicle to evaporate easily  

so likely this is the reason why most usally only break off a part of the pill as i imagine most would want to snort an oxy as opposed to sniff oxy water but i personally think it could be not too bad or atleast theres a solution  

we are scientists afterall

text:
a preface to this i’m a   yo male in college who has had terrible anxiety my whole life and nothing has really helped  benzos are unsustainable  alcohol doesn’t work till i black out  coke   weed exacerbates the anxiety  etc  i’ve tried playing god for quite some time w self therapy  nothing has worked  

however  i love molly  that shit is the only thing i feel like myself on  but it is wildly neurotoxic and unsustainable when used frequently  to protect my brain i wanted to try this substance i had seen on here called   mapb  i acquired some but also stumbled upon this very very interesting thread  https   www reddit com r researchchemicals comments     

at the end of the thread was this great question  “makes me wonder if this could be used therapeutically  for example  to treat forms certain forms of ocd using exposure therapy while rolling ”

in the comments was the most thought provoking part though  “rapid desensitisation  or you learned not to associate the feelings of disgust with the action through the altered experience  there s been work done on extinguishing the fear aspect of traumatic memories using propranolol  perhaps an empathogen would be more effective  is this the basis of mdma assisted psychotherapy ”

after reading through more comments i went down the rabbit hole of mdma psychotherapy studies which confirmed the prior conclusions in that comment  

so after all this the day was upon me to go roll tits at a festival  sunset music fest   for anyone that went it was lit as fuck  the first day i dropped   mg   mapb along with   mg   fpm  the stim was for energy as described in the borax combo  i’m vibing rolling like normal and then decide to test out my newfound studies  i started cycling through tons of bad memories and regrets that would usually resurface when i got anxious or went down the regret rabbit hole  after each one i was like “i don’t care” in my head  sounds cheesy af but those w anxiety know how terrible that shit is  keeps u up at night and haunts u all the time  

but i bring great news  whenever those self described “bad thoughts memories” come up now i’m completely unaffected  before i was like why the fuck did i do that in my head further going down the rabbit hole of regrets  now i feel hella free  it’s been   days since so obviously not very long but wanted to report on a good use of these drugs not just their recreational uses  

tldr  thinking about regrets while on   mapb killed anxiety caused by them    reaction to regrets now pretty much as if they are no longer regrets but just casual memories

text:
background   a few hours ago i was working on some shit and decided   suddenly    to snort an unmeasured amount of   meo pcp  and all i can say  remember  now is that what i was supposed to be coding something related to jacobian matrix related to some ai related shit    shit warning post i can t stop typing this word    but right now i am so wonky i can t even remember who was jacob or what is a jacobian matrix and this is the base of what i was supposed to do  

what it feels to me rn is that it has something to do with how much something wobble due to some other shit wobbling  or maybe i was supposed to be doing some shit related to gram matrix and i am now confusing both things but was something like how some shit will change based on the degree of how the other shit has changed 

 amp    

 amp    

then  after smashing the few poor nmda receptors that are still doing their job trying to figure out what wobbles and what is the name of the shit i am supposed to do  i ended up wanting to measure the amount of   meo pcp i snorted  this is where the game started because my brain was full of the mathematics of the previous work 

googled    meo pcp  on a scale   ok  now all i have to do is find some pictures of   meo pcp in a scale taken by a fellow researcher  yes  i could take the same amount and put in my own scale and just see how much it was but i wasn t really able to stand up and do the things the easy way  and also my mom didn t raise a lazy asshole who would do something in the easiest way  neither a quitter of drugs  

obviously  google didn t show any useful image  only some random pics of a suspicious powder with a gee mail account trying to scam someone  

  calendar time    ok  i wasn t expecting it to end so easily  so i did my best  opened the calendar  and looked into that square with the number representing the day i got my order 

then    yes  the pack had    i have done it three times before this one so    what  this data isn t really needed  what the real fuck am i doing  then i proceeded to look into each one of the calendar squares with those numbers representing our days and proceeded unsuccessfully to remember every single thing i ve done in each one of those squares  of course  it will help me to measure the amount of   meo pcp i ve done 

after remembering every single piece of irrelevant shit i have done in those days  which felt like time travel or some regression therapy you would pay an eye for someone to do with you  i realized that every single number i was saving in my short term memory was not useful  shit   the calendar was not able to do what a time traveling scale would do 

so  i looked at that bag and tried to guess how many servings   having the same amount of what i took and was in my memory   i would be able to take with what was there  oh shit  so it means that knowing how much i ve taken in the last times was actually useful because i needed to know how much was in that bag  time to go back to that calendar  and this is where the loop started and ended  and started  and ended until i sobered up 

 amp    

tldr  calendars aren t time traveling scales

text:
hi guys  just wanted to relate an experience i had vaping several  unusual  substances out of an oil burner 

memorial day rolls around and i m feeling the desire about midday for some research  after a disappointing fling with   fea saturday  i decide to commit a massive violation of the   month rule to sample another empathogen  after reading about some interesting results from vaping   fma  i take     fma and proceed to smoke it  the powder melts into a clear yellow pool of liquid and gives off a surprisingly large amount of vapor  taste is unexpectedly not terrible  i finish the bowl in like     moderate sized hits 

at this point i am feeling a mild stimulation  pleasant but not satisfying  i convince my so to join me for another   bowl  split equally between us  the effects seem to stack with the   sesh but are still tame compared to what i had imagined   would be  however i m feeling horny now so i brainstorm a fun combination  i throw     meo mipt in the burner to boost the   and share with my so  this stuff vapes much less cleanly  nasty taste and i accidentally burn a little  this salt feels unhealthy to smoke but the effect is quickly noticeable 

we hook up for a little while and the sex is bomb but still lacking that out of this world euphoric kick  timelines get hazy at this point but we shared another   bowl of   fma  another     meo mipt  and a   bowl of   cb  this last one was by far the most toxic tasting  but despite being under the influence of other substances i feel a distinctly   cb like shift in the trip  we smash consistently in between bowls for nearly   hrs and it s on another level 

my thoughts after this little experiment were that this roa works but is quite inefficient for these particular chems  especially   fma  given the chance to redo  i would ve taken them all orally and simultaneously  although i would drop the dose of   meo mipt significantly to avoid serotonin complications  curious about any other recommendations for a session like this
