so basically  yesterday was the first time i tried a ‘real’ opioid  namely o dsmt  i have some experience with kratom  nothing else  so after a good year of reading about opioids and their effects  dangers  pharmacology and everything  i was pretty hyped to try o dsmt  

my expectations were very high  i expected to feel the best high i would ever possibly feel  i also thought to myself  i really need to watch myself  as i probably will have trouble not getting addicted to opioids  having read hundreds of posts about people getting absolutely hooked after their first opioid experience 

well  the opposite was true for me  i took   in the course of two hours  t       t      another     it felt pretty ‘chill’  but honestly it was nothing as i expected  i missed the euphoria similar of mdma  the bliss of weed or benzo’s  and to make it even worse i felt still quite mentally sharp  another something i didn’t expect 

i’m curious whether opioids just aren’t my thing  or maybe that it was something else  are there any other people out here who got quite disappointed after trying out an opioid for the first time

text:
hello 

i have done both   meo pcp and lsd a fair bit by themselves  i have been thinking about combining them and might do so tonight after a long tolerance break 

i find oral   meo pcp leads to a more  trippy   sedated and almost dreamlike high  usually i just close my eyes  listen to music  and float around in the empty void of my eyelids when i do oral   meo pcp  this state might be great with a psychedelic such as lsd since i find it is mostly visual and not very  trippy  

the crux however is that oral   meo pcp takes almost     hours to fully peak and so it is hard to redose orally in my opinion  usually when i want to redose after an oral dose i do a complementary insufflated dose and i find that boost the effects suitably  insufflated is less trippy and more cold  stimulating  and  functional   depending on dose  in my opinion 

how do you think you should go about dosing the two together  lsd sublingual and   meo pcp oral at the same time  lsd first and oral   meo pcp a couple of hours later  insufflating the   meo pcp for the faster onset to easier  gauge  the dose 

i can t do im or boofing so please don t recommend those  i don t mind those roas it s just i can t do either of them at this point in time 

thankful for any recommendations  tips  or thoughts

text:
years ago started suffering from ongoing and disabling fatigue  severe depression since i got infected with epstein barr virus  or mononucleosis   went from doc to doc  found nothing  ended up without a diagnosis  treatment  or support  nothing  my parents wouldn t trust me that i was disabled and forced me to work harder and harder  causing painful crashes in energy for me that i still haven t recovered from  at least mentally  

the thing is  they cannot officially diagnose me with cfs  chronic fatigue syndrome   just pots  postural orthostatic tachycardia syndrome   they just give me salt pills and send me on my way  i could never get a proper stimulant prescribed  i started losing friends  failing at uni  seriously losing weight and slowly watching my body deteriorate in bed while i was being tortured by depression and fatigue 

so  i decided to take treatment in my own hands and order some stimmy rcs   fma    ho met   and they helped  i managed to finish   pages of general chemistry in     months  write a diary  start exercising and everything was starting to look up  i even ordered a   group of stuff    meo pcp    mph  dck  and then i got to experience what normal felt like  i wasn t addicted dependent abusing the stuff  i used the lowest dosage on everything when needed and was super careful not to get caught by my parents    until my psychiatrist decided it would be a great idea to pull me off zoloft cold turkey  i couldn t get zoloft without prescription to save my arse  until it was too late       i vomited  was dizzy  fainted  was sweating like mad and lowkey experienced something like ss serotonin syndrome  and she didn t take me seriously  of course my parents noticed and started searching up my personal information  drawers  everything    

then they found out  told everyone  f  ckin punched me  and flushed everything down the toilet  these were like weapons to me in life  without them i m pretty much disabled and can t do anything  just like before  wow  bravo  € down the f  ckin toilet  and now i have to deal with the stupidity of going thru homeopathic church bs all over again   

  tl dr  got disabled from a virus  no one trusted me or helped me in any way  took treatment in my own hands  got found out  have to deal with bs now  i m actually escaping home rn with my older bro  like what else could we do with this narcissistic hellhole   not even my bro wants me on rcs  and i can t change that  perhaps it s time to consider surrender  and be disabled for life  f  ck  i m sorry this turned into a full blown rant guys haha

text:
tried this rc   times now  first time was oral    then i did some more the next day    ir  amp    in   despite higher dosage the effect was weaker  i assume oral is the way to go with this 

then i tried it again       later  redosed   after   from bombin the   dose because it wasn t much more intense than   and it became pretty strong  i had a bit of nystagmus 

its not quite mdma level of tactile music enhancement  but it gets pretty close while having a amphetamine like headspace  

this stim makes me sweat quite a lot and you can feel some weird sensation throught the body after you came down  i had a headache for   when i snorted boofed it  other than that  my hr was   when dancing and could go to     if i lay down and relax    fma gave me     of     when sitting  maybe i could calm myself and reach    with these dosages sleep wasn t a big issue and it really kills your desire to eat food 

all in all i enjoyed this chem a lot because of its versatility  its a hedonistic chemical  make no mistake  but you can work on a college project if you want to do that with your high  i liked it more than     mmc   fma i hate this one  my body doesnt agree with it    mapb    thr only one i liked more was   apb but it had a strong physical comedown and also drained my brain so can t use that kore than twice a year  probably   fma should also not be used more than once a month  and probably more obvious side effects would appear if dosing    in one night 

now that i have completed all the entactogens stims i was curious about  i might make a longer post comparing each  

enjoy researching and always tale the safety precautions your lab equipment requires

if you compile a list of every substance that would give you enough of a buzz that you  or other people  would classify it as drugs recreational add it to the list  analogues  eg   ho met vs   ho mipt  can be seen as different compounds  however i would categorize  xtc  and mdma under the same banner  same with weed  hash  dabs  edibles are a different compound compared to weed because of the metabolization of the compound into a new substance 

if enough redditers vote in this post i ll try to do a drug combination survey which will be a bit more thorough  work

hopefully we can learn from this joint endeavour to enrich our collective  undersganding and discover new insights

i wish everyone in this subreddit all the best and positive vibes  given the global covid shithole we are in and all the love for you  your friends and your loved ones

text: here’s the problem  people have absolutely no idea what the fuck they are doing about      of the time  if all of you newbies would take the time to research what my title illustrates you wouldn’t have problems with drug interactions or overdoses ever again  it’s so sad that people are too lazy to get a working understanding of how the drugs they are doing and mixing have on the brain     of non opiate drug “overdoses” occur because people have no idea that the other drugs  including prescription meds  they are taking negatively interact with the drugs their using  for example  if your on ssri antidepressants you can have a deadly reaction if you take them with any serotonin releasing compounds  and if your on an maoi you can’t take anything which effects the four main monoamines serotonin  dopamine  norepinephrine  or epinephrine or foods high in tyrosine  if people would take the time to understand the chemistry  pharmacology  dosage  amp  effects of the drugs they took we would have a shit ton less of the harm reduction lessons we have to give to you uninformed  amp  irresponsible drug users  please educate yourselves

text:
gonna just copy what i shared to bluelight so this new compound can be discussed here  this is all the information i have been able to compile on this compound so far and i figured this could be a good place to centralize other information others may have  or any initial trials from anyone lucky enough to have happened upon this yet  or otherwise conjecture and discussion on this compounds properties and effects 

  me pcpy is an arylcyclohexylamine that is purported to be hitting the markets soon

 https   www bluelight org xf proxy php image https       imgur com   png amp hash    https   www bluelight org xf proxy php image https       imgur com   png amp hash   

pcpy analogues haven t really been seen on the online rc market    meo pcpy existed for a bit long ago when mxe first came about  but not too much information on it was recorded  otherwise  pcpy has mostly just seen use as a street drug  where clandestine labs produce it to dodge around laws restricting pcp  as pcpy never really entered internet psychonaut circles  and in most cases was probably just being sold as pcp on the street   there is very little reporting on what its effects are  shulgin however reports that it has remarkable sedative effects 

looking to the closest analogues compound    meo pcpy  the following data exists  though it is scant    meo pcpy is reported active in the range of     mg orally  it was described as being particularly stimulating in effect  an interesting contrast to what the base compound is purported to be like  this is from dr  jason wallach s chapters in the book  new psychoactive substances   maurer  brandt      where an entire heading is dedicated to the little bit of knowledge that exists for   meo pcpy 

if we look at   meo pcp and compare it to   me pcp  we can infer that a similar pattern of effects may emerge  tho this is pure conjecture   with the example of pcp analogues  this exchange in substitution sees a similar effect profile maintained and similar potency bioavailability  i would feel safe in guessing that   me pcpy is also active in the     mg range  but there can always be aberrations in these patterns  anyone working with this should start from very low  like sub mg range until more information comes out 

the most detailed discussion and conjecture on   me pcpy so far comes also comes courtesy of dr  jason wallach  from aforementioned book chapter  in personal correspondence it seems this is held as an interesting and potentially very unique compound with a very unique receptor profile that could fit all kinds of purposes other nmda antagonists could not 

   
notably    me pcpy showed high affinities for dat  net  and sert compara   
ble to or higher than its nmdar affinity             and     nm  respectively    
which was not shared by its pcp counterpart   me pcp  furthermore    me pcpy  
was also shown to act as a reuptake inhibitor at these transporters  wallach      
    md pcpy lacked significant affinity at dat     gt      nm  but showed  
modest affinity at net and sert  ki  ⁄    and   nm   this is a similar trend to  
that seen with   meo pcpy  the substituted pcpy series generally were found to  
have higher affinities at monoamine reuptake transporters than their pcp  
counterparts  wallach     interestingly  some users have reported   me pcpy  
to show a notable psychostimulant activity in addition to dissociative effects  which  
suggests that this might be an unusual feature compared to structurally related  
compounds  interestingly  pcpy has been said to have sedative effects similar to  
barbiturates  shulgin and maclean     four and eight mg doses  nasal insuffla   
tion of hcl salt  were reported to induce a relaxing ethanol like state where sleep  
was possible  a state uncommon with most other arylcyclohexylamines which tend  
to be slightly stimulating especially at lower to medium doses  although it was  
reported to clearly represent a dissociative effect and distinct in nature from the  
effects induced by classic gabaergics including benzodiazepines and barbiturates  
 personal communication   efforts should be made to further investigate the poten   
tial pharmacological reasons for these apparently unique effects  for comparison  
purposes  the   values obtained from nmdar binding studies of pcpy were  
  nm        mk    rat cortex homogenate   stefek et al        nm       
h   pcp  rat brain homogenate   kozlowski et al      and   nm       pcp  rat brain  
homogenate   zukin and zukin     displacement studies of      pcp specific  
binding in rat olfactory bulb slices revealed pcpy     ⁄    nm  to be more potent  
than pcp     ⁄    nm  and almost equipotent to tcp     ⁄    nm   pce was  
shown to be more potent     ⁄    nm   whereas ketamine was much less potent  
    ⁄    nm   quirion et al      when employing      pcp specific binding  
to guinea pig ileum preparations  the rank order of potency among a number of pcp  
analogs showed      tcp    nm   gt  pce    nm   gt  pcpy    nm   gt  pcp  
   nm   gt  pcmo      nm   gt  ketamine      nm   gintzler et al       
however  it is unclear which receptor s  were being labeled in this experiment   
which makes interpretation of these particular results challenging  

anyways  figured i would dump all existing info so far  super excited to see what results come out of this one

text:
so last night my wife and i got into an argument and i went to my apartment   yes  i have a house with a wife and   kids and an apartment to escape to when she gets angry  long story 

anyway  when i got back to my apartment i weighed out   of dmxe and sniffed it promptly  i wasn t in a good headspace due to the ridiculous fighting  

well  let me be the first to tell you that when time ceases to exist your life problems seem miniscule in comparison  

i went all the way in  

i witnessed the death of the universe and realized that we are all  god   for lack of a better term  

i became eternity and i had accepted my fate    the walls of reality shredded and there was no more spacetime  i spent what seemed to be eons in this self collapsing  self replicating realm of impossibleness  

i ve been here before  it s okay  everything is going to be okay  

just as the wave of eternity started to subside  i contemplated all the disastrous decisions i ve made and realized that it was all for a purpose  

the purpose of life   experience  we are literally the universe experiencing itself in every iteration possible  forever and ever and ever   we are but one planet in an infinite universe in an infinite multiverse amongst the infinite dimensions  

when i figured out how to use a phone again  i called my friend  nopants sam  and talked for at least an hour  he was a mind saving grace last night  

if you want to be completely shattered into oblivion  i could recommend this  

it s not for the faint of heart  you will go all the way  no turning back  end of time crazy shit  

love light

💖 🌈

text:
i received some bromaz norfluraz solutions  i went with the solutions because i wanted to give both a try before picking which one to get in powder  i tried the bromaz yesterday but haven t tried the norflur yet  tolerance is   etizolam day for about a year  was doing between         clonazolam for a few weeks during that time as well

   took first dose of bromaz approx  
   got up and walked around tried to get a guage kn how sharp i was  if i was dizzy or anything  no real effects yet to speak of so i took another  
   starting to definitely feel reduced anxiety  a little slower  ever so slightly wobbly figure ill give it another hour or two
   anxiety is pretty much completely gone  i feel very clear headed aside from the tiredness and the slight wobbly feeling but no difficulty in thinking or remembering
   feels like it might be starting to wear off so i took another  
   feeling nice and relaxed again  solid muscle relaxation with this one without completely knocking you on your ass
      more  decide i wanna see if i can get any euphoria out of it or get a real  fucked up  feeling
   still feeling pretty good but not sloppy at all
      just wanted to test the waters  smoked a bit of weed with it ended up watching some tv feeling a little sloppy at this point and passed out watching tv around midnight 

so far this seems like a pretty solid day time benzo at typical doses  it feels very functional  not too sedating and just enough muscle relaxation and anxiety relief to keep ya going 

this has been my ted talk

text:
yesterday i didn’t sleep the night before and was doing   ho   hours straight  i ended up taking   ir adderall in the morning and last night i got pretty high at one point  i’ve been taking     doses and im my drugs  i was feeling pretty normal but after a certain point i was manic out of my damn mind and was in my closet space of a room thinking there had been an earthquake and was mumbling to the jacket hung up on my wall thinking i was talking to another person  i ended up calling my friend roommate for whatever reason thinking i was going to drive down to his place   minutes down  i thought he came over and was with me but i was straight hallucinating  my current roommate was talking to me at one point and i for some reason though he was manipulating me asking for my keys and wallet  i’m in the process of moving and have been stressed recently which is why i’ve been doing   ho days on end  i was reading up on    basquiat and his heroin od slamming hundreds of bags of h  and just thinking to myself like damn the pain and stress of life really brings people to self sabotage and fuck up their life  i mostly stick with   to help treat my fixation on being high  but i have been out  i have pretty bad mdd and have realized i’m using as complete means to escape reality 
don’t be stupid like me and go without sleep doing drugs  you’re only fucking up your brain  stay safe and take care of yourself people

text:
hi friends  

looking for some guidance from you rebellious souls  hoping to try   fea at a house music show tonight  lots of reports suggest this substance is euphoric  entactogenic  and otherwise  rolly  at moderate to high dosages         i was thinking of bringing a   capsule for myself and a   capsule for the so  with another   potential redose capsule each  we are both experienced veteran users of mdma and mda  moderately versed in cathinones  but have not yet tried any benzofurans or fluorinated amphetamines   is this reasonable for a     hour event  would having a few drinks before or during be contraindicated  
i hesitate to ask this last question but would modest cocaine bumps be too incredibly risky of a way to counter the alleged sedating effect of the   fea  that might better be mixed with something else 

your thoughts and input are greatly appreciated

text:
sorry for the very long post  i m on the stuff right now  you know how it is    

  tl dr      this shit is super  super compulsive  after feeling like shit both physically and mentally yesterday i still woke up and just took some more  do not buy if you have an addictive personality  

i bought   grams of the stuff about a week or two ago  fast forward to a few days ago and it came in the mail 

i had done   mmc before but only got   gram  i could distinctly remember the insane urge to redose and ended up binging the entire gram over the course of   days  i slept in between though  

 so with this in mind  i decided to go about it better this time  i planned my doses  set aside an entire gram and hid it away  then broke up the second gram into     doses  popped the doses into some capsules  and swore to only take   

fast forward to today  i have been on the   mmc for   days now  i don t even want to take it  last night was super rough and i ended up crying for a solid hour  no reason for it just super drained of serotonin dopamine  last night i swore to not touch the stuff again  nearly all my muscles ached super bad  i felt odd and slightly  off  and was just in general both physically and mentally drained  i felt like the embodiment of shitty 

well  this morning i woke up  i did make sure to stop dosing after   pm to ensure that i d actually be able to sleep  and felt pretty much fine  just a bit hazy in the mind  a bit like after you wake and bake and are just  foggy  all day  i made myself some food  topped up on vitamins and minerals  had a shower  and was ready for a nice relaxing day  

but  after that  i head upstairs  and as i enter my bedroom i see the baggie of   mmc on the table  it brought out some primal urge in me  i spent   minutes sitting by that baggie trying to convince myself not to do any  didn t work ofc  ended up snorting about   then popping another    at this point  i feel as if the drug is controlling me because i really didn t want to take any  just a voice in the back of my head convinving me to do some

the worst  or best depending on how you look at it  thing about this chemical is that it pretty much lacks a comedown  i only over felt depressed down when the drug was wearing off  if i managed to sleep for     hours  i could wake up the next day and feel mentally fine  just a bit foggy  also  after the     redose it doesn t do shit other than strain your heart and make you sweat balls  but you will still want to take more and more   

 amp    

be very careful with this chemical  god knows what would happen if i ordered say   of the stuff 

stay safe guys  and remember  moderation is key

text:
recently acquired   of dpt hcl and was looking at taking the plunge tonight  to give a bit of detail  i’m familiar with psychedelics  numerous lsd and shroom trips  my only experience with “synthetic tryptamines” is   aco dmt  which i’ve loved


now  with that being said  my preferred method for taking   aco was to weigh out about   of the hcl and fill vegetable pill capsules with it and just down them with water  this helped avoid the god awful taste and nausea that was associated with it  in general  this lead to decent great trips with minimal downsides 

in reading about dpt  it’s clear to me the preferred method of administration would be smoking the freebase  unfortunately  i am completely unfamiliar with this process and would like to wait to try it when i can get a bit more of the substance in case of messing up the process 


the second most popular method is clearly snorting it  my biggest concern here is that  reading reports  it is a highly in pleasurable experience  stuffed nose for days  burning throughout the trip  i fear that snorting it may ruin the whole experience for me  as i already struggle to snort drugs that are considerably less uncomfortable then this 

so does anybody have any experience taking dpt orally  is it a waste  reading reports  i’ve seen wildly conflicting reports regarding the exact same dose in different individuals i have no doubt in my mind that i would feel some effects  but would i be wasting the substance trying to reach those effects  i’ve also heard of plugging  which i never felt compelled to do with   aco  but my understanding of that is that the effects will hit me quicker  but also wear off quicker  which i’m not sure i’m looking for 


so all in all  i am looking for anybody who has taken dpt orally who can speak on the experience or their thoughts on the matter  anybody who has taken multiple different forms of administration would be even better 

cheers to any and all help

text:
i ve only done dissos a handful of times  ketamine    ho pcp  and nitrous if that counts  and usually in lower doses  i also took a larger dose of k recently and nearly holed  so i have a bit of experience with higher doses too 

in my experience  the recreational potential of these drugs is not as obvious as drugs in any other class i ve tried  i ve found the experiences very interesting  but they ve lacked any of the characteristics that draws me to other drugs  euphoria  excitement  anxiety reduction  feelings of well being  etc   and while i ve found dissos to produce very abstract mental states  they seem to be lacking in the sort of introspection and self understanding that psychedelics provide 

i ve also heard a lot about using dissos for immersion in stuff like movies or video games mentioned in this sub  but i reliably get double vision even at low doses  which pretty much makes it impossible to get immersed in anything like that unless i commit to hours of keeping one eye closed 

so  dissoheads  what is it that draws you to dissos and what do you use them for

i found  myself completely derealized  my ego became an echo far away and i wondered how i did end up in this strange but still familiar place  the oevs were really dark  my vision became black and white and i saw entities and ectoplasm flying around me  
the cevs were extremely beatiful  alien  colorful with pronounced green and blue geometrics  changing in shape and leading me through different landscapes and beings that were watching me on my trip

text:
last tuesday  i decided to try   lsd  a little background on me  i absolutely love psychedelics  a love that was started by lsd when i was    this turned out to be an extremely rare occurrence as lsd is extremely rare where i live  i ve only had it   times in myife and had not had it at all since    since then all my experiences were with dmt smoked and as ayahuasca   dpt  and   aco dmt  so i was extremely excited when i acquired   lsd  so my mindset was very positive and eager  my intent was to work through some emotional issues i ve been having since a very nasty breakup i experienced in march  i was at my parents house  they are chill people and i have a great relationship with them so they weren t an issue  being in my old room just added to the nostalgia of finally getting to trip with a lysergamide after so long 

i got home from work at    relaxed a bit  smoked a bowl and put     blotter under my tongue at around      i played some classic snes games on switch as i waited  by     i felt a bit lightheaded and things were brighter but it seemed very mild for that point so i took another half of a blotter bringing my total dose to   give or take  not long after i put that blotter in my mouth i began to truly trip  everything was shimmering  rippling  twisting  and morphing around me  it felt genuinely impossible to stop smiling  the euphoria was incredible and my mood was through the roof  i had no nausea or anxiety whatsoever on the comeup which really surprised me  i did have mild cramps in my legs and arms throughput but they were barely even an annoyance and stretching felt orgasmic  right as the trip was really kicking in i started sweating profusely and was extremely hot to the touch  thus worried me a bit but subsided after   andi i  had no more issues like that during the experience i watched it s always sunny in philadelphia for about   and laughed until i literally couldn t breathe 

then i wanted to get serious so i cut out all the lights and tv and put on music  it sounded amazing of course  every song stirred massive emotions within me  as i listened to music i began my introspection which came effortlessly  i was able to see my lroblems from a totally objective point of view  i saw the mistakes i had made and i didn t beat myself up for them  i just clearly saw what i needed to do different next time and resolved myself to do it  i also saw everything that i did right  i was able to see myself in a very positive light  see what others like about me  saw that i  genuinely try my hardest to be a good person  i could take an unbiased look at myself  i saw the good and the bad in me  the drug had no agenda to push me one way or the other it seemed  i also thought about   and   of other things from the origin of humanity to the end time  i felt as though i live a thousand lifetimes  i saw how incredibly small we are as a little speck on this giant ball floating in an infinitely larger universe  but i also saw how large and important i am just to be connected to it all and to be alive  this went on for several hours  it was around   when i had my first conception of what sobriety was  but it was just a brief wave and i was still slipping in and out of tripping balls  at   i went outside to smoke a bowl as the sun came up  the weed brought the trip back hardcover  especially the visuals  the sunrise was utterly gorgeous to tje point of tears  i continued to have alternating waves of tripping and sobriety until around    visuals were mostly gone then but i had a feeling of general intoxication until i finally went to sleep around   wednesday 

overall thus was quite possibly the best trip of my life  i was floored by how wonderful it was  it was aggressively positive from start to finish  i struggle wth anxiety disorders  depression  self esteem issues  etc  i ve never had a psychedelic experience where i didn  t have some rough points during it  until now  even as i confronted my current problems in life i felt nothing but clarity and positivity  i was able to let go of all the anger  doubt  and fear that s been plaguing me  i was able to understand why i have the negative behaviors i do and forgive myself for them   i was able to finally understand the importance of the fact hat i have wonderful people in my life that absolutely love me and will always be there for me  nothing is more important than that  i reached out to those people and let qthem know how much they mean to me the day after  i feel like a person reborn  

i would say the trip lasted from   to   with an afterglow the whole next day  it was incredibly smooth aside from a   episode where my body temperature felt extremely high  it was the most positive feeling psychedelic i ve experienced allowing me work through virtually all my hangups without fear  the visuals are awesome  very colorful with a lot of movement   all in all it was tje best trip i ve ever had  it was extremely fun and recreational while also being very introspective and inspiring me to positive change in a way i haven t been in along time  absolute     for me  dose was pretty much perfect  next time i will take the   all at once

so  for context i had never tried dissociatives before  and tried them for the first time with o pce  which i took at different doses  one time was snorted and the others were ingested 

the doses i took were         and   and for most of them  my body felt quite numb  which i did not like at all  and i was dissociated but kind of in a lethargic way  not fun just kinda annoyed

text:
so this is my first post on this sub   i ve enjoyed some great reading thanks to you wild folks   i wanted to contribute my lesson in hopes of helping someone else 

i m a middle aged man with   kids and a wife   typical life of such but in a very remote part of the world   i started micro dosing mushrooms but found it difficult to find a good working dose   through you guys i found   lsd and wanted to give that i try  the site i ordered from also had al lad so i scooped some up 

when i was in my teens and   we didn t have the internet and harm reduction was whatever your buddy told you works best   i grew up thinking     grams of shrooms was a good starting dose or two tabs is what you needed   times were simpler and i honestly don t remember any od stories from my youth   in some regard we didn t have to be that careful 

so basically i wanted to write this post because i ve done the   a few times at low to moderate doses  up to   and found it pretty mild and functional     had mild effects and was recreational but i was nearly sober on      i found to be a good micro dose which is about double what others do   

but al lad  i did a bunch of reading about how mild the effects are and was going to try   but decided to cut it in half to test it on myself   this is where age has brought me some sober second thought   let me preface this with the fact i ve done over   grams of dried shrooms in a single dose  slightly mistakenly and have many     plus shrooms trips and a hand full of street lsd trips from my youth as bench marks   thus  i feel qualified to give you my insights 

  hit me stronger than   of     i read that some people seem to be sensitive to al lad and it appears to me that i m in that boat   i experienced body temperature distortion  auditory hallucinations some visual hd effects  mild head space and some strong body effects   i ve seen lots of comparisons of   grams of shrooms is like a tab of acid and so on and for me at least shrooms and acid do not compare so specifically   shrooms always gave me strong body effects like being drunk with a confused headspace   acid for me has similar visual effects but a completely different body and mind effect   this influences the trip much more than visuals  for me at least 

the al lad at   was much different in the body high effects for me   i had some leg stiffness that i don t get from shrooms or lsd or    feeling hot in waves not uncomfortable but present  shrooms make me cold   it was a very enjoyable experience but i was expecting to feel nothing since most experience say you need over     

i hope my testing the waters lightly influences others to do the same   i wouldn t have had the beautiful experience that i did if i had taken    because i had things to do as a parent and a community member that would have been uncomfortable if i blasted off     will try   but now i know how it affects my body 

stay well  take it slow with new stuff

text:
came into some ephenidine recently  extremely extremely impressed and pleasantly surprised by this compound  i expected something harsh on the body with apparent drawbacks  but beyond the long and gradual comeup and the physical causticity of the material  it hit all of my points of intrigue with a new substance 

my doses have been between   and   at once  with my highest cumulative dose in a session being   done in   drops              over about   hours  all orally consumed in either water or lemonade  i m not completely aware of the duration of action  as i fell asleep as the last   began to hit  i prefer to take it on a partially full stomach  the acidity of the compound is rough on the inside of my completely empty stomach  it seems like sugar has a negligible effect on the absorption or metabolism of ephenidine  contrary to things like memantine or ketamine where a soda or a cranberry juice can pull you out of a hole or otherwise ground you 

for those who haven t tried it  the physical subjective effects included peripheral anaesthesia  numbing of extremities lips   sensations of weightlessness  substantial analgesia  a very unique and distinctly stoning euphoria  a headspace analogous to that of a mild  slow lysergamide  and clean  consensual  dynamic bodily dissociation  i make the distinction of consensual because in my personal experience  the dissociation of ketamine at high doses  or something like salvia  happens at a fast enough rate to possibly generate a feeling of  like  being strapped into a roller coaster you didn t realize you were gonna be on  ephenidine is gentle enough that by the time you re fully up you ve acclimated to the degree of out of body ness that you experience 

that being said  the primary drawback of this compound is the   min    hour onset of action via oral administration  it s too caustic for intranasal or intrarectal use to be attractive to me  so i would like to explore vaporization as an roa and would greatly appreciate comments about dosages  techniques  and experiences from people who have gotten it to work that way

text:
today was one of the worst days i ve had in a long time  i am approaching the end of my fifth week in overtime  i am exhausted  physically  emotionally  mentally  i couldn t focus at all today  everything was confusing and daunting  bad mental health moment  i took ipph to help me focus but downed it in a matcha beverage with far too much matcha in it  making my brain shoot into overdrive 

i was working away and my coworker kept making snarky remarks about how i wasn t doing my job  despite having communicated clearly that i was in a bad way  and unable to perform up to par  mind you  i am his boss  he made this one comment in particular  that really triggered me  after that there was no going back  

not only was i irritable as all hell  over stimulated from too much caffeine and the ipph  but i ve been having intense chest and back pain for the last five days or so that has been making it near impossible to breathe correctly  i thought it was an adverse reaction to my   vaccine  but quickly realized it definitely had more to do with the panic attack i have been surpressing all week  every time i lifted something i lost my vision and couldn t feel my head or hands  

i started shaking 

i had him leave early  and my other coworker stayed and we talked about our past and some things we have in common  they could tell i wasn t doing well and did a really good job of keeping me calm while we tried to wrap up our tasks  they had to leave  and i stayed to fix some mistakes i had made earlier in the day as to not fuck over my morning staff  

but after they left the panic attack hit  bad  was able to call a friend and she helped me through the bulk of it  suggested i check myself into the ward tomorrow  and honestly i think i might  i got home and despite being sooooo fucking exhausted  i m still up from the ipph caffeine nightmare concoction  i took   of etizolam  which has got me down to a point where i m able to think straight  type and all that  and i ll smoke some pot to get me to sleep in a bit  

i was just wondering if you have any advice on checking myself in  should i go tomorrow  before or after my shift  i m beginning to think the anxiousness and discomfort breathing was a mild wd from an etizolam half bender i went on last weekend     in three days   i didn t think it could sneak up on you that fast  but after the etizolam i took tonight  i m able to breathe again and my chest back pain went away  will they be able to help me through that in the ward  if it gets bad again after this dose  will my history of self medication make it harder to get help  i know it won t be easy once i get in  but i ve been putting this off for a long time  and i really would be willing to go through the ugly parts of treatment to finally get help after the past few very traumatic years  

literally any comments  insight  etc  would be super super appreciated  i know very well my use of chems in this story is irresponsible  please try your best to refrain from shameful and insensitive comments  i will learn my lesson in treatment

hello guys  

so i ve been wondering about this for a while since i started job hunting  i m usually socially anxious  especially when it comes to job interviews and public speaking presentations  i m also the type of person that has his heart racing while preparing to say  here  during attendance 

i have propanolol  which i used occasionally during the last interviews i had  and while it s pretty good for the physical symptoms of anxiety   got rid of the shaky voice  sweaty palms  and the racing heart  my mind still goes brrr in certain situations  making me sound dumber than i actually am  

later  i included phenibut  usually     g  to this  and while i felt more comfortable during my interviews  i hated the onset time and the long duration of its effects 

so now i m thinking about replacing phenibut with     mg etizolam since they both act on gaba  of course  the benzo route is pretty slippery  but i m not intending to use it recreationally  the same goes for phenibut  it s purely for job interviews  and for public speaking events if i ever had to do any  although i don t know how will etizolam affect my cognition in these contexts

text:
since there aren t as much reports as i wish they were when i did my research about   cp al lad  here s a short report about my trip with my girl friend      trip sitter  i experienced yesterday 

i did lsd   times in my life    times lsd  and   times   lsd  in doses around   μg  and it has been roughly   years since my last trip on lucy  since i heard of al lad and the reports about it  i was curious trying it by myself  but never had the chance since   al lad hit the market   


my girl friend and me took each   tab containing   μg sublingually of the novel lsd derivative  and started to notice the first effects after roughly   minutes  i should notice that my so had no experience with psychedelics at all  we started to laugh randomly without any reason  and soon after   h since ingestion the first visuals started to kick in  in case of my so her visuals began sligthly after mine  in comparison to normal lucy  the visuals were slightly more colourful  as far as i remember from my last trip around   years ago  but still very comparable to lsd  the come up was really gentle compared to lsd and i never had the feeling  that the come up was overwhelming or exhausting as i know it from lucy  i ve read often  that al lad is a good psychedelic for beginners  since it isn t as introspective as lsd  and i can totally confirm that  i kinda missed that instrospective aspect  my so had the time of her life experiencing for the first time ever what it s like to take psychedelics  and she was very pleased by the visuals  nevertheless  i had the feeling that i liked the visuals i got from normal lucy a bit more   


concerning the duration of the trip  i was surprised how short it was compared to lucy  the peak lasted around   hours  i guess   and the effects weared fastly off  by hour   we leaved our home to go for a walk and the visuals were nearly completely gone  but everything looked still slightly nicer and more colourful  only when i took a look at my smart phone i noticed some visuals in form of slightly moving letters  and that effect lasted roughly to hour   or    i didn t notice any negative effects at all  only my so had sometimes the feeling of increased bodily temperature 

the headspace was also very comforting  during the peak we were both often confused and had problems to talk  but nothing special regarding the usual effects of psychedelics  usually  i have problems going to sleep after taking lsd  since i still feel the effects when going to bed due to the long duration  but this was not the case with this substance  i had a perfect sleep and felt very rested the day after    


overall it was a very pleasent  yet short trip  a lot shorter than i expected  the offset i was used to by lsd was way shorter than i expected in the case of   al lad  i would recommend the substance  especially for people who are not that experienced with psychedelics or who are first timers or not that comfortable with the duration of lucy or the introspective headspace

so i was just wondering what the best alternative to alcohol would be  because i have really bad problems with hangovers the next day s   i d even go as far as saying i feel worse for the next   days after getting hammered than i do the day after doing mdma 

but the thing is i really like partying once a week and getting shitfaced there  but the hangovers are such a pain in the ass that i m really thinking about limiting my drinking to only once a month  i ve never really been into other depressants  the closest thing i know to being kinda drunk would be a low to moderate dose of ket f ket and everything else i ve ever done is stimulants  enthactogenics and psychedelics  

so i was looking around a bit and the things i came up with were bdo ghb gbl  phenibut or benzos   
what out of these do you guys think would be my best bet   or if you know any other alternatives   for doing once a week or every other week  like the most important thing to me would be that it s easy on the body  or easier than alcohol at least   it should be easy and safe ish to use  as in either one dose can get me through a nightout or redosing is possible in a safe manner even if some error were to happen  like redosing a little to early  and ofc it shouldn t get me addicted if i m using once a week  i m pretty good at limiting my consume i would say  so i m just talking about physical addiction 

any help would be appreciated  also it would be quite nice if said substance didn t pop up on a standard   or   panel drug test after a day or two  because police here is doing a lot of drug testing lately if you are driving  are around   and just look the tiniest bit like you could have ever taken any sort of drug

text:
not trying to preach here the regular use of etizolam thought    i am well aware benzos are a bad thing to be addicted to  and that s why since i started using etiz    years ago i only have used it occasionally  to come down of trips and to use it in very special occasions that would get me very anxious 

i have been able to use it occasionally with no problem because for me it doesn t have this euphoric nostalgic vibe as opioids do for example  for me benzos are a dull drug  so it s not something that i have a problem in abstaining in doing because i feel i don t gain anything particularly interesting on them  i just do them to approach a situation that might scare or etc 

however yesterday s night was one of those days where i actually had the thought  would be dependent on etizolam for some time the same i am with kratom  for example  be that bad    

because life was just so smooth yesterday on it  i took it for work and it was like i discovered much of the suffering and hate i had for my job was not actually the job itself but my mind  i think i have an over high baseline level of anxiety tension in my brain  and this makes that i am in a state of subtle worry kind of    all the time  which ends up making my job more tense and therefore i get the impression it was the job that was shitty   

i also got done so much shit  i changed my job position which was killing my back and making me miserable  to the one i liked  i was scared my boss would say no and make things more difficult  but it was the opposite  we even laughed  then later in the evening i met some new coworkers  instead of slowly getting angry to them because if their behaviour  i stop them and told them when i felt they were being disrespectful   and we end up chatting like normal people too    etc i don t know stuff like this   just so fucking smooth everything lol  it was even fun yesterday 

so yeah this was my trip report  i mean i still think i can change my baseline level of tension worry fear through psychedelics  so i will keep trying  i give myself     years  i can be living like this all my life   but if some years from now i haven t been successful i think being dependent on etizolam wouldn t be that bad because i just would have a better life  my survival mechanism is disfuncional because of my anxiety and etiz would fix this

i started with a   oral  went through   minutes of very mild paranoia for the come up and then a tremendous  chill well being washed over me  
i ended up taking   total which is definitely on the high side  i m a big guy tho         and reasonably experienced  and i redosed way too late so sleep wasn t a reality  even with half a clonazolam       didn t really wanna take more as i had also already had     of etizolam   

  fma for me is way less stimmy than   mmc  no jaw grinding  no hyperspeed movements  heartbeat never went over    my resting heartrate is about     on   i m hitting   easy 
it is also definitely not as euphoric  but there s almost nothing better to me than a hard hitting   mmc  complete extacy and music enhancement to the maxxx  

the good thing about   fma though  it stretches it out waaaay longer  i hate falling off the cliff on mmc or mdma  makes me feel so alone and sad and almost homesick to the good feelings  it ruins my mood and it results in cazy redosing that can sometimes take me well into the next day 

none of that on   fma  it lasts forever  it s about   ago that i took my last dose and i m still feeling it  i m kind of couchlocked and really chill and feel empathetic 

i found   fma also quite functional  i have recorded a   hour dj set last night and made zero mistakes  i was really into the music  at the peak music felt more    more engaging  but not as overwhelming    d  as   mmc tends to make it  my reaction to music and the creation of it while on drugs is an important aspect of my drug research  

i read ill reports about the bodyload of   fma but the times i ve taken it the bodyload was absent  it s way worse for me on    hexen  etc  not much dilated pupils either  altho i did take some kratom on my comedown  

appetite was       forcefed a banana and a snickerbar and called it quits 

this is a good party drug for sure  i wonder  what are your thoughts

text:
hi users  i m here because i know that there is curiosity about this substance  so i thought i could make good to the community by translating my trip journal from today while i m still up  so if you might have any questions i ll try to answer as soon as i can  

please note  it s my second time using this  and first time with higher dosage 

    may        

       

took   orally with a paper  

my last experience confirmed that i shouldn t fear of any very dark effects  

immediately after i took it  i roll a joint because i found that in general it isn t a drug you would take by itself  but i don t want to mix with anything stronger  

       

after taking  i lit the joint  smoked two puffs  and watched an episode of how i met your mother 

when i started feeling something  i turned off the tv  i felt really tired from coming back from a trip to normandy with l and her kids today  

i laid down on the couch  thinking with my easy closed  

i though about j and l s wedding  the details i remember  j s grandma offering me l s veil to carry  her arriving to the big party that night in her bride dress  

i though of how much they have loved each other  and how much it showed  

i though about my wedding  who i would invite  i was surprised to realize  it wouldn t be too many people according to my family standards  nb  to clarify  not because we have many big weddings but because we organise a lot of parties  p  

i though a lot about r  because right now if i had to get married to someone it would normal for it to be with him  i though of how good i feel when he hugs me  how he s the love of my life  i thought of a house  where you can see the stars  with some rooms like in a hotel  it would be just us  our friends  our customers and our cats 

when i came back from this dreamy coma  i drank quite a lot of water and dared to light the joint back on  i wrote a message to l  maybe i shouldn t have  but deep down i think she ll be happy to receive it  maybe she s crying  she didn t answer  have i gone too far    update  she answered ans was very happy about the message  lt    

i tried to call my dad  thinking he would have probably found my chatty mood amusing maybe it s for the best that he didn t answer  but i have to admit that i feel much higher now than when i thought of doing that  

i called r  who answered right away  i told him right away i had taken mdmai  but an  i love you  too much  when two people really feel it  never hurts anyway  

we talked for   hour and   minutes  about many different things that i won t cite right now  not because it s erotic or too personal stuff  it s simply too many things  

i think i m going to smoke   cigarettes  luckily i just bought my tobacco  

i d like to have the customer service email for the hagues  website to complain about a wrong link and actually get an answer 

ps  meanwhile  i finished the joint  and i m high as a pumpkin  this stuff is strong lol 

 amp    

       

right now  i can feel effects are going down  i m smoking another  small  joint  is it bad if i take a little bit more  we ll see

text:
cb trip reports notes

 these are notes taken post trip 

 
slow but smooth comeup  no nausea  effects very subtle at this dose  light stimulation as well as light visuals that include drifting and color enhancement  headspace nonexistent  no effect on appetite  eating was not challenging  not much to say about this dose  great if you want a feel for the effects of    also sleep was not affected by this dose  

 
  slow comeup
  nausea much more intense  vomitting may occur at this dose  
  new effects are present at this dose such as feelings of sexual energy  
  visuals are also much more intense  morphing of still objects and shadows are likely to occur  
  things begin to look more cartoonish and animated  
  headspace is noticeable  but is still subtle and not intimidating  
  while the body load is stimulating  it also has a stoning effect similar to weed that also makes the two synergetic  
  euphoria
  sleep not affected by this dose  visuals subside around     hour mark  
  visuals very intriguing  but also a bit unpleasant at times  these visuals are very similar to lsd in the sense that they look very animated and fake  however  lsd visuals tend to have a more spiritual and religious vibe to it  while   has very little content to the actual visuals  
  open eyed visuals more interesting than the close eyed visuals  not much complexity in the cevs  

 
  slow comeup
  nausea is intense  vomitting is very likely at this dose  
  headspace becomes much more lucid at this dose  conversation becomes more difficult at this dose  
  inanimate objects moving even when completely still  
  visuals are extremely similar  if not identical at times  to lsd  symmetrical texture repetition  color replacement  and color shifting are just a few of the new effects that are present at this dose  
  euphoria is also intense at this dose  and can be felt in the entire body  
  open and close eyed visuals are both worth viewing  
  music enhancement is very noticeable  every instrument of the song can be heard individually  and it feels like i can almost see each sound of each instrument stacked upon each other   synthesesia possible at this dose 
  skin feels weird  especially the inside of the hands  feels much more smoother than usual 
  visuals lasted about   hours

text:
i ve decided to do this report since there s not a lot of info about this substance 

background info    year old male  healthy 

the thj   i have is from almost two years ago from a reputable vendor  it is a gray fine powder 

i ve tried this drug a couple times in the past but it had no effect on me  this is one of the  weaker  synth noids out there and more weed like  still i think it s probably not a great choice and potentially dangerous 

since covid started i have been running low on weed so i decided to give this chem a go  my roa was a joint but instead of weed i put damiana leaves on it and put a little bit of the powder with a tiny spoon without measuring it  not the best way  i know  evenly through the leaves 

when you take a bit of the powder and put it through the lighter flame  it becomes like some kind of wax that has a strong chemical smell   some people say it smells like naphthalene  it would make sense tho because it has a naphthalene ring on its chemical formula   

the moment i took the first hit i noticed the smoke does not feel really good on your body at all  feels kind of harsh in the throat and the smell doesn t help too much either  it definitely doesn t feel like something you should be smoking  the high is a more forced weed like indica high  with a shorter duration  the  psychonaut wiki page  https   psychonautwiki org wiki thj    on this compound describes the effects pretty accurately 

  this does not mean you can dose this recklessly and nothing will happen to you    my friend sprinkled a tiny bit of powder  like     of what i did  into his pipe  and he had full blown visuals for about   hour  also he didn t feel great at all and puked   times  i guess i have higher genetic tolerance than him 

i haven t experienced any withdrawal with this drug     but keep in mind most synth noids can have very bad withdrawals and can be very addictive  it s not like weed     nor any desire to compulsively redose besides the typical  let s smoke because i m bored and i don t have much to do  that also happens to me with weed  but that might be due to my self control 

even though i like the high  i m not gonna smoke it anymore due to its lack of research and anecdotal evidence from some users saying they felt kidney pain and or other random pains in the body  the thing that scares me the most about this drug is that it doesn t almost any medical research at all            it could be carciogenic due to the naphthalene ring  which would also explain kidney pains that were reported  it could be potentially neurotoxic  etc  that s the scariest thing  we don t know shit about it  and it seems that messing with the cannabinoids receptor in our body isn t like other types of receptors  it can go very bad very quick  

in conclusion  i do not think it s worth it to use this drug in the long term  instead i d just stick with weed that s way safer and it s just perfect the way it is imo  but if you want to play with the devil   and with your poor endocannabinoid system  c   give it a go but always be very careful 

 hope this helps for the lost guy out there that needs some info about this  like me lol

text:
everything that we do  literally is due to how we feel  we do something to change how we feel  whether that something is big or small  it all results in that  a psychological response 

we avoid pain because it causes suffering  suffering is negative  we don t want that  

every war that has ever been fought  every major event like natural disasters  everything that humanity constructs and molds can be boiled down to one thing  effects on the psyche 

it is rather fascinating how a kid can feel just as happy seeing a balloon take off as an adult watching a spaceship launch 

why should our species survive  because the process of dying has such a profound negative psychological effect on the individual  that they simply must survive 

so what if everyone did drugs  well  the earth would be the happiest place to exist in      since we won t have the need to fill our inner voids by going full elon musk mode  we can feel just as good by tripping 

we are parts of the universe experiencing itself 

and that s the idea i came up with while on   dck  it is rather intriguing to say the least

text:
tldr below 🌻

i ve been experimenting with   lsd    dck    mapb and am planning to try   meo dmt  in the far  far future though  and some benzodiazepine analogues  i started off with   lsd to better my mental health and for the first time in   years i m finally  truly healing from my depression and eating disorder  both   lsd  amp    dck gave me incredible insights and    wow  it truly helped me to help myself  

anyhow  i recently bought   mmc  and i thought it would be like mdma   i didn t research it thoroughly  super  super dumb  i know   tested it and weighed it  and took a moderate dosage  i did this because the depression was really weighing down on me and i wanted to feel better  even dumber  i won t make the same mistake in the future   i was also hoping to feel the entactogenic effects  too  and for a couple of hours i did  then i spent the whole day and night crying and depressed curled up in bed  when i did more research the day after i read more into the possible negative effects and comedown  and how addictive   mmc can become and realized i had done something super stupid and dangerous  flushed it down the toilet   another addiction isn t what i need man  and the way the depression backfired afterwards    truly horrible  in the past  when i felt like that  i would either drink myself to sleep or take benzos to fall sleep for the rest of the day when i couldn t manage the feeling  but now that i m trying to recover  i decided to just endure it 

i m really afraid i m going to make the same mistake again in the future  i m relatively new to drugs and kinda need a little guide i guess  i m sorry if this all sounds super dumb 

tldr  i would like to know what your opinion is about rc s  which ones you consider helpful in the long term  and not a  quick fix  and or addictive   i love hallucinogens but there s a lot to choose from and i m not that experienced   and of course which ones one should definitely avoid  
thanks in advance

text:
i ordered a gram of this substance and i don t know what to expect  opinions are very divided  some say it is garbage and others love it  from the little information that i have found  i only know that it has a long half life  has good muscle relaxant properties and is useful for anxiety without being hardly hypnotic compared to other benzos  any information is useful 
i have experience with  alprazolam  flualprazolam  etizolam  lorazepam and diazepam  i am looking for an alternative to diazepam because it is the most useful for my specific anxiety since it is difficult to call the medical center because the line is collapsed in my country and also my doctor is quite incompetent and usually change my treatment for other less functional anxiolytics 
i would also like to know if it is similar to diazepam or the substances already mentioned above if anyone has had experience with various benzos  ps  i have a precision scale capable of measuring doses just in case

text:
my friend got some k from a marketplace  as you do  i’m starting to think this friend has never had actually pure k because there is always something off about the batches they receive  i have a legal perscription as well and am very familiar with how real esketamine and ketamine feel 

  hours after doing a line  feeling a mostly normal k high and coming down and chilling  i took a nap and had a really visceral psychedelic experience only comparable to dmt and other rcs i had tried in the past 

it’s a longshot but has anyone experienced similar and do you know what rc it could be  very strong visuals started hours after dosing and only when i tried to sleep  the visuals were different from trad psychedelics and seemed very   animation  the vision had the same “enclosed” feeling of dmt but otherwise totally different content  it was pleasant but unexpected and i’ve been really tired out of it since 

i don’t know much chemically about the different kinds but does this sound familiar to anyone  

 x posted to r ketamine
