text:
hello fellow researchers  i have some health issues recently and wanna share my story here and ask for some advice  please scroll to the bottom for the question if you don t like to read my story 


recently got infected with covid    was ill for a week  did not work for a week and after that i felt bit better and i tought it would also be better for my mental health  i have a chronic depression to start work from home again  

now two weeks later i am still not fully recovered  the reason for this is that i sleep really bad  it was already not that good before i got sick  but last week i only slept   hours or even not al all on two days for more than a week
 
because of this a few days ago i decided i was not able to do my work from home like this anymore and called sick again  at the same time i orderded   miligram flualprazolam from my local dutch vendor and choose for same day delivery to help me sleep that night  i ordered this amount of this chemical one time before and finished it within two months  but i also called my docter and she advised me to raise the sertraline from   miligram to    at first i did not like this and said to her  do you really think this will help with my sleeping issues  she said  yes like it did before  but first it will get worse  so i will subscribe temazepam   miligram x   also  but please take this only after you tried sleep without it till midnight  okay doc i will do that  at that point i did not know what i was going to take the prescribed temazepam or the flualprazolam  but the delivery of flualprazolam went wrong and i managed to walk to the pharmacy for the temazepam 

back home i was even more tired  so i had a small dinner and went to bed short after that
it went wrong i toke   temazapem divided over the night  i started with a half at    could not sleep was very restless  agitated and worried that i still  could not sleep while at sleeping pills and awake for more than     day   raised it till   if i rembered right  than i finally fell a sleep and woke up at   after midnight  i felt sleepy and bit weird  but could not sleep anymore so i went out of my bed and watched some tv  did not really enjoy it  because i was too tired  i decided that one glass of red wine would make feel more tired and was thinking about going back to bed later  maybe there is a part that i can not remember  because i woke up   hours later  feeling pretty good and after chilling in my bed for half an hour i toke a shower and had breakfast  while having breakfast i saw my empty sleeping pills  i was like what the fuck did i take them all  but that day was okay  i was worried again that i could not sleep again  but was lucky to find   miligram mirtazapine an antidepressant i was subscribed before   i divided it in two parts of     miligram and slept   hours on both nights between this i contacted my reseach chemicala vendor  they apologised that the shipmend was not delivered  track  and trace said package was lost by the carrier  and offerred me a reorder on their cost with one item for free  i choosed my favourite chemical   fma   pills off   miligram  

i recieved this order last night  i did not take it yet and had a good night without any sleeping meds  but i will defintely take it when i have a bad night  plafonddienst   how can i use this in a reasonable way  i will make sure there is no acohol in the house and have only       in my sleeping room  but and that is the reason why i need your help  is it dangerous to take   fma the day after i had flualprazolam 
 english is not my first language please let me know if i make mistakes because i try and need to improve this

text:
hey 

i just read some literature about how amphetamines work in the brain  
my amateurish understanding is that the current best guess is that it basically reverses the action of dopamine transporters  resulting in an increase of dopamine within the synaptic cleft  instead of the transporters removing the left over dopamine after signalling 
ndris by themselves inhibit the activity of said transporters  also resulting in an increase of active dopamine  albeit to a lesser extend and with a longer come up  accumulation phase  

so  my question  what happens if one combines amphetamines and ndris  
from what i ve read i d expect the combination to be less potent than amphetamine on its own  since ndris inhibit the transporters that are essential for amphetamines  mechanism of action 
am i correct

text:
gt background  skip if you already know  

most synthetic cannabinoids available right now are very potent in the microgram range and extremely dangerous  possibility of seizures  physical dependece  withdrawals  death  etc    i m not interested in those ones  but i m curious to research the less potent ones such as jwh   that is often idealized in the internet community but that now seems to be extinct 

jwh   is instead available in this period and people claim it is similar  i will research it and report on that one too 

this post is about my research with sgt   and i want to share it with you for information and harm reduction 
i don t encourage using it 
little information is present online about most currently available noids  this one is no exception  i want to contribute to the community research and i encourage everyone to share their results especially with this kind of molecules  the community r noids is mostly dead so it may be better to post here  


 gt the preparation method

i dissolved   mg of sgt   in   ml of vodka  i heated in the microwave until dissolution  after shaking it at room temperature it became opaque again so i heated again and proceeded to lace it on   g of dried herbs  mainly damiana and wild dagga  with some additional vodka to cover the herbs completely inside a small jar  
 most people reccomend acetone and maybe that would have been better than vodka   
i shook vigorous the closed jar  then i let it open to dry on the radiator  


 gt the experience 

my tolerance is low  smoked a bit of weed for some days in a row the week before  

i roll a small joint of which    is my new spice  it may contain         of sgt   in total  

  hit and i get more conscious of my surroundings  more alert  more energetic    other puffs and i instantly get high  but it s different from thc  it s less anxious but some slight anxiety in the background is present  i  am very aware and lucid  not confused or dizzy   i am talking on my phone and get two random genuine bursts of laughter similarly to thc highs  

i smoke other hits some minutes later because the peak is really short lasting  i get high again  
after some time i decide to smoke more to see how high i can get on this because it seems more forgiving than thc  i begin to keep doing hits and i feel each of them as soon as i inhale the smoke  i am smoking consciously  i m getting more and more into the experience of reality  similar to the effect of a low dose of dissociatives that can give a slight taste of pleasant mania  i look at my hands and i feel like i m not my body  i feel it external  i feel relaxation in the body  respiratory depression  intense focus and cognitive pleasure  i close my eyes and i have some strange and weak visual auditory hallucinations  feels like the cannabinoids have their own psychedelic realm that appears to be quite psychotic but i didn t feel fear   

i end up smoking another joint like this in the same evening  a few puffs every half an hour  i fall asleep easily but i experience slightly light sleep during the night  

the next day i am with a friend and he wants to try  he begins with a hit and he instantly feels overwhelmed  heart racing  anxiety  confusion and respiratory depression  i smoked   puffs and it was like the day before  high but not overwhelmed  i tell him to breath deeply  then i distract him with some stories and in a few minutes he gets better  it was unexpected and overwhelming for him so he didn t enjoy it  he also doesn t like thc in moderate or high doses  instead  i sometimes enjoy it even though i can definitely feel it s anxiety and i avoid doing it in social situations  

that evening i end up smoking three joints of it  i really enjoy this high  it doesn t leave residual effects  while thc leaves you tired and dizzy  but even though sgt   leaves you lucid and functional  why not gettin the peak experience again  so i kepts smoking a bit during all the evening and then decided to take a break for some days  i definitely see the addiction potential here  it even feels like it s the right thing to do  like if it s beneficial to me  i got insights  i got a bit productive in the second part of the high  i got euphoria in the peak  but i don t actually know the risks of this substance and it s better to keep the use moderate  


 gt conclusions


 smoked route  

onset      seconds

comeup    minute

peak      minutes

offset      hours


 effects  

focus enhancement  anxiety  compulsive redosing  sedation  relaxation  euphoria


really satisfied with this molecule  i prefer it to thc  but the safety profile is unknown  dangerously pleasant and because of low price and functionality it may be possible to smoke it every day all day long  don t reccomend to people prone to addiction

text:
due to traumatic experiences in my childhood i ve always had a lot of mental health problems including  anxiety disorder  stuttering  ptsd  depression and extreme insomnia  i went to many professionals and was frustrated to a point where i was desperately seeking a change  this lead to a lot of experimentation with substances after i had taken   lsd and noticed that my stuttering went away a bit  i gained hope that i could further improve my state through tripping 

at this point me and a friend ordered etizolam as a trip killer with no intention to use it recreationally  at this time i didn t even really know what a benzo is  one day i was bored and read into etizolam on eve rave or bluelight     and some people were saying etiz and weed is a great combo and would be like the first time smoking again  we tried that the next day and it was one of the most enjoyable nights in my life at that point 

during the experience we noticed that my stutter was totally gone  that was my biggest problem and the most detrimental especially as a teen   this was totally fucking amazing for me  keep in mind at that point i couldn t speak fluently for   years so this was absolutely life changing  i can t describe how freeing this felt  had i known then what i do now i would have stayed far away from benzos but it is what it is 

not surprisingly i developed a dependence to etiz  at first i would go     weeks daylie and then going through light withdrawal because i knew the longer i was using it the worse the wd would become  this worked pretty well for a year or so  after that i got an oxazepam script because i managed to convince the doc that it was the only option for me to stay functional and that i would take rcs anyway if i didn t get it  how the fuck i achieved this idk i was   at the time 

i had this script for a couple months so i broke my     week rule and was taking like   a day and would also take etizolam on top of it  at this time i was actually very functional and my mom says it was a relatively good time for me  after the doc didn t want to up the dose as my tolerance grew we had an argument and i didn t go to her again 

after that i went into withdrawal because i didn t want to continue that way  that didn t work out and since then i have continued to use daylie for   months or so and then go into withdrawal either because i wanted to quit  the stash went out or i woke up in the psych ward from oding when mixing benzos with opioids  i came to the point where i didn t really know if it was even worth getting sober because the couple weeks i would be were hell 

this is where pagoclone enters the story  after getting probation for drug related stuff  that includes drug tests  wich wouldn t work with my habit and my first math exam in   years i knew i would need an alternative to benzos that would not show up in the test and that didn t slow my thinking down  the drug test wasn t the problem there are a lot of benzo like substances but the clear thinking part is where pagoclone comes in 

i knew about pagoclone because it was used in some studies for stutter patients and seemed to be effective  also because of the drug classroom video about it  as benzos already pretty much eliminated my stuttering and it was comparatively expensive i wasn t to intrigued by it before  there wasn t really many reports on it then  but as i was searching i remembered it and new reports said its anxiolitic without impairment at normal doses  this was perfect so i ordered   

 as i was already on bromazolam  fav benzo  when it arrived i waited until today to try it  i woke up and took    it kicked in very quickly like   minutes  and i was instantly blown away  all the mental aspects of benzos i love without any impairment  it was honestly absurd to have that peace of mind and still be clear minded and totally aware  i can t overstate how lifechanging this is  i was already so sick of being always impared just to not be in mental anguish  

to conclude this i wanted to say that this will increase my quality of life to an extreme level  benzos became obsolete for me today and i couldn t have imagined that would happen and best of all it has only minor withdrawal if any  it really feels like this is the thing i was looking for all along  my life would have been very very different if i would have found this sooner  thx for reading im interested to read your thoughts on this and your experiences with addiction or pagoclone  

tl dr  i was addicted to benzos  got probation and have my first math exam in   years  so i was looking for a alternative to benzos that wouldn t impare my thinking and ordered pagoclone  i tried it today and it s what i was looking for my whole life  it relived all my mental health problems without getting me high  high  this is absolutely lifechanging i will never need benzos again and will still have all the positives they brought

text:
hi guys  so i obtained some of this newer chem a while ago and have been meaning to try it for a few months now  finally got around to it last night  it s a interesting one 

i ve got what i would call a moderate tolerance to disassociate drug class due to my use of ketamine every     weeks 

i was mainly interested in testing other disassociate drugs in the hopes that they would also be effective like ketamine for helping me with my depression 

anyways here goes 

i decided on   as my dose due to disso tolerance  i used the in roa  i did a test bump of   at     last night  that went well no allergic reaction lso i made the rest into     lines  and did one every   mins from   to     hours 

at first after the first line it was rather warm experience  little disorganized with the thoughts  almost like someone was squeezing and stretching my brain  odd feeling for sure  about     after the last line i slipped into what i m going to call a hole for a few moments  not overpowering at all kinda nice actually  lasted maybe   mins 

i can see why people are compelled to redose  not in a fiendish way like with cocaine or most euphoric stims but i think it s because this chem starts off warm and welcoming but ends the trip with you feeling kinda cold and alone  so i can see people wanting to get back to the first half feeling while they are going through the cold last half of the experience 

overall it was a interesting experience  and so far seems to have some anti depression qualities like ketamine  it s to early to say for sure as it s only been   hours now  but i will be continuing my research into this chemical

text:
to give a general overview  i really like this substance  a lot  in my last trip report  boofed     bromo was a bit underwhelming  but still pleasant  that changed just now 

in essence  i now view   br dmt as a really good beginner s dmt experience  the come up was extremely similar to the real deal  albeit a bit slower to hit     minute    all encompassing humming  inability to move  and a strong sensation of being blasted forward at high speed were all there  but with less intensity than dmt  

the visuals were also much weaker  but still very interesting  rather than crazy  living fractals trying to beam information into my brain  what i experienced was a very warm  welcoming and comfortable set of green and blue  meshes   slowly dancing and intertwining in an extremely beautiful way  i cried for the first time on a psychedelic  if that means anything  

the body load was also similar to dmt  but in my opinion even more amazing   complete euphoria and a full body fuzziness buzzing that left me feeling more comfortable than i ve ever felt before in my life 

and  the final similarity   the trip only lasted about ten minutes  i snapped out of it feeling totally sober  tears streaming down my face 

the only downside i noticed was an unpleasant burning stinging on my lips where they had contacted the vape s mouthpiece  that bit is odd  and something i ve never had happen with other tryptamines  in any case  still totally worth it though 

tl dr    bromo dmt is like baby s first dmt trip  relatively mild by comparison  but amazing when it comes to body load  euphoria  and a general sense of oneness with everything  highly  highly recommend

text:
yes  it used to be way better and it’s obvious that it’s being made sloppier like it’s watered down compared to a year ago or more    snorting it or shoving it up your ass will fuck you up  starting with annoying creeping up crossed eyes and that classic robo reflux feeling and last a while  but it feels like it makes you stupid and untuned imo    when it’s vaped it is much better  it reminds me of what i imagined weed is like as a kid   first off it feels great almost instantly and it’s fun to do  i like using a hot nail in a dab rig or smoking it out of a crack pipe   hold the lighter far away and don’t burn it  very important  it takes low heat and is usually best of you crush it up finely  taking your time to find with right temperature and air flow   as there is a small window or learning curve figuring out it’s sweet spot  but  it’s also very forgiving and rewarding right away   
   like i read anyone else doing  i snorted it and pretty much hated it at first  thinking that feeling was gross and delapitated   then i tried smoking it    wow   if you are prone to addiction you may want to avoid using it because it can give you an inaccurate sense of confidence  mania and will most likely embarrass you in front of people when you forget to act like a “human”   but as long as you take portioned deliberate hits and pace yourself it’s a very functional uplifting experience  after a few months of using a small bong with various dab setups and going through it fast  i found the best way to use it is small little wacky out of a dug out bat or any little straight pipe with the stuff melted onto some metal scrubber chore boy    don’t use direct flame or you will burn it  hold the flame a small distance away from it and use the hot air to vaporise it and hold your breath  yippy  momothafugginskippy

text:
i may not have been involved in this subreddit as long as many of you have  but i respect what the rules and principles this community has in regards to conducting research  this community has a lot of caring people who take time to help other people  which is awesome 

i am not going to lie and say i ve followed harm reduction religiously in my own time  but i try to convey to anyone asking for advice or input within the community just how important it is to be safe and ensure they are doing harm reduction 

so  i want to address and maybe start a dialogue about the amount of blatantly bad advice being given within some recent posts  and the attitude some people have  if you re not part of the solution  you re part of the problem  and i don t think that s why this place exists  

given the situation our society has with an opioid epidemic  i believe this community has shown itself to be a something more than junkies arguing over xr it ir oxycontin  i have lost very important people to me  as i m sure many others here have as well  having this resource has helped a lot of people make better choices and i d like to see it continue to 

and so when i am confronted by what is clearly misinformed or dangerous ideas in these  threads or posts  i draw the conclusion that there are a lot of people who don t know a thing about safe research  i take personal offense  but more importantly i fear these personalities are going to have their say  and their advice fucks someone up or worse  

any thoughts on this

text:
i grew up in a very small town in a remote part of southwest florida  where the majority of the population is geriatric  i had zero friends in high school that shared my intense curiosity with obscure drugs  and basically spent every weekend reading erowid trip reports and wishing i was somewhere else  i started writing logs of my experiences with different rc’s that i’d order online  as it was impossible to find anything in my lame hometown  i got some satisfaction out of this  but in the back of my mind was always wishing i had people to take these journeys with   when i finally got through the drudgery of high school  i went to college as far away as i could  settling at seattle university  i hoped that this would lead me to meet more likeminded people 

over the course of freshman year  i met a few people who were into the rave scene a bit  but had a much harder time finding the type of drug nerds i’d hoped to  i didn’t have much of a connection with these people when we weren’t rolling or tripping and still spent the majority of my time in my dorm reading erowid  i had a really hard time clicking with them on more than a surface level  as our interactions lacked quite a bit when it didn’t have to do with finding the next party  they were really into getting fucked up  but never really wanted to reflect on or analyze the experience  

i guess it’s just frustrating because i feel like i could connect a lot with people i read about online  but in real life it’s never really measured up  i don’t mean to sound pretentious  it’s just how i feel  now i’m   and work   hrs a week and don’t have nearly as much time for my experiments that i used to  a lot of times i feel lonely and like i missed out  anyone else feel similar

list of dissos i tried  dck       meo pcp    ho pcp  ephenidine  diphenidin  nitrous  mxp  o pce  ketamin  in the hospital iv 

i ordered some   from my vendor and when it arrived it was in a baggi that wasn t fromy vendor  some people are saying there are impurities in this batch and because it s a different baggi it s probably all   batch until now

i upped the dosage until i was at about   and it was one of it not the most pleasant disso experience imaginable  it lastet for about   seems to have similar duration to ketamin  

this is fucking amazing  i finally understand the mxe fetishization thats been going on for forever  it really is the holly grail of dissos  i can t really describe the feeling better than the heroin of dissos  it s such a unique warmth it s amazing 

so if you were thinking of trying it do it  it s amazing  just a bit weak idk if this will change with batches but it s worth it either way  get some ✌️

text:
as some of you guys might know i‘ve been looking for ways around the german   ban for a while now 

while researching david e  nichols work lately and being amazed by the aminoindane analogues he discovered   i found „indanorex“ at first i thought it was going to be like aminorex  at least vaguely   but i was wrong 

its a stimulant type appetite suppressant like aminorex  however with a distinctive lack of a   base  or even any „aromatic ethylamine“ base for that matter 

i have not yet looked into the effects that much because there‘s not that much   but i‘ll do that now  just wanted to share this now  it seems like maybe variations of that base could be marketed as new stims  a new base structure also means a possible way out of all the nasty side effects some of the legal non empathogenic stims nowadays have  the popular ones   possibly opening a gate into new lands with their own type of a   like substance and with a new incentive for producers to make this  because it would open a recently closed market widely 

im specifically interested in   methyl    n dimethyl and a     analogue aswell as maybe some single fluorinated ones

text:
hi   so i posted this as a comment to another post here  but realised i wrote a lot so thought it might be worth posting separately as a sort of visual trip report too   i am wondering if nboh could provide a similar experience without the horrific bodyload and potential danger  or if we do not know enough of it to judge this yet   any more questions about nbome experiences in myself or others are welcome   

   nbome had the most insane visuals of anything i ve ever used   i took   tabs of an unknown dose believing it was acid   i don t know how people confuse them   i wasn t hugely experienced with trips at the time  and could tell within   mins it was too aggressive to be acid   lots of it was going around then in my scene but i haven t seen it for a while now  

🔅 whirling  nauseating geometry  everything was spinning   shaking but i was acting mostly normal and able to converse with neighbours  act sober etc   i have snorted        and that is the closest type of visual i ve had to these   although  i don t remember the shape elongation   trails of   in nbome


🔅 everything seemed to be shaking with multiple red   blue lines which intertwined into purple   anecdotally one person said this triggered temporary psychosis in themselves  as the red   blue resembled police lights   they ran around naked and threw rubbish at their girlfriend to  dispose of the drugs    poor girl 🤣


🔅 trees were beautiful   far more so than any other compound i ve used   instead of seeing simply a crown of leaves moving in the wind  i saw each singular leaf separately  furling and unfurling  turning green  yellow  orange and purple   this stayed long after the trip   trees are still more beautiful now  but i remember a panic attack a week after the trip because the trees had all stayed like this and it was so much information to take in at once  i m autistic    i learned to appreciate it though   i didn t have a choice  as was training to be a tree surgeon at the time  


🔅 just generally insanely aggressive geometry but rarely anything sacred  flower or mandala like as i d expect with lysergamides 


🔅 my ex boyfriend was sitting on a coffee table in front of a wall   there were no visuals on him whatsoever  looked totally normal   but the wall behind him looked like it was drawn in thick pen in microsoft paint


🔅 the room i was in looked oval  rather than rectangular  with very curved corners  my ex jokingly said   why don t you change it then     i went into a visual sort of form of sims blueprint mode and picked up the wall and  moved  it   very hard to explain

🔅 crazy  brain movies  a little like very high mdma doses  the most prominent one is when i remember my ex mentioning john wayne and i started watching a cowboys vs aliens scene

🔅 bizarrely  i blacked out somewhere along the line   i remember sitting on my sofa  a sensation similar to ego death but not as intense  blackness  falling   becoming nothing  or an atom etc    yet i was apparently coherent for hours afterwards and into sleep  had sex etc   i don t mind the sex or anything as my friend had come to help my boyfriend look after me when i realised it was nbome  and all vouch i was still totally coherent and more  normal  than before   i just remember waking up   huge memory blank

just overall visual fuckery  pretty cool at the time though massively confusing and occasionally delirious   accompanying bodyload was fucking horrific and headspace amphetamine like and mildly dissociative  analytical and casually paranoid in a way which is hard to describe   fortunately  the trip seemed quite short   maybe     hours compared to a solid   i get from lsd 

it s worth noting that due to horrid muscle cramps  tremors  falling over from my legs locking and anxiety over my heart rate etc  i took some pregabalin and ended up smoking weed around the   hour mark 

the weed might sound counterintuitive but i was a heavy smoker at the time and it was always anti anxiety   the nbome was so strong that i couldn t even feel the effects of the weed  but what i found interesting is it made smoking giant bongs completely painless and easy with zero cough or soreness   the pregabalin did nothing to change the trip  but did reduce my bodyload which in turn reduced my anxiety   i suspect weed may have helped with bodyload also

text: ive been very curious about odsmt for a while  as it seems to be the only rc in its class without horrible side effects and isnt dangerously potent  the big question i have is  is it safe to use with an snri ssri  i currently use an snri and have seen many conflicting reports on whether or not to stay away or not  ive never heard of any problems but more so warnings about it  ive also read since its different than tramadol it doesnt act on serotonin receptors and if it does  its negligible at best  any info would be greatly appreciated   💪

if you are  don t buy from him  h is shady  stupid  deliberately thieving from people  or a combination of the above 

spent over     with this asshole last saturday printed tracking said it would go out that day nothing by monday fine time and nothing by monday fine  nothing by wednesday  i m a little concerned  nothing by thursday  little bit concerned still  


friday morning i wake up to the vendor telling me he s just going to reship new packs using the same exact printed tracking labels and numbers that he used to the day before  i asked if he could use a new label for mine and offered to pay for it but he didn t want to spend the money period he would rather risk having multiple packages in transit sharing the same tracking number and possibly having one of them be discarded or set aside or destroyed as a duplicate shipment   

the labels that never got scanned and didn t work properly for whatever reason  i tell him i d like a refund if he s not going to be using new tracking  any proceeds to tell me that i m telling him how to do his job and that i know what i m doing and that i should just basically bud the fuck out so fuck this guy period now he s holding my money and my product hostage  i get the boxing isn t cool and i would never rat someone else out  but if this motherfucker doesn t give me my couple hundred dollars here soon getting doxxed going to be the least of his worries  i m not planning on doxing  but information does just get left laying around sometimes and people come across that information and i can t stop what they do with it 

just know it s just little fuckers reddit username was so i could tag his bitch ass on here 

i would never involve leo of somebody i ve never    this is not a store this is a user s name  it s the title of a bin and it is not a vendor source  please do not remove

text:
this abomination was too long to post even after having been cut in half  so clearly i ve identified this as the most inappropriate place to abandon it

 amp    

 tldr  word salad  too long and sadly repetitive  here s my non sequitur of an excuse   great nuance is required in order to accomplish that which you seek 

 

holy crap  i m a fanatical lurker  would never allow myself to post here in any conceivable scenario  but apparently ephinidine is making me type type type maniacally and far too verbosely  about things that literally can t be discussed  when really i was just hoping to get stuffed into a dreamy dimension for a while  instead i came down with a case of this delusion that i could actually contribute something other than nauseatingly useless prose to your perennial question for the ages  by elucidating occult strategies for transmutation of the seemingly difficult  loathsome  and mundane into the pleasantly trivial via sleight of mind and a strategy of targeting drug therapies for optimizing plasticity and then modifying your work related attitudes and behaviors to make them more effective and enjoyable in any state of mind rather than attempting to generate and maintain the theoretical  perfect drug state to become dependent on for winning at all school work when there s actually probably various sets of drugs optimal for different parts of what you are lumping together as assignments and school work  maybe 

 amp    

super sorry about posting here at all  it really wasn t part of the plan 

 amp    

sounds like you re in an academic setting so i don t have nice prepackaged answers since i m many decades out of school  and never was college material   but what i would suggest is that there probably isn t one thing that solves all those scenarios the way we would like there to be   the situation calls for a more nuanced approach   secret weapon   you need a diverse and strategic arsenal 

 amp    

ok  so we have a loosely controllable  neurochemical means of modulating state  motivated  not motivated  etc   but it s ephemeral  imprecise  and terribly subject to the law of diminishing returns  receptor down regulation  drug tolerance  ever lessening dopaminergic responses to repeated input  

 amp    

so  anything that works really well is probably not going to continue working that well for long enough to be your secret weapon   you ll probably get some amazing results but they ll be unpredictable  or relatively short lived  or useful but ultimately imaginary  or have side effects the management of which could grow more troublesome than beneficial 

 amp    

i was schooled about this by some brilliant steroid freak on a forgotten forum  thanks man  also thanks for providing noopept  and a weird brown research ampakine that gave me diarrhea  so very long ago  

 amp    

when i asked one too many times about which drugs i could take to make myself smarter  what a compelling  yet ultimately mistaken question to have obsessed over for so long   i got a perfectly unfriendly  yet perfectly concise response that beautifully summed up what i was missing 

 amp    

he pointed out that all this neurochemistry stuff is just part of the transport layer  infrastructure underlying brain structures that are grown by your behaviors  not the drugs you take   so  while it s very difficult to get a perfect drug for motivated studying  it s actually far easier to use drugs to help you retrain your study habits to include an enjoyable attitude and effective set of behaviors 

 amp    

and  i m happy to say  all that pseudoscience in pop psychology about  state dependent learning  is worthless nonsense applicable only to trivia   if you kindle an emotion  or learn how to do something  in a drug heightened state  you re still going fucking know how to do it when you re sober   the emotion can still be conjured  unless  of course  you re all set up to expect evidence of that disempowering false dichotomy 

 amp    

if you behave like people normally do around drugs  you re implicitly using your natural plasticity to shape a bunch of maladaptive habits you re likely going to be completely blind to  ceding your autonomy of internal state to dependence on external conditions

 amp    

 i need drug a to experience positive state b  i need drug c to avoid negative state d  if only i had drug f i could accomplish task g  sober is nothing compared to drug h  it s ok for me to act like a little shit because i m coming down off i  the delusion of being subject to intolerable states   unlike life  chasing the dragon clearly is about the destination rather than the journey   in a journey you can always think about and modify the parameters of your travel  a destination  however is just a static end point  

 amp    

all that seems insurmountable while you re in its depths  but the critical missing part of the equation is plasticity  not as an abstract principle of learning  but as another factor which can be modulated   jack up your plasticity with some heavy duty neurotrophics during extreme states like speed fueled hallucinatory sleep deprived paranoia  or while way out on psychedelics  and observe how much of the experience you can pull into your normal waking consciousness  how much can be made to linger after the molecules have left your receptors   hppd isn t a disorder  it s a sliding scale of homeostatic consciousness shaped towards or away from baseline due to neural plasticity  demonstrating the capacity for our very selves to be shaped as we wish 

 amp    

take some neurotrophics and do super boring mundane stuff to reshape towards normal  or go the other way and see how experientially real you can make your best worst hallucinations   hearing voices  don t fear your demons  mastery comes through their reification and domination under will and perception  just remember you can always remold yourself  escaping to baseline thanks to the wonders of plasticity and a whole world full of mundane dullards eager to help drag you down to their level 

 amp    

pretty much every single thing i ve ever heard chalked up to drug related brain damage falls totally within the range of normal human plasticity    mptp induced parkinsonism being the major exception i can think of offhand  obviously there s other cases related to super heavy use of obviously dangerous things  a love for drinking while smoking crack  alleged olney s lesions from dissos  or irreversible conditions such as wernicke korsakoff from chronic thiamine deficiency  but i m focusing on the sort of behavioral stuff you see mostly functional druggies refer to as brain damage in their forum posts  

 amp    

people can modulate their way out of all sorts of conditions they think are immutable  behaviors  personality traits  or mental inefficiencies   problem is  nobody ever told most folks they could change all the parts they think of as themselves  not to mention societal baggage around being proud of yourself for who you are  wtf like why does clutching desperately to your randomly acquired set of personality traits get rewarded when we all literally have the technology at our fingertips to become anything we want   no  a bunch of those weird little quirks you think of as yourself are really just flaws holding you back from becoming a real human 

 amp    

so  keeping this in mind  let s look at the project of your education  or your job  or whatever  as a build pipeline  sorry bad joke  can t help it  i m a software engineer   this actually is inverted from any rationally useful human metaphor   are you the code  the repository  the pipeline  the infrastructure  or just a bundle of artifacts being shuffled from one stage to the next   

 amp    

er  hmm  you might even be an autonomous agent so let s not   

 amp    

but of course  we want to have a good time  while reaping all the benefits and none of the drawbacks  right  or you would have been asking your question in some lame self improvement forum instead of this glorious land where many have set their eyes on seductive treasures but few have claimed them without being burned and those who did haven t written much useful about their quests 

 amp    

some stuff might be good for absorbing new information but maybe it is better for reading but not so much for listening   maybe it s good for learning via discussion but not tracking tasks  or maybe great for brainstorming and group collaboration but not doing the actual work planned  or how about one that s great for foundational or busy work  but might really suck for everything else 

 amp    

yeah  that sounds annoying  i ve had some luck with the entourage effect  taking a large number of complimentary substances all in very low doses hoping for a generally positive synergy  that seems to have worked pretty well for me generally  but takes quite a bit of study  time investment  intuition  and maybe luck to actually get effects past the placebo range  however if it does outlast the placebo duration it should nicely lack side effects and the benefits are likely to persist  especially if you have multiple such stacks targeting multiple systems to cycle between 

 amp    

the best shit i ve ever found for motivated learning was the ultra   ddiet  likely similar are the other weird  nonpsychedelic tweetios  if you can find them  i think they qualify as genuine smart drugs like i imagined a drug that actually made you more intelligent would be like  before i was disillusioned by the grossly disappointing  but still very useful  subtleties in the world of nootropics    ddiet was incredible for integrative systems thinking mixed with spontaneously manifesting  deeply relevant synchronicity and full of clear lucidity   looks just like ice and you can smoke it like shards  we called it smokable clarity  but it doesn t energize you or keep you awake at all 

 amp    

some of the other tweetios have legends of being even better for accelerated learning   if you haven t seen it  be sure to check out  https   erowid org chemicals       shtml  https   erowid org chemicals     shtml  and i think hamilton morris had an article or something on that chemist so there may be further information available recently 

 amp    

maybe ariadne    d  fits but i m still undecided on this one alone or its sweet spot maintainability  but it sure seems to mix great with everything   it definitely has a solid antidepressant and motivating factor  approaching what i think is a neat sort of feeling of naturally wanting to do the things that you know you need to do but have been procrastinating  which feels more optimal than a driving  forced motivation    i ve also gotten that feeling from super low dose n methyl cyclazodone augmenting   mbc but that s clearly a short term result  however  back to the idea of using neurotrophics to augment your baseline attitude and motivation rather than directly generating the motivated state you seek via drugs    mbc has been nothing short of miraculously transformative for me  in a way that really lasts but it s one you want to use very sparingly to conserve that power for future regenerative sessions  assuming you re also the sort to instinctively dive right back into the stimulant drug abuse just as soon as you ve finished revirginizing your dopaminergic system    

 amp    

haven t tried yet but maybe ariadne plus a microdose of bod because the latter s cognitive effects are profound  makes normally lackadaisical me feel like a saintly psychopathic exec with boundless motivation  diplomatic capacity  the ability to see creative solutions in everything  and a willingness to destroy     not sure yet if that can be directly translated into productivity outside the mythical realms but it is most noteworthy  uniquely deep in its mental enhancement 

 amp    

i d generally say good old meth  but that only really provides the mental and physical energy to endure  itself priceless  plus that warm dopaminergic goodness  can layer on anything easily  once the norepinephrine effects become invisible  speed is a guaranteed set and setting hack to create an optimally positive experience for any psychedelic i ve tried since    however  rather than providing actually consistent motivation to do what you actually should be doing  instead it trends towards pushing what you want to do or whatever random thing seems weirdly important at the moment  if you ever lose that dopaminergic goodness  try some accelerated brain rejuvenation strategies to be reborn with a fresh tolerance like you ve never before hit a speed pipe

 amp    

 amp    

only real problem there is i might have the energy  but if i m not motivated to do whatever  speed sure as hell won t make me any more motivated to do it 

the trick for all these is attempting to always remain cognizant of the fact that neurotransmitters are just like the transport layer of a network  merely supporting the operations that make up the complex  synchronized firing of clusters of neurons which are gaining structure as they do their thing  just use the chemical stimulation to give you the extra energy and stamina which should be spent exercising the capacities you want  growing the associated neural circuits    those circuits and their associated behaviors will still be there after the chemical augmentation has subsided   that s right  you can skip all the humdrum nonsense of life by tricking yourself into enjoying the unenjoyable on drugs  and crystalizing the habit with some neurotrophics such as dihexa or    and end up with a programmed trait of habitually enjoying the previously boring or unpleasant things that everyone around you struggles with  easily generating boundless positivity and value in anything you do   after the drugs are long gone 

 amp    

the concept of state dependent learning is trivial bullshit that completely obfuscates these optimal strategies for leveraging drugs to mold your mind into a habitual defeater of anything that might block your path towards learning faster  enjoying more deeply  and accomplishing your great work however you define it 

 amp    

serious dedication to impartial self observation along with an unwavering commitment to honesty  transparency  and integrity before all things  in addition to a razor sharp critical faculty  are called for  if one is keen to avoid giving themselves a monstrous makeover 

 amp    

less exciting but more long term effective strategies for me are bespoke combinations of some   d  or maybe substitute an ampakine occasionally   dopaminergic system modulators like bromantane  plus supporting actors  luteolin  tryosine  uridine  sulbutiamine  alcar  citocholine  omega  boosted with the subtly impressive activity enhancer ppap  all combined with alternating days of neurotrophics   low dose nsi      mbc  alternating a couple times then stretching out to only every third day  to once weekly  to once monthly  then done for this rejuvenation phase  fortified by my own personal brand of radical behavioral therapy  this serious introvert  walking around and literally forcing myself to make eye contact  smile  and give a friendly greeting to every single person i pass  absolutely no exceptions allowed  i also find myself actually enjoying picking up litter while walking around the city greeting everyone ridiculously  how fucked it that   

 amp    

this sort of shit sounds lame but every time it has me rapidly bouncing back from long term daily speedfreaking into hyper productive  energetic  joyful states that hybridize the best of both sober and amped mindsets and make all of the challenging parts of a professional engineering career feel easy and fun no matter what challenge comes my way 

 amp    

once again  deepest apologies for spewing this trash  i was literally unable to stop

 amp    

you are all my beloved heroes of the glorious rc renaissance

text:
since there are surprisingly little low dose   ho pcp experience reports out there  i decided to give it a go today and keep you posted while i go  i will edit this post as the time progresses

information on me 
height          
weight       
age   
sex  male

currently i have no tolerance to dissos or any other chemical and am not on any medication  besides   ho met microdosing  which has completely worn off by now  
i am not a big fan of dissos  but enjoy some of them  mostly o pce and dxm  on occasion  i tried multiple other pcp and ketamine analogues  but did not do them more than a handful of times  

t      i weighted out     ho pcp  calibrated medical scale  and insufflated it through my trusted snorting iron 

t      first effects i started to notice  clammy handy  increased heartbeat and some  heavyness  to my vision  when i look somewhere it has something like   lag   i take my usual pre drug dump and type that out  even though it was so little substance     i can taste the usual pcp analogue drip 

t      feeling a little increased motivation  hence this post   heart rate is normal again  hands and feet feel still cold  my vision is still a bit laggy  but at the same time somewhat increased  everything looks sharper  like on a microdose lsd   gonna play some gta now

text: so i decided to pick up a gram of sl   because i’ve always wanted to try quaaludes  so i read everything i could on the dosage   and apparently the dosage is   mg for a light dose    for medium   and    for a strong dose   so i scaled up   mg and put it in a capsule and ate it before dinner  i sort of started feeling it after roughly   minutes  but then i passed out randomly before i could really get the feel for the buzz  the next day i decided to double up on the dosage   i took     so i’ve read that it potentially makes you feel kind of like your going to have a seizure  and not to take it if your prone to seizures  i’ve never been prone to seizures  and i thought i could handle it   so i started really feeling it after   minutes  i sort of had a body buzz  not as much as i was expecting  no euphoria  i kind of felt awake   but i could fall asleep if i wanted too  but then i started shaking   like really bad   like i tried to take a bong toke and i was almost dropping it   i couldn’t hold anything   i sat on my bed and was moving my legs and shaking   it kind of felt good to just let yourself shake   i didn’t feel in danger at any point   like i was high but not really high  i decided to just fall asleep because the shaking was annoying me   and i woke up at   am to get up for work   i still was shaking   not as bad as before   but i still was shaking uncontrollably  i showered   and had a coffee   and i really wanted to go to work   but i was shaking too much   like i couldn’t even type anything on my phone   it locked twice because i couldn’t put in the password  so i stayed home   fell asleep and woke up at noon  and i still felt it   not as bad   but i still felt it   and now it’s   and i still sort of feel it   just a tiny bit  sorry if i’m not being very descriptive of my experience  i’m just baked lol  but i’m not taking any more of this chem   it’s not what i’m looking for

text:
prior experience     a single     test of   ho pcp   days prior  limited effects observed  no prior dissociative experience other than a second plateau dxm trip close to   years ago  very experienced with lysergamides and somewhat experienced with tryptamines phenethylamines 
                        
   set and setting     a relaxing friday night with nothing to do  i smoked some cannabis approximately   hours before ingesting my dose of   ho pcp and at approximately the one hour mark  i am a habitual cannabis smoker  and enjoy seeing how it combines with lower doses of other compounds

                         

t       measured     of pg solution to acquire            of   ho pcp  i combined it with water and intend to ingest it slowly over the course of   hour

t       first alerts  it almost feels like i have drank a cup of green tea  going to play a small amount of oldschool runescape to keep my mind a bit busy while i try to parse out what i am feeling 

t       approximately   ingested so far  effects are still subtle but i feel much more awake and  detached  from my usual thoughts  my vision feels slightly enhanced 

t       finished solution  heart rate feels heavily increased  but a check revealed that i am sitting at   with a blood pressure of      well within acceptable ranges  as a note  my resting heart rate is    for context and my blood pressure      

t       i am not sure i understand this drug  i feel more stimulated than anything  and it is oddly making me aroused  perhaps a remnant from the old stim wank sessions of years past

t       decided to prepare a very small bowl of cannabis in my vaporizer        nothing about this experience seems like it wouldn t pair well with cannabis     this would later be a critical mistake   

t       cannabis ingested  wow my body feels great  fingers and toes slightly tingling  and it is like i am in a warm blanket  

  everything from this point is post experience writing  

t        i felt my blood pressure drop slightly and my hr increase  this is typically expected with cannabis for me  however  my brain did not accept this answer  surely something is wrong  the first pang of anxiety had hit  i became restless trying to fight the adrenergic signals firing in my brain  

t        my heart rate was    while sitting    the joys of anxiety  in an effort to feel better i try to make my activity level match my heart rate and go on a walk  the only trouble was i was slightly confused so getting the warmth required to venture outside was a challenge 

t        the walk was okay but i was mildly shivering and anxious the whole time  i got back to my apartment  removed my warmth gear  took my pulse  still     i don t know what it was about feeling my pulse but i instantly went into a panic attack  my heart rate skyrocketed to      at least that was the max before my phone could no longer parse it  i started thinking  maybe i measured my dose wrong    i had to have taken too much    i need to get someone to help me    fuck i will get covid if i get taken to an er   i was confused as to why i was feeling this way when i was originally so sure of my dosage 

t        i was still a bit confused and freaking the fuck out  i was about to reach out and call my remote sitter but had a single moment where i realized   this is a fucking panic attack from the weed  just lay down  start using your phone to monitor your heart rate  breath  and accept the anxiety for what it is   i laid down  grabbed a blanket  and did meditative breathing  

t        heart rate got back down to    holy fuck it felt so much better  

t        at some point i started watching avatar the last airbender  i was engrossed in the experience and it felt like i was reliving my childhood  my body felt warm  the chronic pain that i have had since i was a child wasn t noticeable  and my extremities felt slightly disconnected  still feeling stimulated  but my heart rate around this time was back down to around   with blood pressure at     

t       the effects are beginning to wane slightly  but i still felt fantastic  i warm up a small bowl of pasta  and enjoyed it  i didn t experience much if any food enhancement  but i wasn t expecting it from a dissociative anyways 

t       mostly back to baseline  i risked a small bowl of cannabis around this point with much more pleasurable effects than the first  felt oddly trippy  but no anxiety whatsoever  

looking back on this experience  i think it provides a cautionary tale for mixing substances one is unfamiliar with  i didn t expect the stimulation slight confusion of   ho pcp to compound so heavily with cannabis and was honestly taken by surprise halfway through the experience  had i not been well practiced in calming myself down through panic attacks on psychedelics  i might have had a much worse time  it is impossible to know what to expect when mixing with research chemicals  which is why being well versed with all chemicals you are taking by themselves is imperative for safety and mental well being 

i will be giving   ho pcp another shot around     however i will be leaving cannabis at the door this next time  i think this chemical is interesting enough and has enough effects of its own

text:
i accidentally took what was for me an unusually large dose of   aco dmt a few days ago  i had intended to take    which is for me usually adequate for a grounded trip  and instead took      a mind lapse confusing milligrams and centigrams 

it was certainly uncomfortable and disorienting during the come up and peak  but also quite beautiful and interesting  at points  i became acutely aware of the timing of all events  particularly motion and sound  and their time relation to one another  it was so clear that everything  every cough and fart and the meows of my cats  was occurring in relation to a cosmic rhythm  i kept trying to get off the rhythm and getting frustrated when i couldn t cause myself to act independent of it  i am still uncertain whether i was aware of some mystical cosmic pattern or simply linking together unrelated events based on a coincidental polyrhythmic fractal time relationship  probably both 

time was  of course  dilated to the point of total unrecognizability  in addition to observing the fractal polygonal fabric which seemed to make up the world around me  i experienced intense synesthesia  especially while listening to sweet trip s  velocity  design  comfort   which i now understand to be a conflation or cross processing of sensory input  — like loading an image file into audacity or an audio file into mspaint  i also experienced powerful spatial distortion  up becoming down  or x  amp  y axes swapping  which was often triggered by sounds and music — i have experienced this at lower doses but not so viscerally and actually   

i always experience severe memory loss on psychedelics  but especially so during this trip  i did recall a trip report in tihkal or pihkal in which alexander shulgin  i couldn t remember his name   recounted a drug induced experience of independence from consensus time  — he played a   minute piano piece and checked his clock afterwards and only two minutes had passed  — and considered the possibility of this in an unobserved quantum state  

i watched some off the air  which is such a wonderful show  it seemed to respond directly to my thoughts  reminding me that these drugs could not  break  me because nothing and nobody is broken  teaching me about patience and the importance of moving through fear and discomfort to reach love and peace 

after the peak  — which lasted about   hours — i was able to spend a number of hours perfectly content in the psychedelic  realm  talking with my girlfriend  listening to music  including some of my own  which was wonderful on drugs    drawing  etc  i came to this realization that the  perfect feeling   bliss    which seemed to me like a psychic opening up or unzipping  cannot be sustained or it becomes an irritant  so art and music must dance around it  moving through other feelings before returning to it 

i played point and click adventure games for a few hours then fell asleep at around    i don t really experience much afterglow anymore  as i use psychedelics regularly  but i did find that for the next few days i was more apt than usual to notice the z axis of dimensionality  this is something i have experienced after many trips 

i hope this was fun or interesting to read  would i recommend taking   of   aco dmt  not if you are not prepared for disorientation  discomfort  and amplified  bipolar emotionality during dilated time  i did gain empathy and patience from the trip  and i am glad i experienced it  but it was an exhausting  difficult  educational dose  not recreational or functional 

if anyone else would like to share their experiences with misdosing or with large doses of this substance  i would love to hear them   d

 lt   bly

text:
hey dudes and dudettes  
i ve recently ran into a bit of a predicament  and i was looking for some advice on a couple of chemicals i ve been looking at as of late 
a little while ago  ya boy decided to go all in on a gram of ketamine  i was quite new to the substance and ended up overestimating how addictive it could be for me  it was an amazing couple of experiences and easily one of my favorite drugs  however some family found my situation a bit concerning and asked me to stop  honestly  they were fair to ask that because i was using it pretty irresponsibly and was doing it three times a week or more  often forgoing important work i had to do in order to be enveloped in the sweet  calming sense of anesthesia 
long story short  i ended up getting rid of it as well as all the other illegal shit i had  a couple tabs of acid  as well as some shrooms  because i felt it was making my anxiety worse  and didn t really work as well on my snris  i m gonna be honest though  i have quite the penchant for novel substances and want something to get a lil wavy on  
so i was checking out my old  trusty vendor  and i came across a couple of substances within their natural products section  most of which i m gonna be honest i have no god damn clue what they are  particularly two caught my eye  magnolol and honokiol  the abstracts and descriptions of them are as follows 

 honokiol acts as a phospholipase inhibitor  thereby preventing tumor cell growth selectively  without affecting healthy cells   and inducing selective apoptosis  cell death  in carcinoma cells in vivo     
it also acts on the gaba receptors as a positive allosteric modulator  thus potentiating the effect of endogenous gaba in the human body  and also synergizing with other gabaergic drugs      it is particularly selective towards the gaba a receptor subtype  a known target for benzodiazepenes 
studies conducted on mice have also found that honokiol potentiates the effect of sodium pentobarbital      increasing its potency as a sedative and myorelaxant  honokiol also prolonged the sleeping time in mice injected with sodium pentobarbital  indicating that it interacts with gabaergics and thereby increases their potency  caution must be taken as these interactions can result in increased adverse effects 
 
in addition to this  while very mild  honokiol also weakly activates the cannabinoid receptors  offering potential medicinal benefits in the treatment of cancer  like cannabis      honokiol behaves as an mixed agonist antagonist  like cbd   with full agonist activity at the   receptor  and antagonistic activity at the   receptor  while honokiol has low potency as a cannabinoid  other related compounds  including naturally occurring phenols from magnolia  have demonstrated greater potency  or synergistic activity  magnolol  a closely related compound found also in magnolia root bark  behaves as a partial agonist at the   receptors  thus offering synergistic effects with honokiol  

and magnolol 
 magnolol  aka    ′ diallyl    ′ biphenyldiol  is a naturally occurring phenolic lignan isolated from the root bark of the magnolia officinalis tree  as well as other trees from the magnolia genus   it is closely related to honokiol and has similar potential medicinal health effects  

anyone have experience with either of these  they sound interesting  as a modulator of gaba and also mixed agonist antagonists of the cannabinoid receptor  they sound like good compounds to maybe mix with cannabis to change the experience  i d imagine maybe a slight feeling of sedation  calm  and maybe anxiety reduction as well as muscle relaxation  who knows  maybe they d be similar to kava in some way or another  though their pharamacologies aren t exactly the same  they have a tendency towards both receptors   

if any of y all have some recommendations for more  shall we say   benign  substances that would be appreciated  i m looking for something that isn t banned  benzodiazepines  arylcyclohexylamines  synthetic cannabinoids are a no go  as well as something that could be calming or sedating  it doesn t have to be  but that would be nice  something that would mix nice with some edibles  or a good smoke would be great as that s still something i indulge in quite readily  thanks a ton y all  i look forward to some experience reports on the aforementioned substances and some suggestions as well 

  harls

text:
update from this thread  https   www reddit com r researchchemicals comments      

i took   mushrooms       aco dmt this past monday with a close friend  i have tried a few light doses of mushrooms and   aco dmt before  but nothing this deep  we took it all at noon  and timed our doses so the mushrooms and the   aco dmt came up together  and within an hour we were giggling on the kitchen floor  ranting and raving about all kinds of things  we just kept laughing and messing with each other and talking and talking  it was a blast  i felt really small while i was sitting on the floor for a short while which was really weird 

my friends trip got a little intense and he went to lie down  and i went for a short walk  everything looked so vibrant and alive and beautiful  i had to just sit down and take it all in  when i came back inside to check on my friend  he told me h had some crazy dmt like cevs and had a sighting of a jester while i was outside 

i laid down on the couch opposite him and suddenly his face started morphing  his eyes were alternating in size and his mouth was changing too  then the couch started morphing with him and he and the couch started slowly breathing  all i could do was laugh at how fun and crazy it was 

we went into the kitchen and made some chicken wings and had some delicious beer and chocolates  i ve never read about taste hallucinations  but one of the chocolates he gave me came across really spicy  he insisted there was no capsaicin in the chocolate 

we took his dog for a walk and watched the sun set which was incredibly beautiful  as we were really starting to come down  we sat out on his front steps and caught a satellite flying by in the night sky  as the satellite passed overhead  a shooting star flashed past in the same part of the sky  we both had a super satisfying day  the streetlights and lights from the houses in the neighborhood were brilliant starbursts 

thanks to this tiny awesome reddit community for being such a great resource  wanted to share my experience with you all  it s a shame that tolerance keeps us from experiencing things like this more than once a month  because it s so special  all in all  i want to go back  it was one of the most silly  fun days ever  and i will never ever forget it

text:
ok  i’m not a science person  so i’m asking for help to understand something  i keep reading about this molecule called    it’s been tested for all kinds of diseases  including stroke  heart attack  sepsis  and a bunch of cancers  most recently  it was wiping out    of human pancreatic cells in mice xenografts  

now i do know it’s a big jump from mice to people  but every new drug has to make the jump at some point  right        has been around since the early    and i have found some studies done with pigs  that’s a step up  right    from what i gathered  the molecule did great with the pigs too 

as a layperson  all i can say is that i’m looking at a bunch of articles that look really scientific  many even peer reviewed   and they all sound really promising  for a bunch of different diseases  it did great with the pigs too  

my question is  why haven’t there been any human trial for this molecule   we’ve had   years of really promising data  but it never goes anywhere  what am i not understanding here    

 note  my main interest is with regard to pancreatic cancer  the prognosis is very poor  and there are so few treatment options  i just don’t understand why drugs like this one aren’t being fast tracked into human trials  how risky can it be when the alternative is certain death

text:
hello i have been recently slowly diving into pharmacology and as i remember a day somebody said here that mda was peculiar chem because it was a good entactogen  a good stimulant and a decent psychedelic at the same time 

looking to the binding affinities of mda is super interesting and i just immediately searched  mda analogues  here  and i have seen that     apb are pretended to be mda analogues   
i have tried both   and   apb  with more extensive and preferred experiences with   apb  and remember that i have described   apb like more  funky  and  erotic  than mdma  something that can be related to an action on dopamine    and also that it was a bit more trippy  colors  music enhancement  headspace  than mdma but without being at all close to a what i could call a psychedelic effect 

but   apb act like a serotonin dopamine norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor while mda act like a serotonin dopamine norepinephrine releasing agent  both being     agonists  so the question is  does   apb effects are comparable to those of mda  especially the said good stimulant  amp  decent psychedelic side of this one  and if no is there other known rcs that act in the same way than mda  

i have seen mdoh which is described to be pretty similar to mda in terms of action and which shulgin nice description seems enough to point interest 

i apologize if i am just doing bro science or bringing untruths or anything  just here to advance an interest and create some emulation around the question 

thanks to you all

text:
i ve done   ho met about     times or so in the past   months  it could be enjoyable  but i completely understood why people called it a tryptamine with training wheels  normally i m    functional on it  can hold a conversation  do anything i could do sober  but i might get some minor visuals and stuff here or there 

that all changed a couple days ago  my normal dose i d take was around      the experience was nice  but not anything to write home about  i was down to my last   in my bag and decided i might as well finish it off since i was bored  i poured it all onto the scale   a perfect    but here is where it got interesting  i noticed a bit of residual powder inside the bag that wouldn t come out from shaking it  so  i poured a bit of water in there  shook it around good to make sure it all got absorbed  and decided i may as well try plugging it this time instead of the normal oral because no way am i drinking this nasty shit 

holy shit  it normally hits me in about   hr  with   of feeling cold and shitty on the comeup  within   of plugging  im assuming roughly      i was in fucking outerspace  everything was morphing  changing shapes  distorting  i almost felt like i wasn t in reality anymore  in a good way  this lasted about   hour before it kind of mellowed out a bit and the high got a bit more normal  it was an amazing experience  something i had no idea   ho met could do  the best part is i felt    in control the entire time  at no point did i feel like i lost myself or couldn t control what was happening  

i know people here love   ho met  so if you re like me and have tried that   dosage range a few times and are in a good mindstate   push that dose up a little bit  you ll absolutely love it because it becomes an entirely different drug

text:
so yesterday i was with some friends for a small party and i had taken   fpm pretty much all day so we kept doing that  

at some point  a friend of mine was preparing some lines for everybody and firstly made one big bump    meant to be divided in   or    but i asked him if i could take the whole line to have a nice rush   

he thought i knew the chemicals was   d and told me  « wow  that is monstrous dude  take it if you want  i know you are used to snort big lines however this one is really bad »  i didn’t realize at all and took almost the entire thing        

after a few minutes i started to notice the pain was very long and hard compared to   fpm  and when i began to see small visuals i instantly asked him if it was   d  because i knew he had some   he understood i didn’t hear him ten minutes before  saying he would take out the psychedelic   

as a good friend he did the same bump and we landed in the couch  undergoing a heaaaavy come up for both of us  every second was an hour and the bodyload   visuals were almost hard to take  when the trip started to stabilize we were living our best life  really good atmosphere  pleasant bodyload  our field of view was filled with magnificent drawings and  imaginary  people dancing on the walls  the headspace was quite as if we were sober  i had never been in such a state  i tried lsd  al lad  salvia  methallylescaline and   d only orally before  

it lasted     and the trip was such amazing that we took another line and lived a totally different journey  faster  dancing and laughing   really cool 

conclusion  i saw a lot of people saying to avoid snorting   x’s at any cost but it was a tremendous experience  pretty different from the others hallucinogens i had tried  and the music made us speechless  penetrating every cell of our bodies

text:
i was depressed  borderline suicidal  a lot of shitty things had happened in my life in a very short time  most of which i would rather not talk about  i have a lot of previous experience with psychedelics which has helped me in life so very much  so naturally in this depressing period of my life the thought of taking some psilocybin or something to relieve anxiety and regain my drive to live happily came to my mind  but i figured it was a stupid idea considering how shit i was feeling mentally  i was very afraid i would just end up calling an ambulance or something because of how scary the trip would be  like one of those bad trip stories you can find on reddit sometimes 

so one night after yet another day full of crying my eyes out and thinking about killing myself i was just cleaning my room a bit  i found part of my drug stash and decided to sort it a bit better  i found my bag of   ho met powder  there was not a lot in it  i had never tried it but i knew it was like psilocybin but a lot more gentle  so my impulsive self destructive ass decided to just dip my finger in and stick it in my mouth  i have never tasted something that bitter and i ran downstairs to get some water  it looked like there wasn t much powder on my finger after i dipped it so i didn t expect much 

after a while i started noticing a pretty intense body high and i thought  shit this is it   so i jumped in my bed  put on some very nice music  switched all lights off and hoped for the best 

what followed was one of the most insane introspective experiences of my life  the trip itself wasn t even that intense  just some mild cevs  but all of a sudden in just a few minutes my entire way of thinking had changed so drastically i almost felt like another person  but it wasn t another person  it was me  the me before my life went to shit  all of a sudden i saw how all my self destructive actions were just so unnecessary  and all my negative thoughts felt so easy to just say no to  my negative feelings went from feeling like they were going to be the end of me to feeling like a bit of dust on my mental stability  easily cleaned off in a single wipe  it s about the best way i can describe it 

it s now been   days since this trip  i feel better than ever  everyday i come home with a smile on my face and i hug my mom  she feels very happy for me too 

i really have to say i absolutely advise against doing something like this if you feel depressed  every brain is different and mine happened to react like this  it s high risk  but also a high reward  it s insane what even a low dose of a gentle substance like this can do  i still can t fully believe it 

thank you for taking the time to read my story  i love you all  lt  

ps  i really think people should call it metocin  sounds a lot cooler

text:
just saw this paper and thought it d be of interest here

full text  https   sci hub st            

 gt  a group of   persons    male and   female   varying in age from   to   years  took part in an esoteric weekend seminar  entitled  seven springs—a journey through our energy system   in a small town near hamburg  in lower saxony  germany  the participants’ occupations were listed as alternative practitioners  medical doctors  and psychologists and included professions such as a hairdresser  yoga teacher  and an educator  on an early      p m   friday afternoon in september    the owner of the conference location heard unusual noises and felt obliged to investigate  there she found persons lying on the ground  shouting  and screaming  and immediately called the emergency services   
ambulance crews at the scene described finding seminar participants rolling on the ground and screaming  various partakers were unconscious or not responsive and exhibiting tachycardia  respiratory distress and pain  others experienced delusions while some were naked from the waist down lying on one another    one man reportedly attempted to tear his penis off    one person tried to self harm and harm others  another had to be restrained by five helpers in order to allow the doctor to sedate him    one person was crawling on all fours while barking like a dog  another man was heard shouting that he was dragon  a woman declared herself to be a feather while dancing and singing    several persons vomited  and some were barely able to speak  two persons showed life threatening conditions  generalized seizures   several patients were administered sedatives en route to hospital    the rescue teams suspected that consumption of drugs of abuse was the reason   for provoking the severe and acute symptoms  some   rescuers and   ambulance vehicles were involved in the treatment and rescue of the seminar participants  patients had to be distributed to six different nearby hospitals in lower saxony and hamburg for treatment  in what was considered to be a mass poisoning event  the documenting of each individual’s symptoms was neither feasible nor possible  the clinical doctors’ confidentiality obligation prevented the clinical data from being revealed  all persons recovered without lasting effects and were released from hospital within days

text:
have you ever taken a novel  new  psychedelic substance  are you looking for a way to pass the time while you re at home  consider taking part in our online survey 

what s the survey about  we are researchers at maastricht university  and are about to start a range of experimental trials with novel psychoactive drugs  but we are missing important information  these include things like dose  and experienced positive and negative effects 

so  as the scientific literature is lacking  we want to learn as much as possible from the nps using community  and are looking for people to tell us more about some of these substances 

if you meet this description  and would be interested in helping out  please follow the link for more information  as always  participation is completely voluntary  and any all information you give us is entirely anonymous 

 https   maastrichtuniversity eu qualtrics com jfe form sv    https   maastrichtuniversity eu qualtrics com jfe form   

and if you want to know more about us and what we do  you can find more information on our  website  https   psychopharmacologymaastricht com   or twitter     pimaastricht  https   twitter com pimaastricht lang en 

thank you 

this survey has been approved by the moderators    r researchchemicals  https   www reddit com r researchchemicals     r askdrugs  https   www reddit com r askdrugs
