text:
i know this is a slippery slope and takes a lot of self control  obviously  the best prevention method to getting yourself physically addicted is to not have the substance at all 

however  i am talking to the people that have the self constraint to only take substances on a schedule that doesn’t make them physically addicted  

for me  when i worked in an office  i had to have something to get through the boring day and deal with my coworkers bullshit  i reflect back in those days and think that i might have literally gone insane without my substance use  although the substances created other problems  i could at least function at work and not get fired and my entire life fall apart  

now  working from home  most of the stress and social anxiety from working in the office is gone  it seriously is a life saver for me  i no longer feel like i need something to get me through the day  yes  my work days are more boring but i have positive experiences to look forward to after signing off for the day  that being said  i really enjoy my saturdays taking a nice dose of o dsmt and just straight relaxing  doing nothing or using it as motivation to complete a chore i have been putting off  

tldr  used to need something to get through the work day kratom  adderall  coffee  rc amps benzo  etc     now working remotely i am mostly sober besides the weekly bi weekly odsmt trip 

anyone else share a similar experience

hi everyone 

i wanted to share with you the last exeprience i had on   fpm  and know if any of you had a similar experience  i ve never had these problems before  even though i have been using  amp  sometimes abusing this substance for the last   years 

  weeks ago  i ordered   of   fpm from my usual  amp  trusted source  i did use the gram in a period of   hours maximum  with maybe   hours of sleep 

gradually  i started to feel l itchy  my skin began to turn red on several areas of my body for no apparent reason  it felt like i had a bad allergy even though i know i m not supposed to be allergic to this substance 

i also had some really nasty muscular pain in both my arms  and only my arms  

i know that there are some reported cases of vasculitis in regards to   fpm usage  but normally this condition is much more serious than just itching  amp  muscular pain 

all these problems disappeared within a few hours  with a little sleep 

what do you think it was  

please take care everyone  and stay safe

text:
hey guys 

i was just going over the difference between   aco dmt and shrooms  and i found that the reports on the former compound are far from my personal experiences with it at   and   respectively  and the same seems to be true for my friend who tripped with me at the same doses 

the reason i m going over this is because i actually have more experience with   aco than actual mushrooms due to a failed lemon tek and the resulting lack of desire to try mushrooms again    anyway  i m interested to hear about any personal anecdotes you may have with regards to both substances with more emphasis on   aco 

to be specific  i ve had primarily dark  unsettling  introspection heavy  not really much else  experiences with what is often described as being a lighter  less serious compound   gentle is the operative term that people like to use   with more color and visuals 

in my experience even at     of the substance in question i was unable to perceive more than an extremely light overlay of visuals that were essentially on the precipice of perception  teetering back and forth between being visible and not 

i guess what i m saying is  i think all the reports are blown out of proportion and a lot of what was experienced is imagined rather than perceived 

having said that  i m well aware of the fact that these substances metabolize and proliferate their effects within the mind and body differently for just about everybody  but this is a case where i m taking my small pool of personal and adjacent experience and comparing it against other similarly lacking sample sizes    which is what lead me here    

so for those of you that feel like sharing  please do and be as descriptive  or not  as you like  even a short list of subjective effects you ve experienced would be awesome 

thanks

text:
hi all  i ve comboed this once before  i wrote about it  here  https   www reddit com r researchchemicals comments epzesx     


last night i did the same again  except with    of   meo and roughly   lsd  so it was more of a disso heavy experience  last time the psychedelia was a bit stronger and all encompassing  i could still walk and such this time around but it was very bizzare  with all senses blending and being amplified to a huge degree 


anyone that s combined   with lsd before will  know what i mean  https   i redd it   jpg  when i say it s like that  but prolonged  like     solid hours of death and rebirth where everything is a fractal  everything becomes very abstract  with full on synaesthesia  


it s been about   hours since i did my doses  and around   hours in this is what i had to say about it 


beautiful psychedelic dissociation  not for the faint of heart  it s like swimming in the realm of all  where everything is a fractal over and over until infinity  very very lucid  very similar to what   and acid is like  but drawn out over hours  there s no other combo quite like it  the lucid  long lasting nature of   is a perfect counterpart to the ego dissolving aspect of lsd and all the sensory effects blend together very harmoniously  like the entire universe is singing in harmony through me  which is not really me but all  and yeah i ve lost my train of thought and that s very much how it goes 


and yes that s pretty much how it went  i learned a lot about myself and human nature in general during this experience  it was very revelatory   i could elaborate but it s so abstract it s hard to put into words 


anyway i thought this might be of use to anyone else who is interested in the unique   enlightenment  style combination of psychedelics and dissociatives  i must say you have to have a really hard head on your shoulders to cop this combination and come out unscathed  it will very much test the limits of your sanity  i know myself and my substances doses well enough to predict roughly what the experience will be like  but to anyone considering these sorts of combinations  tread very  very lightly 


i love you  all you beautiful little expressions of the large fractal we call everything  thanks for reading

text:
decided to test this one out  for no particular reason  or maybe in order to gain some distance from myself  did one small line  felt lightly dissoed out  and then did one huge line more  it was almost as if i had no choice   
every single time i do dissos  i have this strange feeling that somehow this had to happen  like it was out of my control  determined  i laid down under   blankets and watched as my world collapsed  every abstract notion was scrambled  me  myself  time  reality  senses  perception  i fell into the hole 

the hole is that place where i only hear that weird whirring sound  all senses are combined into one  the hole was cozy  warmer than ket  i had glimpses of warm  red color  insights were not forced  i was thinking a lot  but this time somehow it seemed totally meaningless to think about abstractions  life  death  unity  i was just thinking about myself as a person  need to have more connections  it is not needed to think so much  reach down and feel more   
i could visualize some aspects of personality  like fleeting red blots  i could see myself returning to myself  i decided to be more of myself  me  and not some meaningless nothing  

felt oddly refreshed  reset afterwards  maybe it is good for depression   
cool novel disso  overall

text:
hi  this  could be  the start to a series where i will be reviewing drugs based on their usability for competitive gaming  

i m stimulant naive  having only previously tried small amounts of coke  ritalin and speed  lately i ve been on a mission to find the best stimulant for competitive gaming  my game of choice is apex legends as someone who loves movement and shooters  

 please note ymmv  

   

  day     

i probably railed close to   over the course of   hours my first night trying this compound  i was very focused and surprisingly calm throughout  my calls to my team were clear  concise and not too loud  a trap i tend to fall in during intense games   

i was able to stay very calm in intense situations  quickly swapping armours and looting while running and even finding the restraint to sometimes stop spraying when i could see wasn t going to kill my opponent to finish him with the rest of my mag and renewed aim  

i remained focused and performed very consistently  top          damage a game   which is unusual for me as sometimes my nerves will get the best of me as matches build in intensity  there was almost no euphoria and entactogenic effects to distract me  getting kills didn t feel any more satisfying than usual 

 overall i almost felt sober or  normal  during this session and i can see how many people say this is a very functional stimulant 

   

  day      days later     

i was running on   hours of sleep  i tried playing sober for about an hour or two before hand  i was making a lot of crucial mistakes and dying over and over  

so i hit about   and   minutes later i was playing much better  i took another     minutes later and i was basically playing as good as i could play

   

here is a rating system for a few categories i could think of  please note that it is hard to give these a relative rating as i don t have very many stimulants to compare them to  that being said    assume     is baseline sober   

communication   

focus   

gamesense   

aim skill   

movement skill   

satisfaction of kills   

consistency   

   

  conclusion  

this chem allows me to play at my best with unwavering consistency  honestly great it medium to low doses for just that 

however  it should be noted that daily use of   fpm has resulted in some concerning health issues and for that reason isn t something i could see myself taking with any regularity  and may have to shelf this one for a while 

   

please let me know if there are any compounds you would be interested in me trying for this  or if you have any feedback in general  i am located in canada and have a very limited number of stimulants to try  i am especially interested in functional stimulants that can be used a couple times a week

text:
if you happen to remember me from previous posts  i know i shouldn’t be doing this so soon  shut up  i didn’t order it  vendor sent the wrong product  and my curiosity overwhelmed me  also  i’ve been out of good drugs for like a week and some change  so  uh  fuckin’ way she goes    

so yes  big surprise here  a collector like myself isn’t about to toss free drugs  especially from a reliable vendor  i’d never actually considered trying amphetamines  however  because i figured i’d like them too much  i’d even skipped over this particular compound earlier during my research on stims because it was noted to have the strongest reinforcing effect on rats out of the series of amphetamines tested  doesn’t sound responsible for someone like myself  and of course  it’s predominantly a serotonin releaser instead of a classic stim  so not only do i not know what an amphetamine feels like  it’s also bad for my brain meat because i just spanked it with   mapb    

the plus side is  though i’m out of   mapb    fea feels like a serviceable “rolling” experience on top of generally being more fun than   mapb somehow  so i’ll take the free reup to my entactogen tank  i feel bad for profiting from the man’s mistakes when he works so hard to be the best vendor  but wherever you are  i salute you    

it’s actually really close to   mapb in most ways  appearance  texture  taste  burn  hell  potencies are even kinda close  i’ve been having a real swell time on lowish doses  started with    and redosing   again once or twice over the next few hours  it doesn’t last that long insufflated  which is perfect for trying to feel out a drug  otherwise  i’d recommend oral    

low doses are very relaxing  a bit sedating  but i like that  my thoughts are always racing  everything is so pleasant  feels like a somehow less stimulating   mapb  even though that’s also relatively sedating  music’s great  fantastic social drug  it would seem  reduced anxiety and typing a goddamn lot  marked increase in affection towards certain people    

but not that kind of affection  i honestly just want to cuddle  but it was possible to occasionally get my focus to land on the prospect of nutting on this gem of a chem  as horny as i got and as hard as i fought  could not produce an orgasm  had to give up at least twice  perhaps three times  also makes me have to shit  but that doesn’t surprise me    mapb had the same effect    

there isn’t a ton of reading about this substance  so i carefully read every source i found multiple times  some people were claiming it’s a letdown  and others would argue it’s only a letdown if you take a small dose  i’d seen an upwards of   mentioned   

yeah  i’m game  i slowly ramped up to    from pretty sober   then gradually introduced another    if this really is a high dose  i’m feeling very few side effects  my heart rate is probably up  but nothing i can feel or discern myself  not all tweaked  i am cemented under my blanket  no weird hand  foot  or face sweat  not nearly as twitchy as   mapb  i haven’t abused it as hard or as long as the   mapb  but the   fea at least feels more forgiving with redosing  doesn’t seem to produce an immediate tolerance like   mapb seemed to  and the comedown hasn’t appeared too bad  slight headache  but i probably just haven’t been keeping track of my water intake because i am laser focused  only on what’s interesting  though   

anyway  once i started getting into the doses surpassing    it got legitimately visual  none of that “huh  was that light always that color ”  but my whole blanket is breathing  it looked pretty damn convincing  unfocusing my eyes  especially because i have mole eyes and everything is blurry  resulted in obscure shadowed blurred figures in these out of focus spots turning into very intricate hallucinations of creatures or machinery or patterns  my wall was an empty canvas  free to become anything  towards the start  there seemed to be electricity flowing throughout the walls like the plasma globe things you buy at the mall   

another time  i decided to have a staring match with the wall  it began to bellow around and swirl as if it were a sandstorm  then  my room started being spun by the whirlwind  the longer i looked  the more speed we picked up  the objects in my peripheral vision gained motionblur  the sand was whipping more violently  and then poof  i could exit such a vivid oev by simply affixing my gaze somewhere    

i mentioned my peripheral vision  that’s where the visuals took the most liberties  hell  it wasn’t always my room off to the side  sometimes i’d see people  as if i were waiting on a subway  sometimes solid light  objects are constantly melting  sliding around  actually pretty reminiscent of a disso’s visuals in this regard  looking passed what i’m doing here  into the blackness of my phone screen  i can see a separate plane from this one  it’s all just scrolling patterns  anyway  objects will randomly appear and disappear out of the corner of my vision   

and not to mention the whole thing is just pretty  many things take on a rainbow sheen  like an oil spill or a seashell  many big  flat surfaces  as opposed to smaller and more complex objects  had a   scrolling texture applied to them  various patterns  random objects or scenes from long lost memory presented in remarkable detail    

i’m now about an hour and a half passed my last dose  definitely on the comedown  total amount taken is   dosed out over   hours  feeling pretty fresh  well  tired  but not miserable  still that bit of a headache  but i haven’t drank any water since i last mentioned being thirsty    

so what’s the deal  this shit is great  why is it not more popular  i went and checked the vendor’s site to see the value  and that was by far the cheapest chemical in the category  kinda whacky  too  the visuals can be controlled to an extent  staring at one spot and or unfocusing your eyes let’s the visuals slowly ramp up the longer you don’t move  my whole field of vision begins to vibrate  lightning is striking around the edges of my sight  a darkness is slowly peeling away at what i can see while reality violently jiggles into pieces        aaand it’s gone  if you’re looking around or doing something  it keeps the visuals at bay pretty effectively  the words on my screen have depth  they’re constantly lazily shuffling back and forth

text:
so i recently have been experimenting with   fma for attention deficits and productivity  this post is mainly just to share my experience thus far and see if anyone has similar experiences with stimulants 

it seems like stimulants  while they do improve focus  attention  drive  and motivation  only seem to improve to the detriment of your future self  i would describe it as borrowing  as if you re only allotted so much energy and attention for any given day and stimulants take all of that allotted energy and cram it into a short duration of a couple hours  i have yet to decide if this is even a beneficial outcome for me because while yes  i do complete more desired tasks in that amount of time  after the drug wears off i am done for the day  i tend to laze around and feel lethargic and sometimes take a nap  before i started experimenting with stimulants i thought that they were cheating  allowing you to have more energy motivation etc  in a given day than would otherwise be possible  but now i m starting to realize it s only cheating myself

if you were to google amphetamine safe use you would be bombarded with resource after resource for addiction and rehab and stimulant use disorder  surprisingly there are no resources for safe use and or preventing addiction dependence  not even medical journals or prescription guidelines  

my question is  does any such information exist  i have done plenty of research on low dose amphetamines and their risk for nuerotoxicity as well as supplements that have been studied to reduce neurotoxicity of amphetamines and dopamine damage down regulation  but i have not found any guides saying how to avoid dependence addiction  cravings  etc  is twice a week too often  does consecutive days matter when using twice a week  are there any things i should look out for that would be early warning signs of developing dependence  i say dependence because amphetamine use is not something that i enjoy and psychological addiction will not be an issue for me  i very much loathe when i do have to take amphetamines but there ocassionally arises times where i need to take them to do tasks that would otherwise be incredibly difficult for me to complete   any insight is appreciated  i have been experimenting with both   fma and   fa depending on the amount of stimulation i need

text:
been using it for the past couple weeks and i have to put it simply  it s very subtle yet extremely effective  

now  i don t have a scale at the moment so i can t give you an accurate dose range  but i just put a  tiny  amount into a   drink bottle and just sip it through out the day during study as needed  i do not recommend this method as you are still unsure of the dose you are consuming but i could tell when i had a sufficient dose after waiting   minutes after each sip  

 i notice it taking effect when my eyes start to feel like they re  bulging  a little  not sure if that s common with all stims  have only really tried ipph   i ve noticed no stimulant typical negative side effects other than a tiny amount of muscle tightness and i can be a little bit rude  i wouldn t liken it to caffeine like some other people have said but because it s so subtle and you re not smacked in the face energy or focus  it s only similar in that way  

i can usually never sit down and focus on my study  no matter how hard i try  i am a true procrastinator   i am actually awaiting my results from an adhd assessment  but as soon as i open my laptop and get my papers out i am straight into study  studying feels less of a mountain of a task and more like brushing your teeth or washing your hands  it s not particularly fun or interesting but it isn t excruciatingly boring to the point i give up instantly and do something else instead  i can easily study for hours on end but i can  consciously  switch tasks at ease and instantly return to what i was doing before  an absolute god send for me  

the effects last for maybe   hours at most depending on how slowly or quickly i sip my drink bottle  i can usually maintain a good amount of focus from     when i dose till     when i finish studying  

no issues with sex drive or sleep and wake up feeling surprising good and well rested  no feelings of cravings or compulsive redosing  i usually leave the bottle half empty  

final thoughts 

for someone who is completely stimulant naive and wants a little edge on their focus  i would say go for it  it s still a rc and caution  please don t do what i did  is needed when taking it  i m sure there would be a lot more negative side effects on higher doses but otherwise it s an extremely clean and subtle stimulant

hello researchers  i’ve recently ordered   ci dmt that i’ll receive shortly and plan on using

 amp

text:
the dangers of benzo’s

i just wanted to write this as a warning to people  about   months ago i acquired some clonazolam        presses  i started taking them at around     smoking weed with the boy’s  i dont know if its my own carelessness or the ‘couldnt care less’ effect that benzo’s give me  but i took   at first and over the next     hours i took like     of them  i gave some friends a few but i was eating them like candy  i cant remember much from the entire day other then at around     i had the absolutely magnificent idea to drop a tab of   lsd  next thing i know is that i woke up at   with my vomit next to me completely disoriented  

what im trying to say is watch out with the benzo’s dudes  when i used to take them i couldnt care less en just be eating them like candy  for me they have no recreational value anymore so i stopped taking them since  

cheerz from nl

text:
last saturday i took     aco met and     lsd dosed together  while being daily on an ssri    escitalopram 
the trip was okay but kind of weak because of the ssri  now    days later i want to trop again  and im wondering about what to take and what dosage  opinions 
im looking for a really visual trip  which is hard to achieve with this ssri in my system  some among the rcs that i have are   nboh    b fly  doc    ho aco met  dpt  al lad    lsd    ho det    meo mipt   d  eth lad   
i will probably want to avoid phenethylamines because they can be more physically demanding  but i liked the visuals of the nbomes and im eager to try some   nboh though  
i only have   blotter of al lad unfortunately  maybe i should take   al lad  amp      aco met   
i never tried   nboh  and im fairly sure i would be disappointed with the diminished effects from the ssri  but then again  i like it more to take this rc without any combo for the first time  or maybe i should add some   aco met or al lad   
advice or ideas are very welcome  i also have many other psychedelics which i didnt mention but are maybe not that relevant   i dont feel like going through nausea too much  

my focus is in strong visuals  easy going    avoiding nausea panic  although i have clonazolam drops at   if really needed

text:
experimented with    miprocin  metocin    aco dmt     and malt

this is the new   batch btw 

      took     tab on empty stomach  no nausea

      just feel a little jaw tension  would be feeling something rn if it was    i can actually get hard on this stuff as apposed to lsd  i google the comeup time and it s   hours so im like  fuck it  these tabs aint shit  and take another and immidiately vape some malt because yolo right  the malt didnt do anything  not even potentiate the trip  last time i tried it it was bunk too but probably because my vape was too hot and it gor burned 

      wasnt a bad choice actually  the body euphoria is great  tho there s more muscle tension than    i vape some cdb to relax a bit  music sounds great but it doesn t supercharge my imagination like acid tho im definately having an emotional reaction to it  just a couple tears unlike    i laugh a little harder too  backround audio distortions ringing was more intense but tolerable 

to compare it more to lsd  the euphoria is less like electric shocks of pleasure and more like a steady stream of buzzing water  it s sedating as apposed to stimulating   just in terms of moving around tho  im kinda jittery too  the visuals are about the same as lsd but with less geometric fuckery in the oev s  the cev s are about the same for me  polychromatic stars and streaks moving in patterns 

      still seeing visuals  feeling more jittery in my hands  i have to eat with my mouth like a dog lmaooo  my rice is acting up  im getting morphing effects  colour shifting  depth distortion and tracers  had some deep emotional personal revelations but i forget almost everything after     or higher doses of psychs  aw well  the effects slowly ramp down from here 

      more or less baseline  but cant sleep  up till    half an etizolam didnt do anything  smh all i had left   fell asleep by    

the next day im extra tired and depressed but im working in the morning so     if i got to sleep in i probably would ve been fine 

all in all  al lad is like a shorter lasting  less potent  more sedating lsd    ug felt a little more powerful than    highest lsd dose i ve done  so maybe   to   is the equivilance  i ll try a trip with   tab but for now i dont think its worth the money  dont get me wrong  it was an amazing trip  i dont regret taking the second tab but   of a much cheaper lysergamide does the same for me and maybe   u too 

besides  the dreamlike state music puts me in on lsd is my favourite thing about it  second is the geometry   both of which i didnt get  the sedating effect it great tho  second favourite chem after   lsd  maybe al lad might become my fav on   but i ll have to wait a couple weeks  amt is on my radar

text:
i just watched a video of a guy after getting some kind of surgery   you know  one of those ones where the parent is filming  and the kid is saying funny shit 

well this guy was a bit older  and the video wasn t all that funny  but damn was i jealous   whatever he was on  nitrous  morphine   both    he was in a blissful state of realization that he had family members and he was grateful for absolutely everything in his life  all the way down to the chair he owned 

sounds like mda  except i ve never heard of any serious comedowns or downward spikes in serotonin as a result of nitrous or morphine  at least not as acute as those attributed to mdma   but i know next to nothing about morphine 

my favorite thing about this drug s  was that he was having these realizations  so very intoxicated and grateful  yet there was never a hint of fear   in fact i ve never seen any silly anesthesia video have even a trace of fear in the person who we re laughing at 

that s the perfect drug right there  whatever it is   probably a beautifully measured cocktail of some of the best drugs  meant for a one off occasion  and not to be looked at outside of the western medicine setting   of course we didn t just give your son heroin and whipits  we re doctors 

i know i ve probably said a bunch of stupid shit   i m not very educated   but whenever i see these videos  i think  that   that s what i want   the perfect drug or combination of drugs  beautiful realizations of gratitude  but no fear  and no sudden come down feeling   intoxication  but not drunken idiocy and rage   a smooth ride to the end  finishing off with a full night s rest  and a minimal hangover in the morning 

i m romanticizing the shit out of it and probably so full of bullshit   but these are my immediate  ignorant observations about what i see as the perfect drug or drug combo 

any of y all ever undergone anesthesia like we see in the david video   ease my jealousy by telling me how wrong i am about all of it

text:
here is my adventure with dmxe 

i holed on it yesterday  after the allergy test  a friend without tolerance snorted        i snorted   over an hour and drank   after that  while he was already lying down  
  hours after the last dose we each slept  but were still dissociated  so he slept an hour earlier than me 


i never tried mxe  but the other analogues 

mxpr  me and my friends tend to call it maxpower  has this inviting warmth and chillness  but not much magic  it‘s just comfortable 

mxipr  maxipower   has even more warmth than mxpr  but trades chillness for being completely alien  crazy  magic and a bit hypomanic 

dmxe     seems like a sane balance of the good parts of both predecessors  being colourful  psychedelic  magic and chill  crazy in its own way but not estranging  less alien feeling  it’s very euphoric  but i didn’t feel hypomania 

i still like all of them for different reasons  but dmxe is so balanced that it feels natural in its strangeness 



here’s the imho very important epilogue  

all three of them don‘t shine at all when snorted  i like taking them in a glass of water  or like i did yesterday  half oral buccal  half snorted  here‘s why 

snorted mxpr becomes bland  mxipr becomes too confusing and fast  dmxe loses magic this way

text:
hi guys    this is not the average post on here and i hope im not breaking the rules   

i have a   year old sister with a rare form of cancer called ewing sarcoma    years ago she was put on a trial drug that was only tried on   people in north america when nothing else was working   it saved her life and put her into remission by nothing short of a miracle    

now   years later it has come back   this cancer is a unforgiving bastard that few ever fully beat   

the trail drug was stopped by the producer and is no longer in existence    its called robatumumab which is a monoclonal antibody and antineoplastic   it was originally made by shering plough    

after months of searching for new trails and or alternative  natural treatments all over the world  hope is dwindling   

i know little to nothing about chemistry    is there any one that can point me toward a glimmer of hope to finding someone  somewhere out there that could potentially synth this drug  assuming
they can located how         


any suggestions are welcome    thank you
general_words_removed: averag ewe sarcoma peopl remiss miracl unforgiv bastard fulli produc robatumumab monoclon antibodi antineoplast shere plough altern natur dwindl chemistri glimmer synth assum locat

text:
i just bought o dsmt so i have been reading about it more and more  o dsmt is the active metabolite of tramadol and since there s no direct data of o dsmt all of the information for tramadol can be applied to o dsmt  tramadol binds to the  μ opioid receptor with   fold less affinity than morphine   this means that the euphoria experienced is going to be incredibly  incredibly low  not to mention o dsmt is not a very clean drug and has a lot of various mechanisms of action that are secondary to its primary action  on top of it being a mu  kappa  and delta opioid agonist it is also a snri  an acetylcholine antagonist  muscarinic antagonist  nmda inhibitor  as well as a few other actions  where as morphine and codeine  are simply mu  kappa  and delta opioid agonists  

i haven t tried o dsmt yet but every time i post about it i get like   messages asking me about it  i just wanted to make a psa and say if you want to try opiates  which obviously i would highly reccommend against  don t put yourself in that position  you d be much better off trying a real opiate instead of a strictly medicinal and likely a non euphoric opiate like o dsmt 

please feel free to share your experiences with o dsmt if you have any and correct any information that may be wrong

text:
so my experience with drugs started at a very young age as a way to cope with what many would call a rocky childhood  i first was introduced to rcs when i was around   and buying jwh xxx’s because they were very cheap and accessible  in retrospect i was far too young to even be consuming psychoactive chemicals  much less synthetic cannabinoids  that continued for probably about a year until i started doing opiates more frequently and by   i could snort   roxi  ’s and barely get a buzz and by   i was a full blown iv heroin addict 

fast forward   years through    times in and out of rehabs many times not completing them   several overdoses  iv coke meth added in the mix  jail and we get to a year ago where i finally have myself somewhat put together and i start working on getting out of the system but have have to stop consuming cannabis and fall into a deep depression 

i started falling apart quick without the cannabis and was on the verge of suicide  i know it’s not great to be treating by playing doctor with drugs but i’m not ready to be completely sober so i had to do something so i start researching rcs again  i find the current rc cannabinoids on the market aren’t anything i want any parts of so i ordered   lsd along with some other stuff and it was truly a great decision  that was in march of this year and on my first trip i had so many deep thoughts about my life and the pain i was experiencing and what i needed to do to move forward and made so much progress in that experience that it truly may have stopped me from relapsing on heroin or killing myself because i was in such a bad place  

at the end of april my biggest fear came to reality and my grandmother  whom helped raise me for years  got covid and had many pre existing health conditions and passed away  i’m not close with much of my family so the thought of losing any of the few i am haunted me growing up  to the point of i remember being   and wanting to join the military at   so i could die as what i saw an honorable death at the time and never have to deal with losing anyone  had this of happened in march in complete sobriety i would have went off the deep end  

about two weeks after she passed i took   of   lsd and watched the midnight gospel on netflix and had one of the most introspective  emotional and therapeutic experiences of my life  shout out to duncan trussell because that night changed my life 

so things were going somewhat good but with quarantine i started getting bored and got the dumb idea to dive into rc opioids  huge mistake  i also got into some rc stims and tryptamines but i made the bad decision of slamming   map and o dsmt  i got to the point where i was doing a lot and for a while and started getting bad wds  explored some iv stims too but found it’s a dumb idea  

it’s been a few weeks not since i threw away the rest of my   and used the rest of the o dsmt after having a moment of clarity that by abusing rcs like i was it was no different than abusing meth heroin and honestly probably worse and less safe  used kratom to wein myself off and   fpm to help get through work  can’t say i’ll never slam an rc again but i’m definitely gonna do my damn best not to and not abuse them and i don’t ever wanna get another opioid again  

idk why i’m writing this  mostly hoping my experience will stop someone from making the same mistake i did and let people know how insidious opioids can be  and hey  i’m not preaching that no one should do them because i’m sure some people can use them responsibly like i can use benzos responsibility and just stop doing them whenever and not redose and blackout  hell  i’ve had a shit ton of etiz and clam laying around for like   months and used it once each and probably am gonna give most away and just keep a few doses of the etiz for an emergency situation  but if opioids opiates bring you to your knees like they do me  heed my warning and if you’ve never tried them before you’re honestly not missing out on anything and your money is much better spend on things like lysergamides  tryptamines  mushrooms and phenethylamines  be safe of there y’all   lt

the first part is to show my personal knowledge of tianeptine dosage  i ve personally been using this product sparingly since i discovered it in march  more often recently as part of the cycle  it s billed from my well known noot vendor as   stronger  it easily feels like   because of my medium tolerance and the doses it takes for me to get effects 

for chronic pain  addiction  i recommend getting the solution for ease of dosing it s     with      i ve read it s less serotinergic than tianeptine sodium  that checks out  i still recommend cycling with o dsmt  or if you re on something like etazene to keep you well until your etazene arrives  personally i m hoping to flood myself with   kratom extract when i move to chicago in a week so i don t have to keep swapping out opioid mu agonist rcs  but you do you 

since my tolerance is a bit jacked  the dosages and effects seem more like    but it may be   and just hits harder and makes the pain go away  i jacked myself up straining hastening to finish an art project in an awkward position  right before packing and moving heavy boxes  i also have chronic pain and would use kratom and rcs to manage strain at work since    when working at a soul food restaurant i occasionally would be gifted perc   and     from the best cook so i could keep up  i would still fall behind from pain  also pregaming with gabs  and taking      oral capsule  before and during work  part of this for mood  since i had specific work stressors working with felons at an affordable fine dining establishment deep in the giant hood in a poor ass city  as the only white boy  crazy shit would go down  wanna know  ask in comments  digressed enough  a few white girls worked there too but    ghetto black folks  cooking at the deli was less stressful  covid switch  was mainly      before and on break  gabs  and canadian nsaids with methocarbamol  i had been mainly off of tianeptine sodium during this period due to cost and extra serotinergic action  ethyl tianeptine i is less serotinergic  in a similar way that o dsmt is less serotinergic than tramadol  we need pks only ffs it ll automatically help mood 

  so tianeptine sodium since   ve used kratom since    i have chronic gout pain and cheat because beef and shellfish trigger it but are delicious  if clams and oysters count as shellfish i cheated yesterday without thinking  i think it does from pain  i was dosing   pretty often before lunch hoping my ethyl tianeptine i would arrive saving my last     dose in case it didn t arrive  took it immediately after lunch as that all over pain was returning 

so back to dosing      and it s     stronger than sodium  i don t ever take as little as   and i don t divide mls until the bottom of the bottle  for my high  moderate tolerance to pks i took            sodium equivalent   pain returned   later and took night meds    kpin   gabs   olanzapine  along with            and got pain relief and the calming warmth    later it was late and i wanted to go to sleep so i took   with   f phenibut  i regret that because i only got   sleep and woke up in a p but fog and have been having sleep issues  couldn t get back to sleep  fog disappeared with   adderall and   n methyl cyclazodone which also motivated this post  seeing dr  soon specifically for liver and kidney function and to establish pcp in chicago 

tl dr major takeaways  it lasts an hour longer than tianeptine sodium  it s less serotinergic  making it more appealing and cleaner  and with more traditional effects 

quick guide for those currently on rc opioids
   too mild
   mild moderate
   high  moderate
   high

if no tolerance then divide all these by    don t take this as gospel ymmv

text:
warning  long thematic intro ahead  skip to trip report to get to nitty gritty  otherwise  enjoy  learn  and do not replicate  there were both good and bad lessons  

this is entirely true  not fabricated or embellished in any way  

intro 

friends  enemies  psychonauts  laymen  poor souls lost in r rc  and everything in between  i have seen what lies beyond and it is terrifyingly beautiful  haunting  and the sum of our fears  i say with    certainty that no scholar  messiah  street preacher  actor playing jesus being whipped  or raving lunatic has gotten it right  

until now 

forget your crusty books  your golden bibles  your totally not allowed secret nude statues of the well endowed muslim holy men of mecca  and hundreds of roman god s with chistled small penis having bodies  and the voluptuous cave statues of bbw women cavemen carried out  we are our own god  

the god of life  death  happiness  despair  joy  and the eternal pumping lurching lumbering heaving till your completely empty but still need to vomit  so bile oozes forth in a yellow ugly burnjng truth  a truth that is life as we know it but can t see it through our double vision and endless swirling vortex that was your parents house  

we are truly fortunate to experience it and yet too afraid to truly appreciate it  until you stand at the brink and say  nah   this  my friends  is your new national anthem and it is called life  go play as hard and loud as you can because there s no retirement in this band  only vegas every night of the week  playing the songs you wrote   years ago  but my god  what songs those were  

i am not your god  but i am a god  

okay i m not actually that burned out but it took me   days to come out of this well enough to write this  i am pleased to announce the grand and chaotic tragedy that was  i wonder if   d is just better when combined hmmm   

do not do this   i repeat  incredible level of stupidity ahead turn back ye who dare 

i never intended it this way  but this is how it happened  i m ready to share this  to heal and incorporate  and honestly this is an example of what harm reduction isn t  i m fine  i don t feel like shit  vitals are back to normal and i m finally rehydrated and rested  i hope this tale of caution and hopefully somewhat humorous intro really drives home a couple of points  

i learned many things  here s the low down  

  d and o pce is a winning combination for me  i had tested it responsibly a couple of times in the weeks since my initial post and thoughts on the matter  started with small doses and until i believe it was saturday night  the big night  i intended to boof a combo of   of o pce and     d for what i thought would be the sweet spot  as it turns out  the fruit bared by that idea was too sweet to stop  i lost all self control in a hedonistic fury of abrahamic  proportions  

trip report 

i had been having a very responsible saturday vaping n ethyl hexedrone  which no matter what way you spin it  is not responsible  
i had been very productive  doing chores  being upbeat  yoga  being a cathinone perv  and otherwise whiling away my time on quarantine 

this was on and off for about     with breaks for two solid meals and rest stops  not too bad by a lot of standards  i ve had been trialling a combination of o pce and   d in low doses titrating up on once every few weeks gauging where the effects best compliment  i had settled on   of o pce and   of   d  boofed  in the same   syringe  i hadn t planned it to be that night  but i was on the way down from the hex and figured the time could be now  

under normal circumstances i would never go for it but i had been supplimenting the hex with benzos to keep off the edge and i was more daring than normal  

dose was prepped  administered  and felt within   minutes  

     preparing dose and getting trip areas set up  headphones  comfortable environment  cozy bed  and fluids with abort mission bottles of flualpraz and etizolam in case things go sideways  confident and in good mood though a little weary from the come down of hex  
  opce and     d administered

    effects already  definitely dissociation occurring with certain magic and shimmer to it that was very very nice  spirits are high and i have on bonobos album migration prepping for a nice smooth night 

     effects increasing  more dissociated with dare i say a warmth and taste of psychedelia that was wonderful  eyes closed introspection period  if this was where it stayed i m confident it would have been a     night  but the thought comes in    ho mipt  miprocin  i m a genius  that would pair for a trifecta of wonder  i unceremoniously stumble and with one eye closed  weigh   mg  checking precariously  or was it checking me  just eat the straight powder like a raccoon with sugar puffs  catch sight of my massive pupils and grin with anticipation  

    miprocin comes in hard  exactly what i had hoped  the three of them were like the three musketeers  the dosage just right  not too strong but not leaving you wanting more  or did it  visuals were very strong  closed and open eye present  physical euphoria was a constant buzzing like the blowjob from million bees  i truely felt i could conquer the world 

naturally it was time to up the pleasure  

    insufflated   of o pce along with a mound of   mmc for sheer badness  the paradox of having too much of a good thing begins  

things become very hazy but the opce became confusing  not manic or hyperactive but a sense of things being off course  combined with euphoria and nostalgic open and closed eye visuals of childhood events through the eyes of other people  okay maybe things were off course  

took a dropper of flualprazolalm  easily    to dull this suddenly detailed night  bad move  seems i was more stimulated then thought  the trip started becoming more disinhibited then actually over  lost all sense of fear and no longer desired things to stop 

i sniff   more mg of o pce as if i was born in the darkness  recall a hit or two of hex as well  finishing what was left     of poorish quality   at this point my state of consciousness was alternating between being condemned to hell  sending myself there in punishment  enjoying the punishment  and then graciously saving myself because of past good deeds 

unsure if i was standing or lying down but my next memory is the jarring sound of very loud drum and bass coming from a pair of headphones on the floor  were those mine  where am i  who am i  the confusion was confounding  i had no fear  it was like i had been born as an adult  covered in sweat  there were no color to my eyes and i didn t recognize this alien figure in the mirror  

i knew i wasnt human  then what was i  if you answered  god  you are correct  it s what all tripped out confused people assume  normally that s enough to bring me down  this only affirms to me that i am god because i was tripping just as hard as before the thought  

i spent hours constructing and destroying civilizations and universes without ever leaving the spare room in my parents house which i had been house sitting  i felt the life and death  happiness  joy  love and despair of my imagined people s  it was how it had to be  i didn t choose to be god 

around   the next day my sense of self asserted itself very suddenly and violently in the form of a power puke into the toilet  my civilizations flushed down that toilet  swirling down the drain into what was already priming to be the most hellish suffering shivering sobering hangover of my life  

sleep came at some point  

all was quiet  i was dreaming intensely  vivid  beautiful  and positive  lifelike dreams of being anywhere else  and anyone else  anyone other than the person about to violently wake to the overly loud ring tone of a ringing cell phone lost in the tangled swamp of dagobah bed you were trapped in  like a great uncoordinated  slurring beast   the phone is answered not with your own voice  but with a desert dry voice of a ressurected pharaoh  head spinning l like the kid who stayed on the park spinning ride way longer than he should have because the big kids thought it was funny  

it was not funny  you conclude the call  with the comment levelled  are you drunk  you sound weird   o pce lasts a long long time you recall  you were you again  and you were in pain  and missing memories  but also missing the power and glory of deism   you are human  sounded dead pan  almost as if it was a compromise with yourself that you could have done worse with but not entirely got what you wanted either  

in the time since then i ve been incorporating myself slowly to what normal is  could have been bad  definitely still not back to normal  but grateful and alive and really that s no compromise  

a taste of power will have to be enough  it was not to be the third reich and you did not go down with the people you threw up 

relish life my friends  drink it like a fountain  cause next thing you know it s coming like an avalanche  coming down the mountain

as the title says  a new dissociative called dmxe or deoxymethoxetamine has been released by a trusted party  so we can be    sure it is actually what they say it is 

it is also known as   me    oxo pce hydrochloride and the chemicals iupac is the following     ethylamino       methylphenyl  cyclohexanone hydrochloride

the structure is  somewhat  similar to mxe  but as i have a lack of understanding when it comes to which substitutions at what part of the molecule result in what changes    i have really know idea how similar the effects will be  i mean mxpr is also structurally quite similar to mxe 

  but anyways  personally i can t wait to hear trip reports

text:
i had an appt with a psychiatrist to get back on my adhd meds  reason i stopped was cause if i wanted to get back on id have to quit cannnabis  and he said okay ill set up a drug test for you and when i get the results we can talk about it  not even a guarantee 
i have quit cannabis after using it like     times a day and its been easier than i thought but at the beginning i thought id struggle so i saw a therapist who put sent me to an sa counselor  and she mentioned that since i have sa issues  i dont think i do  id have to wait be clean for six months  

i am    okay with being clean for that long  but the fact that i will have to wait   months so i can get my adhd under control terrifies me  weed had helped with my adhd in a way i hadnt even realized because im like a crackhead which i already was  but   hours   days a week and it sucks  my thoughts are non stop and im so over it  so im here to ask if you guys think it would be a good option to just start rc’s  my only concern is if    if itd actually be beneficial in my case    when it does come to the time for me to pass a drug test  will anything pop up on the test thatd prevent me for getting legal stuff or would i even feel the need to go back to my doc after starting this stuff  curious if anyones been in the same situation

text:
just wanted to report this combination

caveats  i have a tolerance to   ho and also take an ssri

i was having an emotional night  i have been through a lot recently and was particularly upset because this girl im really into doesnt seem to feel the same way 

  ho pcp definitely intensifies emotions  as does alcohol  i am painfully aware of this  i did my best to moderate my behavior  before you guys start to tell me how risky all this is  especially being on an ssri  know i am very aware of this  i did my best to be mindful during this experience and i awoke the next day with a healthy dose of shame 

so  i take   ho pcp kind of often  i have a tolerance and try to keep the effects at a low level  this provides mood boost and very mild dissociation 

i have had a lot happen in my life recently  my father just had a heart attack  hes ok  the girl i talk to is also very concerned for her own fathers health  im in love with her  she knows this and feels a certain kind of way for me as well  but  of course  i want more than that but its probably not gonna happen 

i was feeling pretty upset  i had had a few drinks of vodka as well  i was coming to terms with the fact that things are probably not gonna work out between me and her  i felt waves of sadness  my old self would have self destructed and done something very rash  i observed this and decided i was not going to take anything that would kill my feelings  like  more booze  an opiate or something 

i have used   cb to process emotions in the past  a higher level of self love and self care takes over and i ride out my feelings 

so thats what i did  i took a small dose of the stuff and plugged my headphones into my music player and put on some cathartic  beautiful music from the balkans and tuva  its amazing stuff  the bulgarian singers are a chorus of women who sings beautiful and heartbreaking songs  and the collaborations they do with central asian throat singers and string instruments is very profound 

i have never felt so blown away by music before  i was not having a whole lot of visuals but the waves of sounds built on themselves and expanded in additional dimensions 

i wept  i cried a very deep cry into my hands  as to avoid attention from the neighbors  

it was so cathartic and so timeless and beautiful  i felt distance in time and space disappear as the music engulfed my soul and washed it 

i have never felt music so deeply before 

the vodka and   ho synergized to remove any anxiety    cb is great in combination with ghb and i thing the alcohol had the same effect  the deeply moving emotional powers of   ho multiplied the   cb s warping of consciousness and the alcohol warmed and smoothed it all together 

i had one of the deepest sobs ive ever had  and that felt good 

when the   cb began to wear off i drank a bunch of water and got into bed  i took some seroquel as i usually do  and then i slept

i m sure many of you know that al lad has been in production for a while now  the reason why it disappeared from the market and why the synthesis was reworked  was the reason that the old synthesis used lsd as a precursor  this is obviously a big no no 

now the lab who first announced they were working on the new production  has released al lad again  this time made with the new synthesis route  according to the producer  the synthesis route doesn t have quite as good yields as the old one  so prepare to pay a bit more for your al lad

but it is back now  no doubt it will be in stock at several places in no time  as fast as the post moves 

also  for those wondering where my post about dmxe went  it was removed by the mods  most likely because i didn t notice that there was another thread on that subject

text:
i am no stranger to   mmc  i have been binging on and off for the last     months with a month and some weeks clean in between  i have pretty much always snorted it which has fucked my nose up pretty bad  the times i took it orally    and upwards of   on separate occasions  i thought it was kinda meh compared to insufflation  ik this isn t the general consensus  but i just prefer snorting drugs  

however  today i decided to take   orally and then   mins after ingesting it snort an   line  and   holy fuck    i normally don t gurn or get bad bruxism when     snorted during a sesh  but man my jaw was going fucking ninety today  couldn t keep my legs still  eyes rolling around  insane euphoria  insane confidence  etc  etc   

way better of an experience than if i had done either roa on its own  the line and bomb synergized so well    mins into the oral come up the line starts creeping in and the effects build and build until its pure bliss

text:
i don’t have a tolerance  i use kratom maybe once in a week or two  i used to have a tolerance of   mg day carfentanil    μg once every   hours iv   so i ussseed to think opioids would never work for me again  so not true  i just needed to wait years to be back at baseline haha  

i dosed   mg about   hours ago  boy  i’m not doing this for real recreation  just some neck pain  not going to be an every day or redose thing  which is why i didn’t go   or the other one  don’t care about a rush 

itches are just right  just enough to make me happy about an opioid again  i do like them a little bit  but i’m gonna take   mg hydroxyzine alongside it  at the time of this post     hrs into it   the neck pain is totally gone  as if it wasn’t there to begin with  i was able to massage the muscles  because muscle relaxers weren’t cutting it  needed to block the pain to do it  

the “euphoria” is there  i am happy  i feel good  a lot of this has to do with being happy about the effects working as i hoped and the stress and pain it therefore relieves  but i do feel like there’s a bonus on top  if i took more  i’d probably nod  it feels very good  but that’s not my goal so i won’t be testing that theory  for general pain relief and functionality  this dose is perfect for me  i can’t believe it  tramadol is so shit too  i had no idea one of its metabolites was so wonderful  why isn’t this used instead  the fuck is wrong with the medical community hahahaha  

do you guys have similar opinions and effects as me  is it as medically efficacious while retaining some of that fun recreational side  it’s not oxymorpone  but it is so much better than how i felt three hours ago  medically  if it didn’t have any of the traditional recreational side effects as other opioids  i’d still love it because i can read  and opioids make me want to read all the books  and work  i’m an artist and it doesn’t cause any problems  makes it easier since my neck was causing issues with that  

i pray this stays off the banhammer radar for the foreseeable future  i may get   g or so to put in a safe  nothing i’d use every day  but it would prevent a trip to the doctor for a prescription if i needed it  yep  wow  just amazed  i went in with all the hopes in the world  and zero expectations  every hope was met  it seems like the duration will be perfect too  since it only seems to be getting a little stronger  no sign of a plateau and comedown at all yet  

what an awesome drug  better than kratom in nearly every way  but kratom does boost my mood help my depression a lot more than this  idc  this helps my pain entirely   

thanks for reading  guys  wanted to share my opinion with the community     

tl dr  if someone is on the bench looking for pain relief  and can’t decide  this is a good choice for an all around opioid  not too sedating  not too much euphoria you can’t work  but there is enough there that if you just took a little more  i can imagine it getting intense enough to interfere with productivity 

drugs and doses used 

  mg o dsmt hcl
  mg hydroxyzine pamoate 
  g phenibut hcl    hours before o dsmt dose 
  mg clonazepam    hours before o dsmt dose
cannabis  full spectrum concentrate in a vape cartridge  taken        second long puffs       w     to heat it    ok make that   puffs

text:
i received a small batch of mf pvp  which i’ve never done  along  side a large amount of a pcyp  which i’ve done a lot of   i sustained from any substance for about   days prior to dosing  last of which was clonazolam  i vaped about   off foil  and couldn’t immediately feel any noticeable effects  then proceeded to vape another   about   minutes later  it tasted similar to a php  can’t compare to a pvp  and had a numbing effect  but felt it’s effects were too light  so i dosed about   a pcyp  instantly i felt a lot of hypertension and increased heart rate   but noticeably less than when i did a pcyp by itself  a pcyp always gives me intense amounts of hypertension and anxiety compared to other pyros   i’d vape mf pvp two times about   minutes apart  followed by a dose of a pcyp  so i could preserve mf pvp  

overall  mf pvp seems a lot smoother  and better experience than a pcyp  i’ll save some doses to try by itself for a later time so i can accurately experience it  but i figured i’d write about this experience since there’s not much info on it

text:
troparil   a winner  

first of all   dont pm me i wont sale and wont tell you the vendors name   this is for information gathering only 

i just got to try this gem and i have to say  there definitely are similarities to coke  it burns slightly in your nose  i know good coke doesnt but this troparil isnt cut so expect some mild burning in your nose    is about   times worse   and some of it seems to get in my lung no matter how slow i inhale      help please  maybe a nasal spray would do it  maybe i have to grind it better  

i tried oral     but it didnt work at all somehow  i took   red bali kratom with it and   bretazenil about an hour earlier so that might have killed it      whereas nasaly   rock my shoes    would be to much for a beginner i’d say  duration is about an hour  craving and comedown does exist but its about as bad as with high quality coke  its not unbearable and a benzo of some kind will help alot  i also could eat after    within   hours  just like with good coke 

i got mine from a german vendor and he shipped insanely fast  after ordering  the package was at my apartment within   hours  some dealers on the street sre slower    huuge shoutout to the deutsche post  compared to the usps its a miracle   

it also only costs about half the price of good coke     €  where i live so theres that   you can even turn it into crack to smoke it although it seems highly addictive  i‘ll try it in a couple days and hopefully wont forget to update  if i do  send me a quick pm so i‘ll do it 

i‘d really give it a try if you like coke because my vendor said that will most likely be the last batch he‘ll sell    not sure about other vendors 

all in all an     although i dont like uppers  amphetamines      coke      all research uppers are basically shit for me  but troparil   i love it    stay safe out there 

the only thing i have to add is  that while the dopamine inhibiting is much stronger with troparil  troparil doesnt inhibit serotonin as much as coke so you have way more motivation than the typical „content“ feeling on coke  but dont get me wrong  theres still some great euphoria     note  i have adhd or something that causes my normal dopamine levels to be lower  so    i need higher doses and    maybe the euphoria is stronger for me because i dont usually have as much dopamine   

the euphoria is about   of normal amphetamine paste  about the same as normal cocaine and about a third that of mdma

text:
so my experience with mushrooms is very limited i have   experience with   ho met  and my experience with dck is also limited but ive done a lot of acid in my days  my scale is all fucked up so i said fuck it  and filled a capsule about a quarter of the way full with the   ho met  the lsd was   and a half gel tabs that i was told were   ug  doubtful thats the real dose but they were pretty strong   my psychedelic tolerance was at    

i take the   ho and the acid at the same time and go and take a shower  i come out of the shower feeling somewhat confused but still me and not feeling much  i then lay down after picking some stuff off of the floor of my room  i pick up my yocan and did my best to vape as much of the dck as i could before the other shit over took me  i become very confused and become very reminiscent of my shroom trip a few months prior that was     grams  the visuals were the most intense and intricate visuals ive ever seen in my life  i was trying to convince myself the whole time by thinking  i m fine    i m fine   yeah im having fun haha  but the deeper voice in my was fucking shitting itself  i thought that because it was a research chemical and there is little research about it then i would be tripping for   hours and would be fucked up in front of people and i wasn t ready for that whatsoever  the shrooms start to calm down in the headspace but the visuals are still going strong and i have to go to the bathroom so i did  i come back and just fell on my bed from fatigue  my body felt tortured but i was almost back to my baseline after   hours of taking everything  psychedelics have always worn off shortly with me  but i wasn t expecting it to be done this early  im honestly glad that it ended then because i don t think i could ve handled another couple hours of mind fucks  
i don t believe in bad trips so i m not gonna say this one was  but i will say that was the most intense trip of my life  more intense but less introspective than      i had little revelations after the trip and i think the only lessons i learned were to always use a scale or to volumetrically dose  and of course the ever present recurring theme in most of my terrifying trips which is to respect psychedelics and their power

text:
there are so many great drugs  but nothing beats endorphins  

when i exercise  i feel so in tune with my body  i appreciate that i m alive  healthy  and able to explore which movements i can do  unlike with drugs  whenever things get uncomfortable  i just stop  there is no social stigma around it  if i m sore the next day  i can freely comment on it  whereas if i m experiencing an afterglow hangover  i need to be careful who i tell this to  sure  exercising on dissos or psychedelics is a whole other plane of amazing  but not one that s a necessity to me the way simply moving around is  its a great enhancement of a something that is great in its own right 

and then there is the runner s high  the best high of them all  when you just switch your mind off and focus on breathing  keeping the pace and thinking about where you re heading  my best runner s high happened in a spring dusk of warszawa  it was raining a bit  and i got to a park that was blooming in all pastel colours  i could smell all the plants and grass  with a bit of rain in the air  the clouds were that beautiful dark grey blueish hue  which went very well with the park and the block buildings around  for some time  that was all that existed for me  i ran around the park several times and then continued home  as the rain turned heavy  on the runner s high  it felt like a cold shower that contrasted with how heated up my body had become  i did not have to try to avoid the water  instead  i could embrace getting soaked and ran through all the puddles i could  by the time i got home i was exhausted in the best way possible  i seriously think about this experience the same way as i think about beautiful drug experiences 

plenty of drugs lead to inadvertent overexertion  being active in the first place alleviates this  and its a great cure for dealing with bad experiences  you know that you re doing something for your health and appearance  and you can focus on it  then you can stretch and notice how calming it feels 

combining exercise with music in dancing would make me write another wall of text  so i ll wrap by admitting that i can understand a lot of views  but i ll never understand people who won t even do the bare minimum of using the stairs and walking to where they can  we were born to move

text:
i want to share some story’s with you guys  this is my first one  english isn’t my mother language  sorry for bad word choices and mistakes 

one month ago i had a free day alone and did some research with    i habe done a lot of dissos and a tolerance  on this day i took   about       insulfated in      i love holing and wanted to know if it’s possible with this disso  after the last line  already completely maniac  my mind thought it’s a good idea to take some acid  in cases like this i threw a coin and destiny dicided yes  so i took a good tab with    went out with a friend in the forest to get some food shrooms  the come up was really hard and my body felt like a gum  after     we got enough food and got back to my apartment  my friend cooked the shrooms and i tried to clean up a bit  that’s where i realized slowly something is not good  i couldn’t finish a task  like cleaning the table forgot what i want to do  after   my apartment looks wild because i started a lot of thing and forgot what to do  all over my place are things i got out and let it on the ground  the food is ready  but iam not hungry so i smoke some good haze  which hopefully makes me hungry  i stopped smoking weed a week ago  tolerance is down   after half of the joint my mind is completely crazy  thousands thoughts but not one for longer than a second  i realized what i’ve done and get really paranoid  told my friend i’ve a bad trip und want to be alone  in my bed my mind is killing me  bad thoughts and my body felt very unchill like in a rush  felt like iam in hell  i got some benzos  tavor      it helped a bit and a seroquel  the situation gets better  if i had no downers on hand i would go to the hospital  but the trip was just at the half  so i took a bath at   in embryonic body position  after i took some promethazine i was luckily able to sleep  

this was the worst experience ever for me  really psychotic and in fear to be ever in this type of mind  the next day everything was ok but not fine  i really took way to much   and the j killed me  have done a lot acid trips and thought i never gonna have a bad trip  but this showed me it can happen  respect all substances way more since this  

and iam really proud that i didn’t smoke week for a month  was a heavy smoker before  maybe i can warn someone to be careful with this combo  

best wishes to all of you  stay safe

i used to be very strict with my rc stimulant choice   that being    due to the its wide usability  now do not lump me with the work hard so i can play hard so i can work harder scene  my recreational frequency is   days during party seasons  summer and december  and then usually once a month  when it comes to functionality i used to study on years ago  now i very rarely use it  about every   months in threshold light doses  for   evenings to finish deadlines for instance 

ok so to my surprise a nep sample appeared and what the hell    they are almost the same when it comes to effects  however  there is even less jitters  the duration is smaller and the comedown is almost nonexistent when i tested in one small dose  dont know how the comedown is after a night on a party

text:
i know some of these questions have been answered elsewhere  but i have found conflicting information   

   tl dr        i have a terrible chronic pain condition after many failed surgeries  pain is taking up my entire life  if anyone would like more proof that i have this condition  i m happy to send pics over dm       my pain never goes away  sometimes it s so bad that i literally cannot think of anything but there intense pain  i can t get out of bad or even watch a movie  i just stare at the wall and try my best to breath and stay calm  when its very mild  it s a bit like tinnitus  it s always there  but i am able to still do things regardless  on bad days    

  i have some pretty crazy pictures of  my injuries  i m not looking for sources  i am trying to figure out which medication may help me most in the future    

  i have been doing ketamine infusions recently and it has been a lifesaver  i can feel my sympathetic nervous system calming down from finally being out of pain  when i m having terrible pain  i use a little of my prescription ketamine  and the pain is mostly gone  it gives me my life back   

  but  k is not perfect  its expensive  only lasts around an hour or two  and there are tons of other  similar nmda antagonists out there   which ach would work best  would something like dck work bette  o pce  ketamine works great if i have breakthrough pain  it s like magic  it also has amazing  long lasting mood boosting effects  the pain relieving effects only last a little while though     if dcm could be prescribed  i think it would be a better choice for me  even though i ve never tried it  

   is ketamine the most sedating  least manic nmda antagonist  i m looking for something i can do a small amount of so that i am functional  but without pain  i also want to be able to get into a comfy hole occasionally  i practice a lot of hr      

  but  i m realizing that my life is slipping away from me because i m spending almost all of time just trying to make time go by more quickly  years of my life have passed me by   

i can t live a normal life like this and because of the laws on opioids  i cannot stay on anything long term  except for tramadol  i was using very high doses which were prescribed by a doctor  i was taking   morphine per day  just in form of oxycodone  tapentadol  and a bunch of others  all my medication added up to the same as about   morphine per day 

i ve gotten all the way down to just   oxycontin per day in just three months with the help of k  i know that s still a lot  but i ve come down a lot  but  now i have more severe chronic  background pain  though fewer episodes of breakthrough pain  i ve gone down because ultra high doses of opioids cause other health issues  and also because the the dea is forcing my doctor to take me off all cii medications    so  i will need to get off of everything  except maybe tramadol or an nsaid very soon  i need to do that even though my current meds are working okay and i m not having uncontrolled side effects like constipation  tramadol doesn t do a thing for me even at   per day   

  i ve gotten all the way down to just   oxycodone per day  i know that s still a lot  but i ve come down a lot  but  now i have more chronic  background pain and fewer episodes of breakthrough pain    

  i take a low dose of of doctor prescribed opioids  but they don t cover my pain  and i want to get off of them anyway because i don t want the medical system to have so much control over my body   

  ketamine is amazing for pain  i don t know why ketamine and similar drugs are so hard to get and i don t understand why people are not given a ketamine nasal spray instead of narcotics to begin with    if i i had ketamine at the start  my dosages would have never gotten so high  the ketamine at ketamine clinics clears my pain almost completely while i m getting the infusion for a several hours after  and its not physically addictive for me 

the only problem is ketamine is very expensive and only lasts for about   hours  i am interested in researching other nmda antagonists so i can help find a treatment that lets me have a normal life  dck looks promising   maybe some of the o pces  i want to research something that won t cause agitation or pcp like effects because i don t think compounds like that would work well for pain control  anything like pcp seems like a poor choice to research 

i know there are threads about this  but many new compounds have come out and i have read conflicting formation 

does anyone have any recommendations  does anyone feel up to chatting with me through dms  this have been going on for years for me and feel desperate  i would appreciate even just someone to chat with that kind of gets all of this  not just specific information about rcs 

again  i am looking for a dissociative that is sedating  can produce a hole  and lasts longer than regular ketamine 

this has been crossposted on r ketamine but that subreddit is kind of slow  i hope thats not against the rules  i did my best to read all the rules for both subreddits 

if you re read all of this  a little bit a of it  or even just skimmed it for   seconds  i really appreciate it
