text:
not a lot about   b fly here but lately have seen some informative posts about it  if i mention  fly   i am referring to   b fly 

dose    taken orally at once

currently      hours in and on the come down  still very much a body high  any visual distortions or enhancements are present but subtle   pretty smooth stimulation still and throughout  i ve only been able to tolerate reading my phone about     hours ago  

previous experience with   x  just     b fly   weeks ago  which was subtle and did provide a nice body high and pretty clear headspace but didn t seem to last too long     hrs  no experience with   b  but wanted to compare by trying some before taking fly  guess not to be  

other psychedelic experiences in order of most to least  shrooms  lsd  mdma  doc  

set and setting  at home and alone  dinking around the internet  

goal  test libido and euphoric properties of fly above    

timeline 
  hr since dosing  abdominal discomfort  akin to     of shrooms  regret eating some mexican take out   hrs earlier  noticeably more focused  hard to say  but some cognitive changes  i do the same thing every night so    after noticing slight nausea probably connected to stomach discomfort and anxiety over effect of a new dose  i vape some weed  just mids  out of ts which may have been good   nausea gone  body load seems high  like a high dose of lsd  but i feel in control  noticing some warmth within 

  hrs  churning stomach continues and will for the remainder of trip  with a special surprise at the conclusion of the peak    should ve taken some pepto or drank ginger tea but i soldier on  temperature regulation out the window  one minute hot  one minute cold  tingling sensation creeps up slowly throughout body  not the intensely euphoric feeling of good mdma but just reminding me   hey  it s me fly  can you feel me   visual distortions are present  i take off my glasses to clean them but its not my glasses causing blurring    beginning to get hard to focus on screen or anything near  body high is full on now so i decide to take a shower  which felt amazing  hot water especially  i wish i was doing fly in a flowing hot spring or jetted hot tub  that would be physical ecstasy  

im currently testing supposedly libido increasing rcs for my own research  however i have no increase in libido or desire to masturbate  stomach discomfort  body temp fluctuations  mental and physical   unable to focus and weird headspace made me uninterested in masturbating  difficult to get horny even looking at normally stimulating images or videos  at   i did feel a desire to masturbate and was in a more  comfortable  headspace  at this dose     at this time i feel more distracted or just disinterested in masturbation  visual distortions now are similar to coming up on shrooms 

  hrs  post shower  vape some more weed  open a beer  weaker ipa  to calm the nerves  which helps  tingling sensation is increasing but also moves around  body temperature remains chaotic as i switch from topless to hoodie and back at random  i take a more backseat approach to my consciousness as i notice myself following interesting thought trains  not negative thought loops though  time passage has definitely changed  felt like only an hour since dosed  not a confusing headspace but definitely different  like i became more an observer of my consciousness instead of held hostage by it  lower doses of fly could be good for meditation   still can t focus on shit but i do notice enhancement of colors  moving feels good  a significant increase in sound perception  like almost superhuman  wow  i m also a little paranoid but i just blame it on the weed but also because its early morning 

  hrs and on  basically the same until       hours when the visual and auditory effects subside and my nearview visual focus is back   body temperature is beginning to stabilize  skin felt hot throughout but would have periods of chills   i noticed some tracers at this point  but barely perceptible  rarely see them so was a little surprised  i was able to wash some dishes  make coffee and converse with significant other without knowing i was on fly 

  hrs and on  where i m currently at  so you can still act rationally on fly  i never did experience any increase in smiling or laughter  just a sense of feeling good  body high is beginning to subside but definitely still there  mind is about back to normal  body feels hotter but still inconsistent  i could probably masturbate but it feels like lots of work  fly has both stimulated and sedated me  i have a good tolerance to weed and its just mids so i rule that out  one drank the one beer the whole trip 

if you ve made it this far  at almost exactly   hrs as i was finally able to read my phone i farted which was long  loud  gassy and felt good  but i actually sharted  unusual for thar kind of fart  felt just gas until the very end  and then diarrheal shart  gross  thanks fly  back into the shower  understandably less euphoric as the first one  this was my first     b fly experience  dose definitely changes the character as does set and setting  doing it outdoors during daylight is doable at this dose  i probably will next try fly with lsd  psilocin  mdma  or   fa  

happy tripping

text:
is my opinion after researching a few days  at the beginning she seems so smooth  so sensual and carefree  it seems that you can join her everytime without trouble  then after a few hours you start feeling that she is driving you insane almost like a php and then you you know that if the binge continue the comedown is gonna hit hard 

well it doesn t hit as hard and soul destroying as hexen or a php but it is no joke  in the sense that you re will feel it too much if you try to go through a normal day with normal duties and functionally  but well  as you didn t suffer a lot  you try another day  quite close  cause the hungover seemt non existant  just a bit off   

so she calls you unexpectedly  or it was expected    and then you hung up and go along with another lab meeting     then she s so intense and sweet that you start having muscle aches  obvious dopamine depletion and that obnoxious chest tightness and shortness of breath so typical from the not so attractive girls of his kind   and then  after jacking off for hours you start thinking    is this what i want  it is really the love of my life or she has starting behaving in a way that seemed innocent but she is just another cathinone whore 

and well  she probably is one of the best of their kind  but she is as fatale as the others  or at least for me   as i felt about it    i see no point in taking this bliss bomb  more often than twice a month maximum or doing only a dose    i like it but it seems so smooth that you want to do it daily and it makes my day worse at the end  maximum i did   times a week  not only because of the health concerns  that arise quite easily but no as obvious or horrific as pyros  but because it makes me not social at all  i just want to be own my own and my mind feels great but not productive and not creative at all 

i tried   batches from the same vendor  a clumpy off white nf powder  europe i think  and some crystals  both are good maybe the crystals are better cause they seem more rounded and dopamine oriented on the euphoria but the vasoconstriction was worse for me  is easy to fiend on this     

i researched yesterday with the clumpy stuff  something like     mg in total    doses in about   hours  it was completely clean  i could sleep after without a problem  but i still think that this stuff is neurotoxic  i just cannot explain why    is this the one that all people here says that is minthy or absinthe like in odour  i don t notice that  it smells chemically and is almost creamy yellowy  and fine powdered  it appears listed as  ethyl pentedrone  nep  powder europe  

please be careful with this stuff  better stick with non seductive stims

text:
the stars have aligned again   in all seriousness  i got an opportunity i couldn t pass up to try a higher dose of this compound   i m not in a proper state to get too detailed here  so i m just going to drop the notes i managed to make today  edited slightly for cohesion 

 amp    

  methyl pcp

 amp    

dose    oral    insufflated an hour after first dose bringing total to    

 amp    

feeling the ethereal energy flowing through every atom of my being  cool waves of stimulating dissociation are caressing my body   music is incredible  slowed down enough to pick apart each separate note and instrument   i’m in the flow now  in an ocean of dissociation  it’s a gentle but powerful energy   even at this dose surprisingly clear headed  very euphoric  uplifting  not too confusing   colder than   ho pcp   it s so damn hard to describe these experiences   i am experiencing this wonderfully smooth  flowing dissociation that is  glorious      is very strong  glad i didn t re dose any higher   takes a while to fully come up  about an hour and a half i d say   

 amp    

smoked     dmt right after the peak  burned it a little leaving a nasty taste   numbing sensation in my mouth that distracted me from the trip   regardless  dmt adds an all encompassing warmth and insane visuals  it just warms the soul and feels fucking  incredible    like being immersed  or rather dissolved in a rainbow ectoplasm of euphoria   gooey fractalated juiciness   damn   now i’m just melting in a puddle of bliss   if you have access to dmt and enjoy dissos  you need to try this combo   seriously   i haven t found a disso yet that didn t combine amazingly with dmt   and you really don t need much      of dmt is enough to provide unbelievable euphoria and visuals       and there are no words in any language to do it justice   

 amp    

in summary    methyl pcp is definitely a winner in my book   right up there with   meo pcp   very excited to get to know this compound better

text:
hey all 

for legal reasons  i can t get into a lot of details of my story at this time   to sum it up    i did not get any love letters   i got local police and feds searching my house when i wasn t even home due to something that was sent to my house   i m facing felony charges of distribution and i ve never sold a damn thing to anyone   not federal charges though thankfully   i think they thought they had some kind of whale and they got little old me   

the true reason i ve ever used psychedelics is because they changed my life   so much so that i decided to go back to school and legitimately pursue the path   since this is actually the case  my attorney and i have decided to basically go with the defense of   tell the whole damn truth    so here s my request 

i m looking for an  expert   such as a psychologist  psychiatrist  pharmacologist etc   that would be willing to testify to the real benefits of psychedelics   someone like rick doblin would obviously be amazing  but that s not going to happen   i m not sure that i would need anyone to actually show up in person or not   but perhaps a very well written statement or something like that would do the trick    i know there s tons of experts out there  i just don t know any personally  

is there anyone out there with some good credentials that could provide me any assistance    i am willing to pay for these services if need be   i live in pennsylvania if that matters   i m reaching out to the universe and asking to be thrown a bone   if anyone can even provide a possible lead to such a thing  i d be extremely grateful   

thanks for reading   be careful out there   i m not telling anyone what to do  just take note of my story  i never thought this could happen  but it did

another post on an rc i have some user experience with   

so this one is pretty chill actually  i mean  it can be over done pretty easily but this is actually a pretty decent substitute for rx stimulants  for me anyway  just with this stuff  you need to be on the cautious side with abuse potential  because it s actually pretty damn good

text:
i may have just found my new favorite drug  and i will definitely be doing this again  

   tl dr at the bottom    

 amp    

  dosage and duration   

i prepared a capsule containing   of   ho met for myself  and   for her  i have a    scale but it s not perfectly accurate  so the dosages might have been slightly off  we ingested the capsules at      and were tripping pretty fast after that  we were mostly come down at      the timestamps in the trip report are estimates 

 amp    

  set and setting   

i had tripped with my girlfriend before with a group of friends  on   b   but we had never tripped one on one  we were both very excited for this  and i did my very best to prepare for the experience perfectly  i wrote up a preparation document for her with info on the substance we were going to be taking  as well as how to prepare best for a psychedelic experience  i also decorated my room with candles and some disco lights  the last meal we had was lunch hours before  to prevent nausea 

 amp    

  come up   

we ingested the capsules at      and noticed effects about     minutes later  the come up was very easy and quite pleasant for me  the colored lamps in my room gradually became more and more colorful  and swirling patterns started to appear  i noticed some discomfort in my stomach  but it hardly bothered me  besides that i was just quite warm  

my girlfriend had a rougher time unfortunately  she got very cold  so i packed her in blankets  and then she had to throw up a couple times  the swirling patterns got quite intense for her  which made her dizzy and nauseous  and a bit anxious as well  luckily  she started getting used to the disorienting patterns after that  and she was no longer nauseous on the peak 

 amp    

  peaking   

during the peak  both of us felt great  this lasted from     to      we felt energetic and stimulated  and it made us very talkative  it was still very easy to communicate  which was really nice  so we were able to joke around a lot  i was still fully in control when i made us some tea for example  my girlfriend was still disoriented from time to time  the experience seemed to fluctuate in intensity for her  while it was a lot steadier for me 

we also tried to have sex  and while this worked for me  she was quite freaked out when my face looked different  as i didn t want to force anything  we left it at that  even though i kept reassuring her that it was fine  our failed attempt sent my girlfriend in a bit of a negative thought spiral  then  a spot of blood appeared in my bed  and neither of us had any idea where it came from  this freaked both of us out  but luckily i was able to stay calm  and calm her down as well  this is where the clear headedness of   ho met was a godsend  i was still able to communicate clearly  which helped steer the trip back in a positive direction  after that  we went around the room showing each other what objects were trippy to us  and had a lot of fun doing it  

my visuals were awesome  every color was amplified greatly  and the candlelight looked awesome as well  there were beautiful swirling patterns all over the place  when compared to my experiences with   b  the visuals of   ho met were more patterned and more colorful 

 amp    

  come down   

right around the end of the peak  we went for a walk outside  the cold air helped us sober up  we didn t walk for very long  as it was a bit rainy and we both got very hungry at that point  it was     and we hadn t had dinner yet  there were still some remaining visuals when i put the pizzas in the oven  but we were mostly come down  my appetite was suppressed  as i couldn t even finish one pizza where i can usually stuff down two with ease  i had some stomach cramps because of how hungry i was  but nothing major  not long after dinner  we headed to bed  my girlfriend knocked out pretty quickly  while i still laid awake for a few hours 

 amp    

  the next day   

the next day  neither me nor my girlfriend had any sort of hangover  which was very nice  both of us look back very positively to this experience  and will be doing this again  even though she was nauseous  my girlfriend would stick to the same dosage as she thinks she could handle it better a second time when she has a better idea of what to expect  i will probably be upping my dose to   or   

 amp    

  tl dr   

my gf and i had an awesome time on   and   of   ho met  i had no negative side effects except a suppressed appetite  and loved the visuals  my gf puked a couple times  but still had a very positive experience overall  i highly recommend this substance  as it is a very enjoyable trip yet you remain in control of yourself

gt brorphine also shows binding to other orl   like targets ie the three canonical opioid receptors encouraging phosphorylation of the orl   and desensitisation  furthermore activation of phospholipase   activity can be agonistic towards apoptotic pathways indicating a mechanism of neurotoxicity and degeneration mediated by   activity from orl   activity  one can indeed lose mor expressing neurons  not something that will grow back once use of the drug has ceased  this can be highly worrying as it can induce a tolerance to opioid drugs that cannot be reversed by abstinence as the neuroplasticity of repair will not always produce new neurons that express the mor and in some cases will result in net loss of neurons  neurotoxic brain damage  one may not lose function due to neuroplasticity but one can lose mor sensitivity in the parts of the brain that matter for opioid induced sedation and euphoria and analgesia  a goal we all share  also continued activation of orl   not only causes it’s own downregualtion but also downregualtion of the mor and kor  a partially unwanted effect if euphoria is the goal

 gt one can indeed lose mor expressing neurons  not something that will grow back once use of the drug has ceased  this can be highly worrying as it can induce a tolerance to opioid drugs that cannot be reversed by abstinence

does anybody actually know if this is something worth worrying about   has anyone noticed this effectively in his tolerance

text:
hello everybody  some context before the trip report  this is the first time i ve tried any disso  before this i had only had experience with weed  shrooms  and some shitty acid    days prior to this i took an unknown amount of shrooms  estimated     grams  didn t properly weigh but not enough to make me trip hard   also because i ve seen that it can affect nmda antagonism i m on   mg of lamotrigine daily so bear that in mind as well 

so yesterday i got both my gemini   scale and the gram of   fdck i ordered from a dutch vendor who no longer ships to the us       reagent tested and allergy tested the powder and everything checked out  so i decided that i would boof   milligrams for the first time as i heard that was one of the best roas for this chemical  about an hour and   mins into the whole experience i decided i would try to write a trip report and what follows is my best attempt at that lol 

t    took       fdck

t      feeling that kind of “motion lag” that you get when drunk where u turn and ur just like woah

t      gave dog his medications  felt confused…”this is what all the hype is about ” just felt kind of out of it  or like being drunk but with none of the fun parts  no euphoria just a weird body feeling that stumbling 

t      took a hit from my one hitter

t        took another   mg  mostly just felt the weed high

t     sneezed and saw a pinwheel spiral thingy in my mind’s eye

t      went outside and smoked maybe   mg of weed from a joint

t     getting rly intense visuals when i focus on smith for a while but they’re the typical shroom ones but very diluted bc i did shrooms last weekend…placebo 

t      holy shit green n pink visual snow wavy things everywhere  a rly headspacey high w big open spaces in my mind’s eye  cev’s   

t     hhoooo boy music is amazing    i close my eyes and completely disappear into a sound wave and listening to pang is like actually transcendental rn omg

t      my blanket has a halo and i am zoning out a lot…

pretty soon after that i fell asleep and woke up a few hours later roughly at baseline but it was pretty fun  i don t feel like the beginning of the experience was typical of a dissociative experience and there really wasn t a mood lift or anything which was kind of disappointing  next time i think i ll take a   mg oral dose to start and go from there but overall it was a very interesting experience  if anybody has any tips as to how to get the most out of this and or the other ket analogs  dck and o pce  i d rly appreciate it  peace n love yall  lt

text:
apologize in advance for this sad excuse of a post but i have some norflurazepam coming and i was reflecting on my relationship with benzodiazepines  everything i read about other people s experiences is so different from mine and i wish they were just a shitty semi fun drug for me tbh   i m so upset that this compound makes me feel so incredibly normal that i get depressed because i can t access that normality sober 

i have never considered benzos recreational  i never mix them with anything else  i m not even addicted to them purely because their therapeutic potential is too high for me and i can t afford to build a tolerance and not get the full umbrella of effects  i m completely sober most days outside of       klonopin on the weekends so i can clean my house  do meal prep  get exercise  do the dishes  work on my hobbies  get out of bed  the difference between my brain on weekdays and weekends is stark  i have severe ptsd and while i m  functioning  it s all intrusive thoughts and anxiety all days every day  i can t ever do anything before or after work because i m frozen in fear under the covers  it is so fucking exhausting  i get insomnia on most benzos because i m scared i m wasting my anxiety free time and i need to squeeze as much living into those hours as i can 

because of financial and situational reasons i can t see a therapist or doctor  but even when i did  nothing i ever tried would let the flashbacks and intrusive thoughts be manageable  and i tried a lot of shit  i like need professional mental help lol but god bless the usa i can t imagine that happening any time soon  i want to try ketamine therapy because mxe was so instrumental in making me a more mindful human  i want to replace benzos with meditation  exercise  quality time and a good diet  i m trying so fucking hard and i ve come a long way  but i need  training wheels  i guess because my traumatized agoraphobic ass isn t going to leave the bed without them 

i don t know why i made this post tbh  i guess i just wanted to see if anyone relates

text:
its truly been hard to find the info i need on ducksuckgo  so here it goes  apologies for adding personal opinions at the end and makin it longer than needed 

i took a small hiatus from the scene  but before i  cut ties   i had heard much about an upcoming who discussion and possible criminalization of quite a few substances  is anyone familiar on the updated list of banned substances or was the bill not passed in its entirety  was it postponed  i cant find anything online at all now  even the articles i read simply saying the date it was scheduled  

i do know these rarely pass the first time  but if i am not mistaken those listed had been presented during other referendums already   of course i have been looking into this myself  however i honestly do not believe i have the time to read all the legal transcripts before when i need to advise someone on this and i would hate to simply skim what i do find and miss something  i am particularly personally interested in the benz ologues and anything deemed  psychadelic  however any information would be interesting and possibly useful  i can assure you im not lazy and am actually looking it up again as soon as i click post  but i am sure many of you can give me a faster  more easily understood and better formatted response than a legal document 

i am also interested in the current restrictions on china imports  i ve never been very great on the distinction or purpose on some chems being outlawed for no reason while they are legal here where i am in the u s  and would like to be able to understand this  msg if you can help me on this one so its not lost in clutter  also because of plausible deniability  as if that was a thing on the net 

i appreciate your time  fam  
                         

ill be posting what i figure out through research of my own if no one responds soon  just for those of you that need this info in the future  safe travels  future rc heads


important disclaimer before you say something unnecessary  anyone who demonizes me for even mentioning the absolutely terrible  evil  ruin your life benzologues as i am sure there will be a few  just fuck off unless youre also providing useful info  keep doing your itonitazene and criticizing people hoping for wisdom from someone experienced for the sole fact of teying to be safe  i have definitely been around the block and  admittedly  ruined my life a few times in a few different ways  i do not plan on getting anything whatsoever but am interested in current legality due to prior transgressions  id mostly like to learn more about legal hallucinogens and tryptamines as i ve seen some new novelty items  but am simply curious in my prior experiences as well and what path i almost went down  this is  of course  for legal research into the ambiguity of the grey market  


please dont do the following 
                         
 although obviously i cant stop ya 
my two largest  pet peeves in this particular sub are 
that many tell people to  just google it  or similar  thats so inconsiderate  of course you can look up facts but they are asking for your personal opinion and youre simply too dumb to understand that  they want someoneore experienced to help them stay safe  even if you disagree with them  help based on your own knowledge  please  lives could potentially be at stake and you know this  half of you started posting here asking the same exact shit anyway 

the other is that many people demonize benzo use or abuse or plain interest  hypocrites  enough said  also shouldn t be here 


post is getting too long but if you d like my thought process on either of those or anything else just ask or message  always happy to talk  give advice or argue  my knowledge is pretty extensive in many areas of this sub  not an expert but what i dont kbow ill kust day i dont know  keep it off the thread and private though  

thank you all  truthfully  i love you all  my kindred spirits  please stay safe 


edit  when i said legal research it just sounded like an appropriate term to use  im not affiliated anywhere involving laws you d be concerned with    other than in my sales occupation selling cell phones  in my personal experience  i suggest you never trust anyone representing any type of law legal community and never say anything  ever  so dont be scurred to communicate with me  i really need some facts as well as opinions  keep any personal info of yourself private though 

also  i hope this is deemed not to break any rules  seems close to breaking one but in my opinion does not  if wrong  im sorry mods just delete if you need to

loving it so far though  the energy and rush has been great  i know my behaviour thus far has been kinda reckless but it s my birthday this weekend and i thought i d celebrate and i think i ll get some studying done once i stop messaging people at    pretty geeked out but i m gonna try and go over some lectures

text:
hello my friends  because my link from r opioids rcs wasnt working right here also my text 
hope you will like my small review 
i wrote this text in google translated because i need a little longer in english and currently don t have that much time  
nevertheless  i would like to share my experiences with brorphine  my batch of brorphine is labeled to be  gt     pure  my tolerance at the beginning was around   tillidin  
i started testing very low  so i made a solution to be able to dose according to volume  since brorphine does not dissolve in water  i added some lemon juice  it takes some time  but is soluble this way  i started with     and added something about every hour and at around   i had a good effect  
the dose was only oral  

the effect was very relaxed  sedating and good for nodding  it lasted for a very long time  around   hours  sometimes even longer   i only take one dose a day  but you can still feel that the tolerance increases  after a week my dose is now around    
sometimes i had euphoric phases and even activity  so that i cleaned my entire apartment in a great mood  however  these phases could quickly turn back into sedation and i was back on the couch 

i had nausea as a side effect two times in this week with daily consumption  otherwise i haven t noticed any other negative effects so far  i will now try to take a break from consumption for at least a week and hope that this works     

as result  i have to say that i liked the substance very much  i have already tried many opiates and have to say tillidin remains my number    brorphine is second after that  

in any case  start low as the substance is really very potent  if there is little or no tolerance  always dose according to volume  
if anyone can questions  he can write to me and i ll try to answer 

stay safe

text:
i took     of gabapentin  around   of   ho met  and smoked some weed 

the trip started fine  i hadn t really experienced gabapentin before  and i ve never been drunk so it was a new experience    and gabapentin seem to mix well  it was a wavy fun time  with the entire room warping  getting further and closer  twisting and wiggling  i planned on smoking weed because i wanted to lose control  

i smoke the weed  and start walking around a bit  when suddenly my right side starts to go numb and i feel a constant nerve buzzing in my fingers  i immediately freak out thinking that i m having a stroke  i don t though  i panic for a whole  look in the mirror and try to smile  it does look noticably lower on the right side  my right side also begins to experience changes in gravity and direction  imagine going forward  except rotated i suppose  i cant explain it well  every   minutes i get hit with this wave of numbness  and my vision starts to droop  distorting strongly at the bottom  i try to do some jumping jacks to see if i can  and i definitely am able to  i can move my hands fine  i can move my arm and leg fine  it was all my ego 

i was forgetting concepts  having strong memory suppression only on the right side of my body and brain  i could feel two headspaces at once  i look in the mirror and realize i am losing my hold on reality as my right side starts to disappear  no traces  just disappearing  eventually i get over my panic and sit down  i close my eyes and can feel myself disappearing  i see vivid visions of skeletons  and graphs of nerves and the brain  i try closing my eyes again  and i start to feel my vision disappear in my right eye  i am not longer able to feel my eye  my hand has no context for what i am touching  i can t understand that my right hand is touching a bed  or my phone  what a phone is what fabric is  what my own hand is  i can see my body disappearing  dissolving into an invisible dust in a plane of nothingness  but also everything  i freak out again as i truly feel my ego slipping away  i felt like an unevolved species  unable to understand feeling  i would slap my arm and be able to feel impact  but there was no emotional context to the feeling  i was just feeling pain  but i didn t know or care what caused it  

i finally decided to just accept it  i haven t died yet so i wasn t going to  i lay down in bed and close my eyes  feeling my vision disappear again  i open my eyes and see big black spots in both eyes  it feels that i m going blind  i can feel the right side of my brain brain losing more and more connections  but at this point it was too late  the headspace quickly went away after this  like it was teasing me for not accepting earlier  i went into this trip wanting to lose control  and i did  

i ll be glad to answer any questions  i really want to talk about this trip more

text:
never in my life have i experienced such dramatic stages of drug effect than from pregabalin  i thought the premise of the movie was stupid  but now  it kinda seems realistic 

just like hfs  pregabalin works in three stages  first  you get super motivated and energetic  almost reminescent of a confusing amphetamine  next  that feeling fades away into a general stoning  body high  and gigglyness  finally  several hours later  the experience decomposes into hallucinations and full visuals 

last time i took it      i saw intense visual hallucinations reminescent of disso hallucinations  but with more geometry  i saw a huge matrix of starfish  ocean waves crashing into eachother with no orientation  and an endless concrete parking garage skyscraper with rapidly morphing and tearing layers of canvas over all the walls 

i thought i was pretty experienced with pregabalin  but this experience totally blew my mind

text:
i took a lot yesterday in low doses       but i tainted it with benzos  didn t do that today

     intranasal

powerful stim that got me to the park smoking cigs n j s and do some light people watching  also put up some homemade stickers 

   i wanna see what a powerful dose does  took   instrasal  difference is severe  rolling  i had the same thought of going to the park  put up a couple stickers  smoked a square then a j that was slightly smaller but man did i nurse the hell outta it and hold it in more  vibing to my music had me bobbing while smoking the j  some mini conference of maybe people working out showed up  normally on just weed i have no problem walking up to people and asking what events are but i figured i was too fucked up  a local street person who i had bummed half a j last week showed up and sat next to the bench i was at  too late it was already burning my fingers  lit another square and walked home from the park  had a very brief conversation with a neighbor  not knowing i was sweating profusely and my gait was off a bit  among my neighbors i definitely am known as a druggie and the police have been here about me before  luckily i m moving in   for a job  fingers crossed  this will be my third job in   hard out here for a cook  
still trying to make money selling stuff  all sorts of stuff really  not just the obvious  and i m now getting addicted to sports betting  college football  because i got hella lucky and tripled my initial    bet a couple weeks ago and i m trying to place strategic smaller bets and cash out  rolling  rambling  all the stuff on mind seems just as desperate but somehow okay which is why i just stay high all the time 

back when i was working it was tough labor and i relied on   and   before i kinda decided that shit is really fucking bad for you  i m supposed to get some o dsmt which would be awesome because only the strongest kratom extracts can keep me good  with leaf i m taking     regularly and like   if i wanna get high   about an ounce a day  i was addicted to tia      for two years and i m glad i didn t suffer any cognitive effects as far as intelligence goes but that was dangerous for a bipolar person  and have been swapping percs  kratom and rc opioids  i wanna try brophine but i want that solution prepped for me if it s an opioid with the same dosage as strong benzos  other than that etazene 

so i m just going on and on about my life of   because that s what i would do with another person here  also i guess i still want opioids on top of this because i keep talking about them  however i know that with this stuff and my test dose of   ho met i won t need it 

just now my left knee just started hurting like hell  stims tighten the muscles that i take the opioids for  probably gonna pop some canadian ibuprofen that s got a weak muscle relaxer  need to re up on that 

quick effects  extreme music appreciation had me dancing   increased aggression  i obstructed a couple on the sidewalk  when asked to move  i pointed to my earphones and ignored them causing them to walk around me   had to quit drinking because of fights  imagine the shit it takes for someone to put down booze and only booze   not giving a fuck how i appear to the world  inspired to create art off    don t think i could now  entactogenic which may cut both ways because my knee fucking hurts  benzo might help 

euphoria is dose dependent          to phenidates

       to amphetamines and coke  superior to phenidates  there s a little tease of molly in there  obviously not as good  if there s an rc as good as molly for cheaper let me know 

if you re wondering about benzos tolerance  i take several  to convert to kpins  probably about   a day  nothing i can t taper from using stuff i already have 

so as i come down from this in an hour or so which benzo should i take before my   ho met clam  flualp or kpins  each would be   kpin equivalent  

also should i avoid other stims  i took a bronkaid  ephedrine  after i filled my nose with   in one go  clogging it  also drank a starbucks triple shot before i went out the second time 

or maybe do they help with a comedown 

one issue i could see if   ho met is strong is that i m gambling on some football games and if they don t go my way it could put a damper on stuff  

also i don t wanna be to fd on met that i can t chainsmoke and blow green in the park every few hours  every dose of   lsd         and   i could still go outside and appreciate nature 

i know i covered some non sequitors  i m stimmin  it s what happens

text:
i wanted to write this post just to give some insight on   fma and document my experience so that others will have information going forward  

generally  

  don’t use more than      after a certain point you hit a ceiling and you may as well be flushing it down the drain  further  the side effects begin to eclipse the benefits  

  the primary side effect of higher doses is long lasting residual stimulation  for context my heart rate is still elevated nearly   hours after i took    notably  sweating isn’t nearly as bad as with other stimulants  

  the best way to use this drug is orally and in lower doses for motivation  the functional capacity of this drug is unreal   because it isn’t as euphoric as adderall for instance you aren’t distracted with trying to keep a peak or a high going  you just work  

  duration of action is quite long  one dose in the morning will get you through the whole day  it’s very much like vyvanse  

  note  after taking   for two days i began experiencing strange kidney pain  it’s likely dehydration but i’ve been very mindful of my water intake  and never experienced anything like it with other stimulant misuse  because not much is known about this drug i implore you to take lower doses   this could be a hint at some dangerous side effect that isn’t fully understood yet  

what are your experiences with the drug like  what helpful information should others know going forward  

stay safe

text:
so i did   of   mapb with   of   fma   starting at a dirt road in desert    from destination   came up in   to till first alert   i had bouts of anxiety  with rounds of euphoria  both physical and mental   i was tripping   there is nothing out there  i was thinking i can t drive anymore  it was a chore to concentrate to drive  and my mind was drifting out away from what i was doing   i finally got up in the mountains  got out and sat under ponderosa pine trees  by aspen trees   
  i took a tenor guitar    string guitar  i sat and played   i had a really moving rhythm  but there was nothing there   i stopped to view the scene and played guitar   listen to all the senses i had available   smell the pines  hear the wind blowing through the trees  was a little warm  but it was cool there  maybe       for the first hours i had a really tight  sick feeling stomach 
  i had a lot of visual disturbance  pattern recognition  visually hallucinations  i kept seeing people and faces everywhere   some transformation   my depth perception was fucked   i kept looking at these trees  i kept seeing like i was looking at a totem pole 
  lots of euphoria  with physical rushes   lasted about   hours  i left to drive home   wasn t tired  but i slept well   i would said that is a psychedelic  rather than a stim

text: of first   lsd dose as recommended by the few places around for a worthwhile experience  was planning just   and maybe dosing   an hour later if there was nothing  but glad i did the whole   at once      male  it felt like a high dose of lsd for me  or about   ug  come up seemed similar but more subtle    i can say that this dose was very energized and electric  same as lsd at equivalent doses for me  like feeling you can shoot little lightning bolts out of your fingers  still trying to discern other physical and visual differences  seemed pretty standard lsd things  definate aural and physical bliss  maybe better than lsd  i felt there were waves of peaks instead of just one big peak  had a unique experience at about halfway  where my wife surprised me with an anniversary gift  it was as though the love i felt for my wife intensified the physical and emotional pleasure i was already experiencing  that was nice  cannabis seemed to really potentiate it  from dosing to feeling effects wear off was about   hours  come down was not bad  noticed some clenching but nothing unexpected  happy that i got to try   in my life    could be recreational for me as i could see myself being able to go on a walk or going to a concert  i fear that   ug or more would not be very functional

text:
so i ve been doing some research  and i ve seen a lot of conflicting information  i ve seen it claimed that   meo mipt acts as a maoi  and thus should be avoided with any phenethylamines  i ve also seen plenty of reports of combinations including   fma  adderall  and   b with no ill effects  and with the claims that it possesses no real negligible maoi activity  psychonautwiki list s the following under  dangerous interactions  https   psychonautwiki org wiki   meo mipt dangerous interactions  

 gt the anxiogenic and focusing effects of stimulants increase the chance of unpleasant thought loops  the combination is generally unnecessary because of the stimulating effects of psychedelics

and

 gt there are no known deaths from   meo mipt but  as a monoamine reuptake inhibitor  mri   injury could occur when excessive doses are taken or when it is taken with drugs such as maois  rimas  stimulants and any substance which act as a releasing agent or reuptake inhibitor of neurotransmitters such as serotonin and dopamine 

so  i suppose i d like to know if anyone has any experience combining   meo mipt with any kind of phenethylamine  and if anyone could point me in the direction of research papers  if there are any   that would be much appreciated  thanks
